name: Clarion Hotel Stockholm
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Stockholm in Stockholm, SE near the Royal Opera, Casino Cosmopol and the Stockholm Globe Arena. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast, free Internet access, a spa, a restaurant and an indoor pool. All guest rooms have free wireless high-speed Internet and flat-screen TVs with free movie and sports channels. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Stockholm hotels like our Clarion Hotel Stockholm. There is 24-hour room service and valet parking available. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet charge: 200 SEK/stay per pet.Choice Hotels

name: Hotel Birger Jarl
description: The stylish Hotel Birger Jarl is 300 metres from Rådmansgatan Metro Station and the Stockholm Observatory. It offers traditional Swedish cuisine and free Wi-Fi. Each individually designed room features the best in modern lighting and décor. All have a TV, minibar and comfortable armchairs. Guests have access to tea/coffee making facilities. Birger Jarl's restaurant offers a menu with a variety of Swedish dishes, while the stylish lobby bar provides lighter meals in a casual setting. Stureplan, Stockholm’s nightclub and shopping district, is a 10-minute walk away. Staff will gladly help guests with directions or recommend local attractions such as the Strindberg Museum.

name: Elite Hotel Stockholm Plaza
description: This hotel is housed in an impressive 1880s building opposite Humlegården Park and the National Library of Sweden. It offers a quality gourmet restaurant and free Wi-Fi. Elite Hotel Stockholm Plaza’s rooms feature colourful modern décor, cable TV and fresh bathrooms with free toiletries. Some rooms include a seating area. The award-winning Vassa Eggen Steak House uses top-class Swedish beef, lamb and pork. The minimalist interior design creates a Manhattan-style fine dining setting. A free internet computer is found in the lobby. Guests can also book the hotel sauna. Elite Stockholm Plaza’s central location provides easy access to shopping and clubbing at trendy Stureplan. Östermalmstorg Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Best Western Plus Time Hotel
description: Best Western Plus Time Hotel is a wonderful four-star hotel, centrally located in Stockholm. At Time Hotel we welcome you with a warm atmosphere in a vibrant part of central Stockholm. Our hotel located minutes from Odenplan has a modern, Asian-inspired design that will make your stay extra enjoyable. All our guests are welcomed into a large, airy lobby with bright colors which will make you feel at home. Feel at home in our 144 bright and tasteful furnished guest rooms which all have amenities as flat screen televisions, heated bathroom floors and wood parquet flooring. The rooms are immaculately styled, accentuated with color and most of our rooms have a French balcony. For your convenience we also provide complementary wireless high-speed internet in all parts of the building as well as a computer equipped business office. We also recommend a visit in our elegant lobby bar with a modern decor, and why not combine it with a pleasant stay in our relax room with sauna. These features make the Best Western Plus Time Hotel the number one choice in this part of Stockholm. Because the hotel is strategically located both near downtown and near walking paths by the water, you're close to mostly everything in our beautiful capital, which is appreciated by all kinds of travelers. From here you can explore on foot the city with its many interesting buildings and sights as well as many pubs, restaurants and cafes with a wide range of tastes. Stockholm's nightlife is all that you would expect with theatres, nightclubs and cinemas. At the Hotel you will find comfortable friendly surroundings to relax in. Our attentive, multilingual staff takes pride in providing professionalized service to all our guests. So whether you are here on business or on vacation for a few days or a few weeks we strive to do the utmost to make your stay as comfortable as possible. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Radisson Blu Royal Viking Hotel, Stockholm
description: This hotel is situated beside Central Station, 8 minutes’ walk from Stockholm Town Hall. Guests enjoy free entrance to the gym. The entrance fee for pool and saunas is 200 SEK. Breakfast is free for children under 7 years, while children up to 12 years have a discount. All the air-conditioned guest rooms at Radisson Blu Royal Viking have luxury beds and a bathtub or shower. Each room features a satellite TV and minibar. The in-house restaurant Stockholm Fisk serves internationally inspired cuisine, while HIGH - Cocktail Bar on the 9th floor offers city views. Archipelago boat trips depart from 2 nearby harbours and the Arlanda Express airport train departs from beside the Royal Viking. Drottninggatan shopping street is just a 5-minute walk away and the Old Town is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Brommavik Hotel
description: Situated in Stockholm's Bromma district, 5 minutes drive from Stockholm-Bromma Airport, this quiet hotel offers free Wi-Fi and parking. The modern, stylish rooms have a fridge and a flat-screen TV. The rooms of Brommavik Hotel feature a seating area, a tea/coffee maker and cable TV. Some include a private spa bath. Sundbyberg Station is a 5 minute walk from Hotel Brommavik, and the train ride to Stockholm Central Station takes just 10 minutes. In addition, the Solvalla Horse Racing Track is about 1 km away. The Hotel has a cozy sauna and relaxation room that can be booked for private sessions, and is included in the stay when booking the Superior, Luxury or Deluxe Family rooms. The Hotel offers access to a real fitness center with proper gym equipment.

name: Scandic Grand Central
description: A 10-minute walk from Cityterminalen Central Bus Station, Scandic Grand Central has an accessible location, making it an ideal place to stay while in Stockholm. It is close to Central Post Office Building, dining options and shops. The hotel provides free Wi-Fi, a sauna and a bicycle rental service. Facilities include an around the clock reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. Just moments from nearby clubs and bars, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily explore the best of the local nightlife. Scandic Grand Central provides rooms equipped with heating, a flat-screen TV and a hair dryer, plus all the essentials to ensure an enjoyable stay. They all have a private bathroom, a desk and an in-room safe. Scandic Grand Central provides a variety of dining options, including Teaterbrasseriet and Acoustic Bar. A buffet breakfast is served each morning and room service is available for those travelling at a more leisurely pace. The hotel is ideally situated for sightseeing in Stockholm with Sergels Torg within walking distance. Stockholm City Hall, the Royal Swedish Opera and Kungstradgarden are also found within 20 minutes' walk.Revato

name: Hotel Gamla Stan, BW Signature Collection
description: Hotel Gamla Stan, BW Signature Collection is a unique and charming boutique hotel in the heart of Stockholm’s Old Town that offers elegant and luxurious accommodation. The hotel is housed in three different buildings dating from the 17th century and maintains original details from the past. Some rooms offer a spectacular view of the water while others look onto the narrow cobblestone alleys and historical buildings. The painted ceilings, original beams and Stockholms oldest wrought iron staircase have been preserved. The hotel is a waterfront property, situated on Skeppsbron, overlooking Lake Mälaren. The Royal Palace is only 250 meters from the hotel and is one of Stockholm's most visited attractions. Hotel is within walking distance to most tourist attractions. Tour buses and boats are just nearby. Stockholm Central Station, Stureplan Square and the vibrant Södermalm district are all within 15 minutes’ walk. This is our guests' favourite part of Stockholm, according to independent reviews.The hotel offers a variety of different room types, king, queen, double or twin-size bedrooms as well as deluxe and premium rooms with a fantastic view over the water and the island of Skeppsholmen.bestwestern.com

name: Scandic Talk Hotel
description: Located in Stockholm, Scandic Talk is an easy drive from Stockholm Palace and provides private parking on site. It has a fitness centre, as well as free Wi-Fi, a sauna and meeting rooms. This modern hotel features a range of amenities, including luggage storage, a 24-hour reception and bicycle rental. Additional services include a laundry service and 24-hour security. The rooms at Scandic Talk are air-conditioned and offer an in-room safe, blackout curtains and an in-room closet. Each have ironing facilities, a desk and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. In-house dining options include Bistro Talk, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. Each evening, guests are able to relax in the cosy lounge bar. Scandic Talk is close to Alvsjo Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Stockholm and its surrounding areas. Kungstradgarden and Stortorget Stockholm are just an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Comfort Hotel Xpress Stockholm Central
description: Our non-smoking hotel is located next to Central Station. We offer easy access to attractions like the Stockholm Royal Dramatic Theater, Royal Opera Hall Stockholm, Stockholm University, Skansen museum and the Vasa Museum, the most visited museum in Scandinavia. We offer a lobby shop where breakfast can be purchased, as well as amenities like free WiFi, self-check in and guest laundry facilities. All guest rooms feature chairs, desks, hair dryers and TVs.Choice Hotels

name: Queen's Hotel by First Hotels
description: Queen's Hotel Stockholm is situated in the city's renowned tourism and shopping area. This modern property is ideally located in Central Stockholm. This charming hotel provides a 24-hour reception, meeting rooms and luggage storage. Additionally, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. Just a stone's throw from nearby clubs and bars, this 3-star hotel also allows guests to discover the best of the local nightlife. The rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. They are also equipped with a hair dryer, a shower and cable/satellite channels. A satisfying breakfast is available each morning, and there are also numerous restaurants and cafés nearby. Those looking for after-dinner entertainment can visit the on-site casino. Local attractions close to Queen's Hotel Stockholm include the National Library of Sweden, Kungstradgarden and Stockholm City Hall. It is within a 20-minute walk of Stockholm Central Station and Cityterminalen Central Bus Station, which allows for easy access in and around Stockholm.Revato

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Tapto
description: The Clarion Collection Hotel Tapto is ideally located close to the Museum of National Antiquities, Junibacken storybook house and theme park, Nordic Museum, Strindberg Museum, Aquaria Water Museum and Skansen, the oldest open-air museum in the world and also a zoological park. Enjoy hotel amenities like a restaurant, guest laundry facilities, a cocktail lounge, free organic breakfast, a light evening buffet, free weekday newspapers, free coffee, meeting space and coffee, tea and fruit available 24 hours a day, to name a few. Guest rooms have cable TVs. Some rooms have trouser presses. Book a room today.Choice Hotels

name: Profilhotels Riddargatan
description: Located on a quiet street in Stockholm’s fashionable Östermalm district, this modern hotel is 300 metres from Stureplan Square. Its stylish rooms feature a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and luxury beds. All rooms of ProfilHotels Riddargatan have wooden floors and a writing desk and tea/coffee facilities, while bathrobes and slippers are provided in some rooms. A rich breakfast buffet is served daily at Riddargatan Hotel. Drinks can be enjoyed in the lobby bar. For evening cocktails or a nice dinner, guests can visit one of the many restaurants and bars in the surrounding area. Stockholm’s Old Town and the National Gallery are both reached in about 10 minutes on foot. In addition, the popular Kungsträdgården Park is just 350 metres away.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Tapetfabriken
description: Welcome to Clarion Collection Hotel Tapetfabriken. The building from 1906 that originally housed the award-winning wallpaper manufacturer Kabergs wallpaper factory. This was taken into consideration when converting the building into a hotel. The wholes areas history is reflected in the carefully renovated industrial properties. The shopping district in Sickla is one of Stockholms largest shopping venues with 150 stores, some 30 restaurants, several gyms and a cinema.Choice Hotels

name: Bank Hotel, a member of Small Luxury Hotels of The World
description: Bank hotel is set in central Stockholm, a few minutes' walk from Strandvägen and Stureplan in the Östermalm district. This hotel features free WiFi in public areas, a fitness centre and an on-site restaurant proposing smart casual dining. Housed in a former bank building, all rooms are designed with stylish furnishings and feature a flat-screen TV, minibar and coffee machine. Guests can furthermore enjoy slippers and free toiletries. Bank Hotel offers a lobby bar and room service is available, as well as breakfast served in the room. The cocktail and terrace bar Le Hibou is located on the top floor with great views. It offers a large selection of non-alcoholic options as well as specially composed and classic cocktails. Kungsträdgården park is 200 metres from the property and the Royal palace is 500 metres away. Other popular nearby attractions include the island of Djurgården with Gröna Lund Amusement Park, 1.5 km away. Stockholm Arlanda Airport is a 42 km drive from the hotel and Kungsträdgården metro station is about 100 metres away.

name: Profilhotels Central
description: Situated in Stockholm city centre, this hotel is just 200 metres from Stockholm Central Station. It offers free WiFi and quiet rooms with a flat-screen TV and tiled bathroom with rain shower. The Arlanda Express Train departs 50 metres away. Renovated in 2013, all the soundproofed rooms at ProfilHotels Central face a peaceful courtyard. Carpe Diem beds and wooden floors are included in each room. Dinner and lighter meals can be enjoyed at the in-house Le Relais de la Gare Restaurant, which features panoramic views of the street life at Vasagatan Street. A buffet breakfast with hot and cold options is served each morning. Parking is possible in Hotel Central's garage. Drottninggatan shopping street can be found 300 metres away. Stockholm's Old Town is an 8-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Berns, Historical Boutique Hotel & House of Entertainment since 1863
address: Berzelii Park, Näckstroemsgatan 8, Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Berns, a historical boutiques hotel and house of entertainment since 1863, has 82 personally decorated rooms, 2 restaurants, several night clubs/bars and a large selection of meeting and event venues. The hotel offers the full range of on-site amenities and services like 24 hours room service and Concierge Welcome to the world of Berns!iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Rival
description: Situated in vibrant Södermalm, this hotel is set in a 1930s Art Déco building by Mariatorget Square. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with Blu-ray player and luxury beds. Wi-Fi access is free. An iPhone docking station, pillow menus and Egyptian cotton sheets are standard at Hotel Rival. All rooms are decorated with a scene from a classic Swedish film. Some include bathrobes and slippers, plus views over the tree-lined Mariatorget Square. Free tea/coffee and biscuits are available 24/7. Free DVD rentals are possible from the reception. Gamla Stan, Stockholm’s Old Town is only 10 minutes’ walk from Rival Hotel. Mariatorget Metro Station is 150 metres away. Bistro Restaurant offers Swedish cuisine and an extensive wine list. Chilled beers and cocktails are served in Rival’s elegant bar.

name: The Sparrow Hotel
description: In the heart of Stockholm, just a few steps from Stureplan, The Sparrow Hotel is located. A warm and welcoming place for guests from near and far. An intimate hotel, close to the pulse of the city and tranquil city parks; perfect for business meetings and nights on the town. The Sparrow features the most genuine of bistros, an inviting bar and colorful hotel rooms with a personal touch. Were sure youll feel right at home.iHotelier/iStay

name: Best Western Hotel at 108
description: Whether you're looking for business or pleasure, the Best Western Hotel at 108's unique location in Stockholm provides effortless convenience to everything this amazing city has to offer. This newly built hotel is located in two, nice, 19th century buildings on one of Stockholm's most famous streets 'sveavagen'. The Stockholm Odenplan metro station is about a 5 minutes walking distance from the hotel and has direct connection to Arlanda Airport. Metro station Radmansgatan is located about 50 meters from the hotel and offers easy connections to several of Stockholm attractions. All rooms are modern style, have free high speed internet, flat screen TV, air conditioning and underfloor heating in the bathrooms. They also have desks with space for a laptop and a safe. Please note that a large part of the rooms have no windows. The restaurant has two dining rooms and serves buffet breakfast and dinner. In the summer, you can dine out on the terrace located in the fantastic courtyard.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel C Stockholm
description: Boasting the world's first permanent ice bar and a lobby aquarium, Hotel C Stockholm offers stylish accommodation close to Stockholm's well-known attractions. It is also conveniently situated within a 10-minute walk of Cityterminalen Central Bus Station. There are a variety of facilities at the hotel that guests can enjoy, such as valet parking, free Wi-Fi and a gym. Corporate amenities include meeting rooms and a business centre. Just minutes from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover the best of the local nightlife. The rooms at Hotel C Stockholm feature a desk, a laptop safe and ironing facilities. They offer heating, an in-room closet and a telephone. Hotel C Stockholm features both a restaurant and a bar where guests can unwind of an evening. Alternatively, there is a large selection of international restaurants close by. The area surrounding Hotel C Stockholm is well-known for its shopping. The Royal Swedish Opera, Kungstradgarden and Stockholm City Hall are a short walk away.Revato

name: Comfort Hotel Kista
description: Behind every great day is a great night at the Comfort Hotel Kista in Kista, Sweden, conveniently located near Kistamassan Expo Center. We are near Kista Galleria, Kista Science Tower, Friends Arena, and Mall of Scandinavia. Enjoy amenities like a full breakfast, free WiFi, free coffee, copy and fax services and more. Rooms include everything you need for a convenient stay. Earn rewards with every stay with our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Långholmen Hotell
description: Långholmen Hotell is housed in a 19th century prison building on Långholmen Island in Stockholm. It offers free parking and unique prison cell rooms with flat-screen cable TVs and free Wi-Fi access. The modern rooms at Hotell Långholmen retain many authentic features. All have parquet floors and are equipped with a laptop safe and a work desk. An attractive atrium gallery dating from 1866 is situated in the middle of the complex. Stockholm's most captivating prison museum is open daily, and guided tours are given at weekends. The hotel is located in a relaxing park environment with jogging tracks. Långholmen Wärdshus Restaurant offers contemporary Swedish cuisine. The old prison entrance hall now houses a 24 hour cafeteria. Drinks are available at Finkan Bar. Hornstull, with its bars, restaurants and metro station, is a 10-minute walk from the hotel. A beach is located 100 metres from the hotel.

name: Forenom Aparthotel Stockholm Kista
description: Forenom Aparthotel Stockholm Kista offers free WiFi, a shared sauna and bright rooms with a kitchenette. Kistamässan is a 5-minute walk away. A work desk and a flat-screen TV with cable channels are standard in each room. The kitchenette comes with a microwave, coffee/tea facilities and cooking hobs. All rooms feature private bathroom equipped with a shower and hairdryer. Guests have access to laundry facilities. Kista metro station is 10 minutes' walk away and offers connections to central Stockholm in 18 minutes. Kista Galleria is 1 km away, while Arlanda Airport is 30 km away from Forenom Aparthotel Stockholm Kista.

name: Avanti Hotel
description: Located in Stockholm, 4.4 km from Stockholmsmassan Exhibition & Congress Centre, Avanti Apartment Hotel provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a restaurant. The property is around 4.9 km from Monteliusvägen, 6 km from Stockholm Cathedral and 6.1 km from Museum of Medieval Stockholm. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking hotel features a sauna. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each room is fitted with a kettle and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms are equipped with a kitchen equipped with a fridge. At Avanti Apartment Hotel the rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. The Royal Palace is 6.2 km from Avanti Apartment Hotel, while Ericsson Globe is 6.3 km away. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

name: NOFO Hotel, WorldHotels Crafted
description: Welcome to the NOFO Hotel! Find yourself in a beautiful and historic building from 1780 on Sodermalm in the central parts of Stockholm. The hotel is within walking distance of Old Town, Slussen and the City. Stay in a vibrant neighborhood where people of Stockholm living. Sodermalm is one of the oldest districts in Stockholm and was a long time working quarters with much feeling. For many years known as the area where we are located 'Sofo', Stockholm's answer to London and New York's trendy SoHo. Amidst this vibrant neighborhood, you will find our oasis. Enter through a portal, out on a cobbled yard and you'll find us. We are housed in a listed building from the 1700s that originally built as a brewery. As the house was built at one time, with a roof and walls according to original drawings, has been completely control the hotel room disposition and layout. This allows the hotel to get a personal and original touch that along with the eclectic decor boutique reinforces the feeling. Upon arrival at the typical courtyard, which can be likened to an oasis in the middle of Sodermalm, enriched it with an inner calm. You feel far from the trendy areas, both north and south of Folkungagatan, where hipsters, taverns and street life plays out like a true 'reality soap'. We look forward to seeing you! Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Elite Hotel Arcadia
description: Set in a stylish 1950s building in fashionable Östermalm, this hotel is 15 minutes’ walk from Stureplan. It offers free Wi-Fi internet and rooms with LCD TVs and blackout curtains. Elite Hotel Arcadia’s rooms feature fresh design, modern décor and air conditioning. All bathrooms have heated towel racks and free toiletries. Guests are offered both classic international dishes and traditional Swedish cuisine at the in-house restaurant. Elite Arcadia is 5 minutes’ walk from Tekniska Högskolan Metro Station, which is 3 stops from Stockholm Central Station. The picturesque island of Djurgården is a 20-minute bus ride away.

name: Radisson Blu Waterfront Hotel, Stockholm
address: Nils Ericsons Plan 4, 111 64 Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Radisson Blu Waterfront Hotel is located amongst Stockholm's popular shopping district, just a short walk from Cityterminalen Central Bus Station. It features panoramic city views and 4-star rooms. This modern hotel offers meeting rooms, luggage storage and valet parking. Welcoming and professional staff are available 24 hours a day. Those staying at Radisson Blu Waterfront Hotel Stockholm can enjoy the luxurious rooms that offer converters/voltage adaptors, a private bathroom and a mini bar. Hot drinks can be made with the available tea and coffee supplies, and enjoyed in the comfort of the room's living area. Radisson Blu Waterfront Stockholm is located in the heart of Stockholm’s entertainment district with restaurants, cafés and nightlife on the doorstep. Guests can also visit the Royal Swedish Opera, Kungstradgarden and Nordiska Kompaniet.Revato

name: Scandic Malmen
description: Scandic Malmen is located in Stockholm and is close to the Photographic Museum. It is close to Medborgarplatsen, shops and nightlife options. Guests can enjoy the sun on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. Amenities include free wireless internet and a 24-hour reception. Scandic Malmen Hotel has 332 rooms that are fitted with all the essentials to ensure an enjoyable stay. Guests in search of a meal and wanting to stay nearby needn't look any further than Scandic Malmen Hotel Stockholm's in-house restaurant, which is available each day for breakfast, lunch and dinner. A wide selection of dining options are also available close by. Scandic Malmen is ideally located for discovering Stockholm with the Sodra Teatern within a 10-minute walk. Grona Lund is within an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Scandic Continental
description: Situated only a brief stroll from Cityterminalen Central Bus Station, Scandic Continental provides guests with an ideal base while visiting Stockholm. It is set in the area's popular nightlife district, which is only a few minutes walk from Sergels Torg. There are a variety of amenities at Scandic Continental Hotel Stockholm on offer to guests, including a ballroom, free Wi-Fi and a fitness centre. Pets are also welcome. The hotel features contemporary rooms equipped with a hair dryer, a shower and cable/satellite channels. Scandic Continental houses a restaurant and a lounge bar where guests are able to relax of an evening. Eateries at the hotel include Café Caldo and The Market. Guests are also able to unwind with a drink at The Capital. Scandic Continental is ideally located for sightseeing in Stockholm with Stockholm City Hall and the Royal Swedish Opera within walking distance. Stockholm Central Station is only a two-minute stroll, linking guests with the rest of the city.Revato

name: Hotel Hasselbacken
description: With a stay at Hotel Hasselbacken in Stockholm, just steps from Royal Djurgården Circus and ABBA The Museum. Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and a 24-hour front desk. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Forenom Aparthotel Stockholm Bromma
description: No description found

name: Backstage Hotel Stockholm
description: With a stay at Pop House Hotel in Stockholm, you'll be within a 10-minute walk of Skansen and Vasa Museum. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Sheraton Stockholm Hotel
description: Plan your trip to the Sheraton Stockholm, situated in the heart of Stockholm. Our hotel is an icon in Sweden’s capital city, providing guests with thoughtful amenities, contemporary accommodation, and the best city center location near the Central Station, main shopping street, City Hall and Old Town. Travelers can relax & unwind in any of our 465 rooms and suites with Sheraton Signature Beds®, ample workspace and complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi. Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets for a fee. Club-level rooms grant access to the Club and complimentary amenities, while Superior rooms have a beautiful Lake Mälaren view and/or the City Hall. After a long day of exploring savor some French classics with a Swedish twist at the Brasserie or refresh yourself in the Bar with a signature cocktail. Our Meeting & Event spaces provide 900sqm of versatile space. All venues are equipped with complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi access and updated technology, ensuring the success of your business event.Marriott

name: Ibis Styles Stockholm Odenplan
description: Breakfast and unlimited WIFI included in all rates at the ibis Styles Stockholm Odenplan. The hotel building is a cultural monument, which means that no major structural changes are permitted. You will find a great selection of restaurants and cafes that serve Swedish, Italian, Chinese, South Korean, pizzas and fast food nearby the hotel. You will find twelve different bus lines and a subway station just one minute away from the hotel. Banks and post office is just a few minutes walk from the hotel.accorhotels.com

name: Radisson Collection, Strand Hotel, Stockholm
description: Modern and cosy, Radisson Collection Strand Hotel Stockholm is situated in Stockholm and provides free Wi-Fi. It is ideally positioned for those wanting to sightsee in the area. This 5-star hotel offers a coffee bar, a 24-hour reception and valet parking. Corporate amenities include a business centre. Radisson Collection Strand Hotel Stockholm has 170 rooms that are fitted with all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. Honeymoon suites are also available. Guests staying at Radisson Collection Strand Hotel Stockholm can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently located for those who want to stay close by at mealtime. A wide selection of dining options are also found nearby. Stockholm's attractions, such as the Royal Swedish Opera and Kungstradgarden, are within easy walking distance of the hotel. The surrounding neighbourhood is also famous for its shopping.Revato

name: Brunnby Hotel
description: Situated in the Årstaberg area of Stockholm, Brunnby Hotel offers free WiFi, free parking and guest rooms with cable TV. Årstaberg Train Station is a 7-minute walk away. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in Hotel Brunnby’s dining room. Both snacks and hot and cold drinks are available in the 24-hour reception. There is a golf centre located 1 km from the property. Stockholmsmässan in Älvsjö is one station from Årstaberg. From Årstaberg to the hotel is an 8 minute walk or one station with bus 134.

name: Forenom Aparthotel Stockholm Alvik
description: Offering apartments, this aparthotel is just around the corner from Alvik Station with connections via metro, tram and bus. Stockholm city centre is only a 15-minute metro ride away. At Forenom Aparthotel Stockholm Alvik, views of south Stockholm can be enjoyed. All apartment options feature wooden floors and up-to-date décor. A kitchenette with 2 cooking hobs and a fridge and a seating area are standard. Large wardrobe space and cable TV channels provide extra comfort and convenience. Coffee/tea makers are available upon request. Forenom Aparthotel Stockholm Alvik welcomes you with a living room concept in the lobby. Keep up fitness routines at the fitness room. The Old Town and Stockholm City Hall are about 23-minutes metro ride away from Forenom Aparthotel Stockholm Alvik, and 10 minutes’ taxi ride from Stockholm-Bromma Airport. Friends Arena can be reached in 15 minutes by taxi.

name: Crystal Plaza Hotel
description: This hotel is housed in a 19th-century Art Nouveau building in Stockholm’s fashionable Östermalm district. It offers charming rooms with crystal chandeliers and tea/coffee making facilities. Crystal Plaza’s rooms also feature a flat-screen TV. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the building. Crystal Plaza Hotel’s leisure options include a sauna and a small fitness room. A popular breakfast buffet is served each morning. The hotel restaurant, Ming, serves Chinese and Thai cuisine. Staff can also recommend or book local restaurants. The staff at the property speaks Swedish, English and Chinese. Hotel Crystal Plaza is just around the corner from the bars and clubs of Stureplan.

name: Hotel Esplanade, BW Signature Collection
description: Welcome to the Hotel Esplanade, BW Signature Collection, located on the fashionable Standvagen, an extraordinary 4 Star hotel that many call their second home. Within a comfortable walking distance from cultural attractions, shopping, first-class restaurants, the archipelago and round-trip boats, this beautiful boutique hotel stand with pride.bestwestern.com

name: Best Western Plus Sthlm Bromma
description: Best Western Plus Sthlm Bromma is the first hotel in direct connection with Bromma Stockholm Airport. The proximity to Stockholm city center (8 km) is a perfect match with the easy access from the airport, whether you chose the hotel for accommodation or for your meeting. When you stay here you only have a short walk to the airport which saves you both time and money. In case you come by car there is a free parking in front of the hotel. Next to the hotel you find Bromma Blocks shopping center with more than 80 shops and several cafés. You are also a short walk away from the Solvalla racetrack. At the hotel you find a fully equipped fitness center on the ground floor open 24/7. The restaurant 'Bistro 46', offers good food based on superior quality ingredients available in season. The bar is serving refreshing drinks in a relaxed atmosphere where it is easy to get together. The lounge areas on the floors are popular places for work or to hang out with your friends in.bestwestern.com

name: Hilton Stockholm Slussen
description: Welcome to the Hilton Stockholm Slussen hotel, enjoying wonderful views over the water and the Old Town. The hotel is located in the hip Södermalm area and conveniently located within walking distance to many of Stockholm's main tourist attractions and the city center. All 289 guest and 16 meeting rooms are filled with natural daylight and featuring stylish Swedish décor. Choose from a range of spacious Hilton Guest, Deluxe, Executive rooms and Suites at the Hilton Stockholm Slussen hotel. When upgrading to an Executive room or Suite you will enjoy the breath-taking city and sea views and exclusive access to the hotel’s contemporary Executive lounge. When you want to keep up your fitness regime we offer a selection of cardiovascular equipment and free weights, or you can take part in an energetic exercise class. You can also make an appointment with a personal trainer. In Panorama Restaurant you can enjoy a sumptuous breakfast to get the day off to a great start. Eken Bar offers Scandinavian cuisine with an international twist, serving both lunch and dinner. We use seasonal ingredients, which are locally produced, wherever we can. In Eken Bar, you can sip on a well-made cocktail, while enjoying the lounge music and panoramic views over the city.Hilton

name: Lydmar Hotel
description: Situated by the National Museum, this chic waterfront hotel offers views of the Old Town and Royal Palace. It offers a popular bistro-style restaurant and art exhibitions. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Lydmar Hotel’s spacious rooms are individually decorated and have wooden floors. Many feature original stucco work, wood beams and high windows. All have a TV, minibar. The hotel restaurant serves European cuisine; everything from escargots to steak tartare to Sicilian fish. In the summer, the outdoor terrace offers a relaxing setting where guests can enjoy fresh cocktails. Archipelago boat tours regularly depart from Strömkajen Harbour, which is 100 metres from Lydmar Hotel. Stureplan Square, with its shops and nightlife, is a 10-minute walk away. Staff will happily recommend other local sights and attractions.

name: Scandic Sjöfartshotellet
description: Located in Stockholm, Scandic Sjofartshotellet is an easy drive from Ericsson Globe and provides private parking on site. It is situated a brief stroll from the Photographic Museum. There are a variety of amenities available to those staying at Hotel Scandic Sjöfartshotellet, such as a sauna, free Wi-Fi and meeting facilities. The front desk operates around the clock and the friendly staff can suggest places to visit and provide other tourist information. Just moments from nearby clubs and bars, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to explore the best of the local nightlife. Scandic Sjöfartshotellet has 212 rooms, all of which are equipped with a variety of facilities to ensure a comfortable stay. The private en suite includes complimentary toiletries in addition to a hair dryer. In-house dining options include Lighthouse Bar & Coffee Shop, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. A choice of dining options are also available in the surrounding area. Scandic Sjofartshotellet Stockholm is surrounded by the area's well-known tourist attractions, including Stortorget Stockholm, Mariatorget and Medborgarplatsen, which are within walking distance. It is also within walking distance of Grona Lund.Revato

name: Courtyard by Marriott Stockholm Kungsholmen
description: Courtyard Stockholm Kungsholmen invites you to experience 4-star comfort and award-winning convenience. Located in the city center, our hotel offers the best of both worlds: a sense of urban sophistication, plus the calm and tranquility of nature, thanks to our close proximity to Rålambshov's Park. Settle into exceptionally spacious rooms with large windows that let in natural daylight and offer views of the park or the residential area. Challenge yourself to a workout in the modern fitness center, or enjoy a tasty meal at Björk Bar & Grill, a favorite among Stockholm locals. Host your next event with us and take advantage of our sophisticated venues and exceptional planning services. When you're ready to explore, our hotel places attractions like City Hall and Old Town within your reach - and we offer bike rentals, so you can discover Stockholm on two wheels. Your 4-star escape awaits.Marriott

name: Elite Hotel Marina Tower
description: Situated right by Saltsjö Bay, Elite Hotel Marina Tower offers free WiFi and rooms with flat-screen cable TVs. Stockholm city centre is a 10-minute bus ride away. All rooms at Elite Marina Tower Hotel feature contemporary furnishings and wooden floors. Some rooms include a small seating area and a work desk. The hotel’s outside seating offers magnificent views of the bay and Djurgården island. Both Swedish and international meals are on offer at the in-house restaurant. A buffet breakfast is served every morning 06:30-09:30 weekdays and 07-11:00 on weekends. The vibrant Södermalm district is a 5-minute walk away. The nearest bus stop is within 50 metres. The neighbouring Saltsjökvarn Brygga ferry terminal offers connections to Djurgården, as well as Nybrokajen harbour in Östermalm.

name: Maude's Hotel Enskede Stockholm
description: "Room for dreams" The hotel is located in the area of Enskede not far from Stockholm center, Stockholm International Fairs and Globen/Tele2 Arena. The Svedmyra underground station is just steps away, easy access to all areas of the town, including Stockholm central station T-centralen with both Skavsta Airport and Bromma Airport buses and Arlanda Airport Express trains. Re decorations of all the hotel rooms was completed in Januari 2017. The interiors are both spacious and contemporary, enhanced by a personal ambiance. Our guests have complementary coffee or tea with homemade cookies in our lobby lounge. In the hotel lounge or on the beautiful summer terrace you can enjoy your breakfast or a cup of coffee or a drink during the day or in the evening. You can also take full advantage of free private parking area and wireless Internet are included the room rate. Our main focus is making our guests feel at home and well taken care of. Welcome!iHotelier/iStay

name: Best Western Plus Park City Hammarby Sjostad
description: Located in the Hammarby Sjöstad district, this hotel is 5 km from central Stockholm and 200 metres from the Sickla Kaj train stop. It offers free access to Wi-Fi, a gym All guest rooms at Park Inn by Radisson Stockholm Hammarby Sjöstad have a work desk, flat-screen TV and safe. Some also include a seating area. Just across the street from Park Inn is the Hammarbybacken ski slope. During summer, guests might enjoy a walk along the nearby Sickla Canal and Hammarby Lake. Stockholm Central Station is within 10 minutes' drive of Park Inn Hammarby Sjöstad. Ericsson Globe Arena and Tele2 Arena are both only a 5-minute drive away.

name: Lady Hamilton Hotel
description: This charming hotel is housed in a listed 15th-century building, right next to the Royal Palace in Stockholm’s Old Town. Gamla Stan Metro Station is 400 metres away. Guests can book private access to the on-site sauna and plunge pool. All rooms at Collector’s Lady Hamilton Hotel have cable TV and a private bathroom with eco-friendly toiletries. For added historic feel, most rooms feature old paintings, antique furniture and crystal chandeliers. The hotel's 13th-century cellar well is now used as a relaxing area with a sauna. The in-house Bistro Emma serves afternoon tea during weekends from September through March. Staff at Collector’s Lady Hamilton will gladly recommend local shops, cafés and attractions such as the Nobel Museum. Stockholm Central Station is 1 metro stop away.

name: Victory Hotel
description: Situated in Stockholm’s picturesque Old Town, Collector's Victory Hotel is 2 minutes’ walk from Gamla Stan Metro Station. Its uniquely decorated rooms have a flat-screen TV and heated bathroom floors. Inspired by its own maritime antique collection, the rooms at Collector’s Victory Hotel feature a naval theme. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. The on-site restaurant, Djuret, serves both meat and seafood dishes, using locally sourced and organic produce. Guest can also unwind with a drink in the cosy lounge bar Tweed, or visit the wine bar The Burgundy. Leisure options at Collector’s Victory include a sauna and a plunge pool.

name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Stockholm Alvsjo
description: This hotel is about 10 minutes' walk from Stockholm International Fairs and Älvsjö Train Station. Guests enjoy free sauna access and free WiFi. All rooms of Connect Hotel Stockholm have a flat-screen TV. Bathroom facilities are either private or shared. A variety of dishes and refreshments are served in the Living Room, the hotel’s combined restaurants, bar and TV lounge. Connect Hotel Stockholm is an environmentally friendly hotel.

name: Hotel Sven Vintappare
address: Sven Vintappares Gränd 3, Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Housed in an early 17th-century building in the heart of Stockholm’s Old Town, Hotel Sven Vintappare offers rooms with flat-screen TVs and Gustavian-style furnishings. Västerlånggatan shopping street is 50 metres away. All the traditional guest rooms at Sven Vintappare Hotel feature exposed wooden beams and a pantry with china dinner sets. Each room has a private bathroom with shower and heated marble floors. Guests can start their day with a breakfast in the hotel café, situated in a medieval wine cellar. The staff can help reserve tickets to a variety of events. The Nobel Museum is 150 metres away. The Royal Palace is a 5-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hotel Zinkensdamm
description: Situated in the trendy Södermalm district in Stockholm, by the green oasis of Tantolunden Park, is STF Hotel Zinkensdamm. It offers modern rooms with free WiFi access. All rooms at STF Hotel Zinkensdamm have wooden floors, and are decorated in warm, earthy tones. They include flat-screen TVs and well planned work areas. On-site leisure options include mini golf, a relaxing sauna and a playground for children. Guests can rent bicycles at the hotel. The Zinkadus Bar & Café serves traditional Swedish dishes. Outdoor dining is possible during warm summer evenings. A buffet breakfast is served every day. Hornstull Metro Station is a 10-minute walk away. Stockholm city centre and the Old Town are both within an 8-minute metro ride.

name: Hotel Söder
description: Hotel Söder is situated in the trendy Södermalm district of Stockholm, 250 metres from Medborgarplatsen Square. It offers free Wi-Fi and rooms with flat-screen cable TVs and private bathrooms with shower. The modern guest rooms at Söder Hotel feature a seating area. All rooms have wooden floors and a work desk. A full breakfast with cereals, bread and hot options is served every morning in the dining room. Free tea and coffee are available at all times. Medborgarplatsen Metro Station is 250 metres from the hotel. Stockholm city centre and the Old Town are both within is a 5-minute metro ride away.

name: Hotel Hornsgatan
description: Hotel Hornsgatan with 22 rooms offers a cozy, calm and personal atmosphere in a building from 1905. All our rooms have a desk, wardobe, chairs and windows that can be opened. Wifi and our breakfast buffet are always included in the price. The hotel is located next to Mariatorget at Södermalm in Stockholm, a popular area well-known for its restaurants, bars and shops. The hotel is located within walking distance to Slussen and the old Town. The closest underground station is Mariatorget and the closest commuter train station is Stockholm Södra. We offer three different categories of rooms. Rooms with shared bathroom in the corridor or rooms with private bathrooms located one floor up in the building. On the ground floor, across our courtyard and two stairs down we have five rooms with private bathroom that have access to a fully equipped shared kitchen and small seating area.

name: Generator Stockholm
description: Generator Stockholm is set in Stockholm and is a short walk from Cityterminalen Central Bus Station. Those staying at the property can also enjoy free wireless internet. There are a variety of amenities available to guests of the hostel, such as a 24-hour reception, a coffee bar and meeting rooms. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. Just moments from nearby clubs and bars, this 3-star hostel also allows guests to discover the best of the local nightlife. The modern rooms feature views of the city. Bar Hilma is a modern place at Generator Stockholm to relax with a beverage after dinner. A selection of dining options can also be found in the surrounding area. Generator Stockholm is ideally situated for discovering Stockholm with Central Post Office Building, Hotorget and Tegnerlunden within walking distance. Sergels Torg, Drottninggatan and Stockholm City Hall are a short stroll away.Revato

name: Welcome Hotel Barkarby
description: This good-value hotel is 15 minutes’ train ride from Stockholm city centre. It features free Wi-Fi, in-room flat-screen TVs and gym. For an extra charge, the Welcome SPA offers two outdoor pools, heated to 38 degrees all year, two saunas and a cold bath. Welcome Hotel Barkarby’s popular breakfast buffet includes hot and cold dishes. The in-house à la carte restaurant serves both Swedish and international cuisine. Parking is free on site. Facilities include a free internet computer and pool table. The Barkarby Shopping Area and Stockholm Quality Outlet are 5 minutes’ drive from the hotel, offering 100 shops and outlet stores. Järvafältet Nature Reserve with its walking and jogging trails is 5 minutes’ walk away. Friends Arena is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Stf Af Chapman & Skeppsholmen
description: Located on Skeppsholmen island in Stockholm, this STF hostel is split between a late 1800s ship called Af Chapman and former navy barracks called Hantverkshuset. Moderna Museum and East Asia Museum within walking distance. Guest can choose from guest rooms or ship cabins. The guest rooms located in the main building feature large windows, high ceiling and views of the water or park. Some of the ship cabins have a small sitting area and a small window with a city view. Both options include access to shared bathroom facilities. Guests can enjoy a traditional Swedish breakfast buffet. The on-site café serves light meals. There is also a shared kitchen where guests can prepare own meals. During June to August, guests can relax on the sun deck on Af Chapman. The Östasiatiska Museet Bus Stop is 150 metres from the hostel. Kungsträdgården Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk from STF af Chapman & Skeppsholmen.

name: Lilla Rådmannen
description: Welcome to Freys Hotel Lilla Rdmannen. We have a fantastic reputation for our professional and personal service and for our warm and friendly atmosphere.The hotel is located in a peaceful area in the heart of Stockholm just moments away from the busy shopping street Drottninggatan. This charming part of the city is also known for its antique and vintage shops and many green parks. Stop for a chat, a drink or a snack in the cosy lobby bar or discover the many cafs, restaurants and trendy bar in the neighborhood. The hotel has 62 individually decorated stylish rooms. Hotel Lilla Rdmannen is the perfect base for visiting Stockholm!iHotelier/iStay

name: Mosebacke Hostel
description: Just 15 minutes’ walk from Stockholm’s Old Town, this good-value hostel is on Mosebacke Hill in vibrant Södermalm. It offers free WiFi and a fully equipped communal kitchen. The modern, air-conditioned rooms at Mosebacke Hostel have a TV. All rooms are without windows and are brightly decorated and have wooden floors. Bathrooms facilities are shared or private. Guests can relax and play cards and other games in the hostel's lobby. Laundry facilities are also available. Breakfast is served each morning at the hostel. The area around Mosebacke Hostel has many shops, bars and restaurants. Slussen Metro Station is just around the corner.

name: Best Western Kom Hotel Stockholm
description: As a guest at the Best Western Kom Hotel Stockholm, you not only have an ideal location in the city center, but also a welcoming and homely atmosphere. With our 143 rooms and conference facilities the hotel is just as good whether you are here for business or pleasure. The hotel is owned by the YWCA-YMCA Central which is a non-profit organization with over 2,000 members, ranging from basketball, gymnastics, camps for music, choirs, orchestras, youth choir and more. All our profits go to the YWCA-YMCA Central's children and youth. The rooms are spacious and have good workspace and Wi-Fi. All rooms also have shower, hair dryer, iron, ironing board, safe, and free television. Garage is available but must be pre booked as we have limited space. Guests have free access to the gym, so you can stay in shape even when you're on the road. The gym is well equipped and has changing rooms plus a sauna. The dining room serves a large breakfast buffet each morning. The Best Western Kom Hotel Stockholm is certified by Ecolabel, which means that we do our utmost to reduce energy consumption and use of chemicals. Here you can sleep with good conscience. From January 1, 2018, Best Western Kom Hotel is entirely cash free. It will be faster and easier for you as a guest, and you will be contributing to the safety of our staff. You can pay with all major credit cards or prepayment via 3rd party authorization. Thank you for your understanding and for helping us make our working environment safer.bestwestern.com

name: Stockholm Ängby Camping
description: Stockholm Ängby Camping offers basic accommodation with standard facilities in Stockholm, 10 km from Stockholm City Hall. Free WiFi and parking are offered. A terrace with garden views is offered in each unit as well as a kitchenette. Stockholm Ängby Camping provides a children's playground, a barbecue and a tennis court. Långholmen is 10 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 6 km from the property.

name: Unity Hammarby Sjöstad Stockholm
description: Located in Stockholm, 1.9 km from Sickla Beach and 3.7 km from the centre, UNITY Hammarby Sjöstad provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a fitness centre. Private parking is available on site. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and walk-in shower. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a kettle. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast is available daily at the property. At UNITY Hammarby Sjöstad you will find a restaurant serving European cuisine. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy skiing nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Tele2 Arena is 1.7 km from UNITY Hammarby Sjöstad, while Fotografiska - Museum of Photography is 3.6 km away. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 15 km from the aparthotel.

name: Aiden by Best Western Stockholm City
description: Aiden By Best Western Stockholm City offers a modern design with a peaceful atmosphere, close to city life, and excellent connections to central Stockholm and Arlanda Airport. Nearby, you'll find the Fridhemsplan subway station, only two stops from the central station. The hotel is centrally located at Alstromergatan 39, on Kungsholmen in Stockholm, keeping you close to attractions, restaurants, and entertainment. Shopping enthusiasts will also be pleased, as the hotel is just a stone's throw away from the trendy Vastermalmsgallerian. We offer hotel rooms of various sizes, ranging from small rooms without windows to rooms that can accommodate up to five people. Choose the one that suits your needs best. All overnight guests have free access to the hotel's sauna. You will also have access to wireless internet in all rooms and public areas at no extra cost. Garage parking is available adjacent to the hotel. We offer a daily breakfast buffet in a peaceful environment.bestwestern.com

name: Good Morning Kista
description: Situated just off European Route E4, Good Morning Kista is 15 minutes’ drive from central Stockholm. Early breakfest from 06:00 and free parking are offered here. Husby Metro Station is 7 minutes’ walk away. The modern guest rooms at Good Morning Kista have a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. WiFi access is available throughout the entire hotel. Dinner can be enjoyed at the on-site restaurant & bar, that also offers a 24-hour snack menu. Kista Galleria Shopping Centre and Kista Science City are both within a 20-minute walk from the hotel. Stockholm city centre is a 20-minute metro ride away.

name: Hotel Point
description: Located in the trendy SoFo district of Stockholm, Hotel Point is close to restaurants, cafes, theatres and nightlife. This hotel is 1.4 km from Stockholm’s Old Town and 2 km from the Ericsson Globe Arena. Stockholm Central Station is 12-minutes away by metro. Each room here includes free WiFi, an electric kettle and a cable TV. The fresh bathroom has a shower and hairdryer. Hotel Point’s restaurant serves a daily breakfast buffet. Other facilities offered at the hotel include a 24-hour front desk, ticketing service and luggage storage. If you feel like exploring the city, Vasa Museum and the ABBA Museum can be reached in 35-minutes from the hotel via public transportation. Stockholm Arlanda Airport is 43 km away.

name: Aiden by Best Western Stockholm Kista
description: Aiden By Best Western Stockholm Kista is a modern and well-located hotel in the heart of Kista. With just a short walk to the headquarters of many major IT companies, Kista Science City, Science Tower, Kista Center, and Kistamassan (Kista Fair), the location is perfect for business travelers as well as visitors to the fair. The hotel has 117 rooms of various sizes, from single rooms for the budget-conscious to larger rooms with a mini-kitchen and dining table for long-term business travelers. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi, and each hotel room has its own access point as well as wired internet. All rooms at Aiden By Best Western Stockholm Kista feature stylish and modern design. The rooms have wooden floors, continental beds with enhanced sleeping comfort, and a TV with special features. The bathrooms have rain showers and hairdryers. Other facilities offered include indoor parking, luggage storage, and safes. You now also have the opportunity to get on/off the airport buses from Arlanda Airport that stop at Kistamassan. The hotel's bar is located in direct connection to the reception. Here, our guests have the opportunity to relax in a cool lounge environment with both modern and classic elements.bestwestern.com

name: Riddersviks Herrgård
description: Located on the shores of Lake Mälaren, this elegant manor features a large garden and a private boat jetty. Stockholm’s city centre is 25 minutes’ drive away. Dating back to 1762, Riddersviks Herrgård today offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi, a TV and a writing desk. Traditional décor and garden views create a cosy atmosphere. Breakfast is served daily at Ridderviks Manor. A variety of restaurants as well as shops can be found at Hässelby Shopping Mall, a 10-minute walk away. Leisure options at Ridderviks Herrgård include billiards. In addition, the Viksjö Golf Course is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Stf Zinkensdamm Hostel
description: This Stockholm hostel is in a quiet area by Tantolunden Park, in the vibrant district of Södermalm. It offers a restaurant, 2 communal kitchens, as well as free pasta and a free public internet computer. Guest rooms at Zinkensdamm Hostel have either a private bathroom or shared facilities. Rooms with bathrooms have cable TV. Zinkensdamm Hostel’s traditional Swedish breakfast buffet includes freshly baked bread. The in-house restaurant, Zinkadus Bar & Café, serves light dishes during the day and in the evening a dinner menu of Swedish specialities. Cold drinks and sandwiches are available at all times in the kiosk next to the reception. The nearby park has a mini golf course, plenty of open areas and a small sand beach. Shops, bars and restaurants are just around the corner. Hornstull Metro Station is about 5 minutes’ walk away.

name: Clarion Grand Hotel
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Grand in Helsingborg, SE near the Karnan medieval tower, Kronborg Castle, Sofiero Castle, Fredriksdal open-air museum and the Lund University Campus Helsingborg. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast, a sauna, a restaurant and more. All guest rooms have mini bars, desks, hair dryers, irons and ironing boards. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Helsingborg hotels like our Clarion Hotel Grand. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet charge: 200 SEK per stay. The hotel features a new hotel concept kitchen and table signed by top chef Marcus Samuelsson.Choice Hotels

name: Radisson Blu Metropol Hotel Helsingborg
address: Carl Krooks Gata 16, 25225 Helsingborg, Skane Lan
description: Centrally located in Helsingborg, this hotel is only 300 metres from the central train station and ferry terminal. Free WiFi and access to the fitness centre are included. Helsingborg Castle is a 10-minute walk away. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Each modern room comes with a flat-screen TV, safety deposit box and minibar. A hairdryer and free toiletries are found in the private bathroom. Guests can personally choose pillows from Radisson Blu Metropol Helsingborg's pillow menu. The hotel's restaurant, Nelly's Food Etc, offers a range of international and locally inspired dishes. The bar Cocktails and Champagne by Hans Bihl serves trendy and classic cocktails and drinks. The award-winning buffet breakfast also includes hot dishes made upon order. Olympia Stadium and Norra Hamnen Marina are within 1.5 km of the hotel. The nearest airport is Sturup Airport, 70 km from the property.

name: V Hotel Helsingborg, BW Premier Collection
description: Welcome to the V Hotel Helsingborg, BW Premier Collection®, located just a five minutes walk from Helsingborg Central Station, the harbor and the medieval tower, Karnan. The hotel is located in a refurbished 19th-century building. All hotel rooms are individually designed and offer a mix of antique and modern decor. Some come with a balcony!bestwestern.com

name: Sundsgården hotell & konferens
description: Set in a school building 9 km south of Helsingborg, this hotel offers brightly decorated rooms with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Sundsgården Bus Stop is a 5-minute walk away. A seating area, work desk and wardrobe feature in all rooms at Sundsgården hotell & konferens. Each room has a private bathroom with shower. A breakfast buffet is served each morning in the dining room and a á la carte dinner can be booked in advance. Guests can rent a bicycle on site. The hotel also has a tennis court and beach volleyball court. The Sofiero Castle and Park is a 20-minute drive away, while restaurants are within a 20-minute walk of the property. Ängleholm-Helsingborg Airport is 40 km from Sundsgården.

name: The Garden Hill Hotel
description: Featuring a garden, barbecue facilities and views of garden, The Garden Hill Hotel is situated in Vallåkra, 44 km from Soderasens National Park - Main Entrance. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. Free private parking is available and the guest house also features bike hire for guests who want to explore the surrounding area. At the guest house, the rooms include a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, rooms at The Garden Hill Hotel also feature free WiFi, while some rooms have a balcony. All rooms have a outdoor furniture. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Vallåkra, like cycling and hiking. University of Lund is 46 km from The Garden Hill Hotel. The nearest airport is Ängelholm-Helsingborg Airport, 50 km from the guest house.

name: Gothia Towers & Upper House
description: Welcome to Gothia Towers! The perfect choice for both business travellers and leisure guests. Here you can enjoy a wide range of facilities - all under one roof, next door to the Swedish Exhibition & Congress Centre. In addition to hotel rooms you will find a flower shop, spa, café, restaurants, bars, conference rooms, banquet and exhibition halls. You will find a total of 1184 great rooms in all three of Gothia Towers’ imposing towers – with everything from that little something extra to a real touch of extravagance. Enjoy great comfort and tasteful décor and furnishings in our well-equipped double or family rooms. The majority of our rooms also boast wonderful views of the city. Gothia Towers is located in central Gothenburg, right in the thick of things on Korsvägen, just a couple of blocks from the main boulevard Avenyn. We are close to the city centre with excellent transport links, right next to Scandinavia's largest amusement park, Liseberg, Universeum science centre as well as concert and sport arenas like Scandinavium and Ullevi stadium. We offer several different restaurants and bars with everything from light meals in our café to modern à la carte dining. Come and enjoy breakfast, brunch, lunch or dinner. Or why not drop in for a beer, a glass of wine or other beverages? We have something for all taste buds and every occasion. As a guest at Gothia Towers you have discounted access to Upper House Spa, with a protruding champagne pool, Gothenburg’s highest hammam, saunas, an experience shower and a relaxation suite, where you can enjoy and take in the incredible views. Gothia Towers has been designed for exciting meetings, and for planned meetings we offer both small and really large conference facilities. We have options to meet your requirements and can tailor a conference or meeting to suit your needs.bestwestern.com

name: Elite Plaza Hotel
description: Located in a stylish neo-classical building in central Gothenburg, Elite Plaza Hotel combines old-fashioned comfort with modern amenities. It offers free Wi-Fi and tastefully decorated rooms with LCD TVs. All comfortable rooms at The Elite Plaza are equipped with a minibar, cable TV and safe. The decór is a blend of international style and classic Scandinavian design. The atrium-style Swea Hof restaurant offers elegant gourmet dining based on local ingredients. Drinks can be enjoyed at the Plaza Bar and at the British-style The Bishop’s Arms pub. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 11:00, except during peak periods. Guests can unwind in the relaxation area, complete with a sauna and a fully-equipped gym. The Swedish Exhibition and Congress Centre and the Liseberg Amusement Park is located an 8-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Hotel Riverton
description: Hotel Riverton is a contemporary independent design hotel located centrally in Gothenburg by the waterfront which is fully family-owned and operated since 1991. With personal care and attention to detail in every aspect of our guests experience, we've integrated the feeling of comfort, charm, and style combined with excellent food and drink experiences.Explore our story from our rooftop bar and restaurant to our rejuvenating spa and the comforts of our bedrooms making us the perfect destination for those who love unfussy luxury. Beautifully situated by the harbour entrance in Gothenburg, Hotel Riverton is located in the city centre and within walking distance to the Opera, the Casino and the chic shopping scene of Kungsgatan, Avenyn, NK and Nordstan. The charming old town and the picturesque Haga district is within a short stroll.Lindholmen Science Centre is just a ferry ride over, from Stenpiren which is a hub for trams, ferries and bus services, located 250 m from the Hotel. In summer time we highly reccomend to take one of the summer boats departing from Stenprien which takes you out to the gorgeous archipelago of Gothenburg. Within the hotel, there are two restaurants and one lobby bar, including View Skybar & Restaurant which is home to spectacular panoramic views across the Gothenburg harbour. Enjoy one of our award-winning cocktails in the bar or experience our a la carte menu from the 12th floor. Give yourself a break and unwind in our new Serenity Spa when staying with us in Gothenburg. Enjoy the inviting atmosphere and recover in our indoor pool, aromatherapy, steam or dry sauna or relax at your own pace in our Spa Lounge. We also offer a brand-new gym with the latest cardio machines from Precor, free weights and cardio technology from Preva. Please note, the minimum age requirement to enter the Spa facilities is 18 years old, from 16 years old if accompanied an adult. *CASH FREE from 1st Januari 2017*iHotelier/iStay

name: Quality Hotel Waterfront Goteborg
address: Adolf Edelsvards gata 10, 414 51 Gothenburg, Västra Götaland
description: The waterfront is where the sea meets the city, a charming part of Gothenburg that combines the old with the new. At the heart of this area stands the old Carnegie Porter brewery, now a four-star, full-service hotel with character. Hotel Waterfront Goteborg is your port of call for celebrations with family and friends, relaxation and business meetings. Make sure to take a look at our wide selection of activities and entertainment.Choice Hotels

name: Profilhotels Opera
description: This hotel is on Drottningtorget Square, 100 metres from Gothenburg Central Station. It offers free gym access, free in-room WiFi, and Italian and American cuisine. Nordstan Shopping Centre is around the corner. ProfilHotels Opera’s rooms have modern bathrooms and include a hairdryer. Some also offer a 32-inch flat-screen TV, climate control and heated bathroom floors. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant that is open every day or have a cocktail at the bar. The indoor pool and two saunas can be used for an additional fee. The Nordstaden Tram Stop is a 2-minute walk away. Opera Hotel’s guests receive discounts at a nearby car park.

name: Elite Park Avenue Hotel
description: This stylish hotel is ideally located on Gothenburg’s main street, Avenyn, and directly across from the Landvetter Airport Bus Stop. It offers a popular restaurant, an English-style pub and free WiFi access. The Bishop’s Arms serves traditional pub fare from Monday to Saturday, and on Friday and Saturday guests can also eat in the onsite atPark Restaurant. All modern rooms at Elite Park Avenue Hotel feature climate control, a satellite TV and comfortable arm chairs. Free leisure options include a gym, 2 saunas and small relaxation pool. Massages and other treatments can be booked separately. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 10:30 and check-out until 18:00, except during peak periods. Elite Park Avenue is just 200 metres from Gothenburg Art Museum and the City Theatre. There are several private and public paid parking options available.

name: Hotell Onyxen
description: Hotell Onyxen is a small sustainable boutique and lifestyle hotel situated in a 19th-centry buildning. This hotel is directly across from Scandinavium arena. The Swedish Exhibition & Congress Centre is a 5-minute walk away. Our rooms are picturesquely furnished where modern is mixed with a touch of boho and vintage, it feels like coming home when you stay with us. Complimentary tea and coffee are offered all day. Within a 10-minute walk is Liseberg Amusement Park and the city’s main entertainment street, Avenue. The Scandinavium Tram Stop is 100 metres away and takes guests to Gothenburg Central Station in 5 minutes.

name: Comfort Hotel Goteborg
description: The smoke-free Comfort Hotel Goteborg offers a stunning view of the Gothenburg harbor, located conveniently between two bridges connecting Gothenburg mainland to Hisingen Island. Our hotel offers a great location that is minutes from Central Station within the heart of the city, which offers a splendid array of restaurants, shopping, entertainment and attractions like the Opera house, Casino Cosmopol and the Nordstan Shopping Centre. Enjoy hotel amenities like free breakfast, free WiFi, free daily newspapers, free coffee and guest laundry facilities, to name a few. Gothenburg hotels like the Comfort Hotel Goteborg will get you rested and ready for anything. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Live and Stay - Ekmanska
description: Located within less than 1 km of Scandinavium and a 13-minute walk of Swedish Exhibition & Congress Centre in the centre of Gothenburg, Live and Stay Ekmanska provides accommodation with free WiFi and seating area. Private parking is available on site. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Ullevi, Gothenburg Central Station and Nordstan Shopping Mall. The nearest airport is Gothenburg Landvetter Airport, 25 km from Live and Stay Ekmanska.

name: Scandic Rubinen
description: Scandic Rubinen is conveniently located in the city centre and is only a few minutes from the Rohsska Museum. Just a 10 minute walk from Goteborg Brunnsparken, the hotel provides guests with an ideal base while in Gothenburg. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the bar. Facilities include complimentary Wi-Fi, free bicycle rental and a sauna. Just a stone's throw from nearby clubs and bars, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily explore what the local nightlife has to offer. Scandic Rubinen Hotel offers rooms equipped with a hair dryer, plus all the essentials to ensure an enjoyable stay. Each private bathroom also comes with a bath or shower. During their stay at Scandic Rubinen Hotel Gothenburg, guests can enjoy a meal at Ruby Bar, which offers a menu including Mediterranean cuisine. A wide choice of cafés and restaurants are also available in close proximity to the property. Scandic Rubinen is conveniently situated for sightseeing in Gothenburg with Gothenburg Cathedral and Gotaplatsen within a 10-minute walk. Guests can also visit the Universeum and Ullevi.Revato

name: Hotel Vanilla
description: Set in a 19th-century building, this charming property is a 10-minute walk from Gothenburg Central Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, individually decorated guest rooms. Featuring bright and airy décor, all of Hotel Vanilla’s rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Some also have a kitchenette. The property offers a lounge/bistro. During warm weather, guests can enjoy their meal in the cosy courtyard. Brunnsparken Tram Stop is just 3 minutes' walk from Vanilla Hotel. Less than a 5-minute walk away is Nordstan Shopping Centre, as well as the Avenyn and its quality shopping, dining and nightlife. Liseberg Amusement Park is 2 km away.

name: Hotel Örgryte
description: Hotel Örgryte is a 20-minute walk from Liseberg Amusement Park and Scandinavium Arena. It offers free WiFi internet and a fitness centre. All rooms have a flat-screen TV. Örgryte Hotel’s modern rooms feature individual design and décor, including colourful rugs and wood furnishings. All have cable TV and either a sofa or armchairs. Some rooms also include a refrigerator. The lobby bar and restaurant serves a light menu as well as both hot and cold drinks. A generous breakfast buffet is also served there every morning. The popular swimming area around Lake Delsjön is just 10 minutes’ drive away. A local bus stops by the hotel, bringing guests to the city centre and Gothenburg Central Station within 10 minutes.

name: Good Morning+ Göteborg City
description: Featuring a terrace, a restaurant as well as a bar, Good Morning+ Göteborg City is located in the centre of Gothenburg, 1.1 km from Gothenburg Central Station. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.3 km from Ullevi. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units include a wardrobe. A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast is available daily at the property. Popular points of interest near Good Morning+ Göteborg City include Nordstan Shopping Mall, Casino Cosmopol and Skansen Lejonet. The nearest airport is Gothenburg Landvetter Airport, 27 km from the accommodation.

name: Scandic Crown
description: Located in central Gothenburg, this modern hotel is 4 minutes’ walk from Gothenburg Central Station. Nordstan Shopping Centre is 500 metres away. Free WiFi and city views from the top-floor relaxation centre are offered. Scandic Crown’s guest rooms all feature Nordic décor with wooden floors and light wood furnishings. Each room is equipped with a work desk and flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The hotel’s in-house restaurant, Kronan Bat & Matsalar, serves Mediterranean-inspired dishes. Guests can enjoy a drink at the contemporary bar while reading a book from its library. Scandic Crown guests have free access to a hot tub, 2 saunas and fitness centre. Bicycles can be rented on site to explore the area. Ullevi Arena is about a 10-minute walk away from Scandic Crown. Trädgårdsföreningen Park is also nearby, only 200 metres away.

name: Dockyard Hotel
address: Skeppet Ärans Väg 23, 426 71 Västra Frölunda, Västra Götaland
description: Since summer 2023 we have new renovated standard superior rooms in the main building, refreshed conference rooms and restaurant area.Overlooking Gothenburgs historical harbour district, Dockyard Hotel features, flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. On-site facilities include a popular restaurant and a conservatory with waterfront views.The individual designed rooms of Dockyard Hotel are set in 3 different buildings, some of which date back to the 1800s. All buildings are within a short walking distance to the reception. Some rooms offer a view of the Gta River.Nya Varvsalln or Vagnhallen Majorna tram stop is a 15-minute walk away, bringing guests to the Gothenburg city centre within 15 minutes. In addition, free private parking is possible on site.iHotelier/iStay

name: Scandic No.25
description: Conveniently located in the centre of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Gothenburg. It also provides free Wi-Fi, meeting rooms and a 24-hour reception. All the contemporary rooms at Scandic No 25 feature a private bathroom, plus all the essentials for a comfortable stay. Those staying at Scandic No 25 can dine on international and local cuisines at the on-site restaurant, conveniently located for those who want to stay close by for a meal. Each evening, guests are welcome to enjoy a drink in the comfortable lounge bar. Gothenburg's well-known attractions are within close proximity to Scandic No 25, with Nordstan and Gamla Ullevi only 10 minutes away. It is also within walking distance of Garden Society of Gothenburg, Ullevi and Gothenburg Cathedral.Revato

name: Scandic Backadal
description: Scandic Backadal is located in Gothenburg and offers free Wi-Fi and an indoor pool. There is also a fitness centre with a swimming pool. This 4-star hotel offers meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and a playground. The hotel's amenities, such as photocopier, children's play area, and honeymoon suites make this an ideal choice for business travellers, families and couples alike. The rooms are air conditioned and include a desk, an in-room closet and a private bathroom. There are also several rooms available for families. Serving international and local dishes, Scandic Backadal Hotel Gothenburg's relaxed restaurant provides a convenient dining option for those wishing to dine on site. In the evening, guests are welcome to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. Scandic Hotel Backadal provides a convenient place to discover Gothenburg Cathedral and Liseberg, as well as everything the local area has to offer. The hotel's multilingual staff will ensure that every traveller has a comfortable visit.Revato

name: Wow Apartments, Föreningsgatan 9
description: No description found

name: Treetop Spa Hangout & Hotel
description: Located 7 minutes by car from Gothenburg, this hotel offers a 2000 m² big outdoor and indoor spa. Guests have free access to the gym. The individually decorated rooms include free WiFi and a flat screen TV. Private parking is also available free of charge. The property features both indoor and outdoor pools, and a spa that guests can access for a fee. It is possible to book massage. The guests can enjoy the in house restaurant and four different bars. The restaurant offers a breakfast buffet and an internationally inspired à la carte menu. Treetop Spa Hangout & Hotel is 100 metres from Berghöjdsgatan Bus Stop. The No. 42 bus reaches central Gothenburg in 12 minutes.

name: Hotel Villan
description: Situated in the Eriksberg district, just a 10-minute ferry ride from Gothenburg city centre, this intimate waterfront hotel offers rooms with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Hotel Villan is housed in a refurbished wooden building from the early 1900s. The stylish guest rooms have a seating area and a work desk, and each room features a tiled bathroom with underfloor heating.
