Complimentary hot drinks, fruit and candy are available at all times in the lobby. A buffet breakfast is included in the room rates and served each morning. Guests can enjoy a restaurant and bar at the property, and conference rooms are available as well. A shoe polishing service is offered at the hotel. The nearest airport is Gothenburg Landvetter Airport, located 32 km from the property.

name: Hotel Torslanda
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a refrigerator and free WiFi, as well as a flat-screen TV and a coffee/tea maker. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, an electric kettle, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Hotel Isbolaget
description: Located on the beachfront in an island called Donsö, Hotel Isbolaget features a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi. The hotel provides sea views and a terrace. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. At Hotel Isbolaget each room is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a continental or buffet breakfast. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Hotel Isbolaget. Gothenburg is 22 km from the hotel, while Kungsbacka is 41 km away. The nearest airport is Gothenburg Landvetter Airport, 46 km from Hotel Isbolaget.

name: Apple Hotel
description: Located 200 metres from Kaggeledstorget Tram Stop, this hotel is 3.5 km outside central Gothenburg. It offers an on-site lobby bar and a free dinner. Private parking and WiFi are also free. A TV, work desk, as well as a private bathroom are featured in each Apple Hotel & Konferens Göteborg guest room. Guests can work out at Apple Hotel's gym or relax in the outdoor pool during summer. A sauna is also available. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the restaurant. Guests can enjoy meals by the pool during summer. The hotel is a 11-minute tram ride from Liseberg Amusement Park. Sävenäs Train Station is 700 metres from the hotel. Nya Ullevi Stadium is a 5-minute tram ride away.

name: 5:ans Bed & Breakfast
description: This family-run B&B is peacefully located in the residential area of Örgryte. It is less than a 10-minute walk to the Swedish Exhibition & Congress Centre and Liseberg Amusement Park. Both public parking and Wi-Fi are free. 5:ans Bed & Breakfast’s modern and individually decorated rooms have a bright and airy style. Each features a flat-screen TV and shared bathroom facilities. Free coffee and tea is available all day and can be enjoyed in the attractive garden or in the common lounge area. The Göteborg Bäckeliden Tram Stop is situated just in front of the B&B. Gothenburg’s main street, Avenyn, is an 8-minute tram ride away. Guests can also choose to walk to the city centre in about 15 minutes.

name: Linnéplatsens Hotell & Vandrarhem - Hostel
description: This centrally located Gothenburg hostel is across from Slottsskogen Park and the Linnéplatsen bus and tram stops. It offers free Wi-Fi, a communal kitchen and fresh, modern rooms. The basic accommodation at Linnéplatsens Hotell & Vandrarhem all has shared bathroom facilities, as well as views over the park or the street. Some feature a balcony. Communal areas include a dining room and lounge. Linnéplatsens Vandrarhem also provides a daily breakfast buffet. A variety of restaurants, cafés and bars can be found in the surrounding streets. Gothenburg Botanical Garden is 1 km away, while Gothenburg Central Station is less than 3 km from the property.

name: Hotel Heden, BW Signature Collection
description: This hotel is 500 metres from the Avenyn shopping street and 10 minutes’ walk from Liseberg Amusement Park. It offers free in-room WiFi, a free wellness centre. Hotell Heden’s rooms feature typical Scandinavian design and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Heden Hotell's fresh, wellness centre includes a gym and sauna. The lobby has a cosy fireplace area and a bar serving light meals. The Swedish Exhibition Centre is 500 metres from the hotel.

name: Spoton Hotel
description: Spoton Hotel is located in Gothenburg and offers free WiFi throughout the property. Liseberg amusement park is just 150 metres away. Guests can enjoy à la carte and buffet options at the hotel’s sports bar. Gothenburg Central Station is a 30-minute walk away from the hotel, as well as the city center. Each of the modern hotel rooms are soundproofed and features a flat-screen TV, as well as air conditioning. All rooms include a private bathroom with a shower. There is a shared lounge area where guests can relax. There are also 3 microwaves and vending machines on site. The hotel also offers bike hire. Korsvägen is 700 metres away, where the Swedish Exhibition & Congress Centre is located. Scandinavium is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Gothenburg Landvetter Airport, 22 km from the property.

name: Spoton Hostel & Sportsbar
description: Spoton Hostel & Sportsbar is located in Gothenburg, only 150 metres away from the south entrance of Liseberg Amusement Park. The closest tram station is just a 2-minute walk away.The rooms include air conditioning and free WiFi. Bathrooms are either private or shared. At Spoton Hostel & Sportsbar you will find a bar and restaurant serving internationally-inspired dishes. A buffet is offered during lunch and an a la carte menu for dinner. Shared facilities include a kitchen and communal lounge. The hostel is 850 metres from the Swedish Exhibition and Congress Centre, 1.1 km from Scandinavium Arena and 2 km from Ullevi stadium. Gothenburg Central Station is 2.5 km away.

name: Kvibergs Vandrarhem - Hostel
description: This family-run property offers cottages and rooms with free WiFi and parking. It is a 10-minute tram ride from Gothenburg Central Station. Liseberg Theme Park is within 15 minutes’ drive. All of Kviberg’s accommodation options include a seating area and a TV. The cottages feature a private bathroom, terrace and kitchenette. Guest rooms have either private or shared bathroom facilities. During warmer months, guests can enjoy their breakfast on the terrace. Communal facilities include a kitchen, table tennis, and BBQ area in the garden. The Kviberg Tram Stop is just 150 metres from Kvibergs Vandrarhem - Hostel. The scenic area around the property provides opportunities for jogging, cycling and relaxing walks.

name: Kajkanten Vrångö
description: Featuring lake views, Kajkanten Vrångö in Vrångö features accommodation, an open-air bath and barbecue facilities. Free WiFi is offeredthroughout the property. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, sea views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a kettle. Kajkanten Vrångö offers an outdoor fireplace. If you would like to discover the area, hiking is possible in the surroundings and the accommodation can arrange a bicycle rental service.

name: Clarion Hotel Malmö Live
address: Dag Hammarskjolds torg 2, Malmö, Skane Lan
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Malmo Live in Malmo, Sweden near the Malmo Arena, Folkets Park, Rundan sightseeing boats and the Caroli shopping center. Amenities at our hotel include free breakfast, free WiFi, a business center, an exercise room and two restaurants. All guest rooms have desks, hair dryers, mini bars and irons and ironing boards. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues.Choice Hotels

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Temperance
description: The pet-friendly Clarion Collection Hotel Temperance is perfectly located for both business and leisure travelers, just minutes from train stations and public transportation. We also provide easy access to many local attractions, including the Casino Cosmopol, Malmohus Castle, Malmo Theatre and the award-winning Turning Torso skyscraper. Enjoy hotel amenities like free organic breakfast, a light evening buffet, an exercise room and sauna, copy services, meeting space and coffee, tea and fruit 24 hours a day, to name a few. Guest rooms come with hair dryers, cable TVs, irons and ironing boards. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Elite Hotel Esplanade
description: Elite Hotel Esplanade is located beside the Lilla Torg Square in the heart of Malmö. It offers 24 hour room service and air conditioned rooms with luxury bedding and free WiFi. All the stylishly decorated rooms at Elite Hotel Esplanade feature a 49-inch flat screen Smart TV. Each room has a minibar and tea and coffee making facilities. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are available at Quan, an Asian eatery where you can unwind and relax. Quan serves the hotel's breakfast buffet as well as a well composed à la carte menu with clean and healthy Asian flavors. American-style dishes are offered at T.G.I. Friday’s restaurant, located next door. (Please note that, Quan is closed for summer holidays till 14th of August, 2023). Guests can socialize in the hotel bar after working out in the fitness room. Slottsparken Park, with the Malmöhus Castle, is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Malmö Central Station can be found 450 metres away.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Noble House
description: The Best Western Plus Hotel Noble House is a newly renovated hotel in down town Malmo. The most exciting hotel in Malmo is situated at Gustav Adolfs Square. Here you will find a mixture of modern design, classical art and personal service, which creates an atmosphere you are longing to return to. You will find the best shopping in town, just around the corner, nearby you also can enjoy our beautiful parks and canals. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Quality Hotel the Mill
description: Opening January 02, 2019 Quality Hotel The Mill offers accommodation in the shopping, sightseeing district of Malmo. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the citys must-see destinations. The Hotel has 224 well-designed and comfortably furnished rooms, all equipped with hair dryer and ironing board. 10 conference rooms with a total capacity of 150 persons.Choice Hotels

name: Quality Hotel View
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our smoke-free Quality Hotel View in Malmo, SE near the Malmo Arena, Mobila shopping center, Moderna Street, Folkets Park and the Malmohus Castle. Our smoke-free hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free breakfast, free WiFi, an exercise room, a restaurant and a business center, to name a few. Guest rooms come with sofa sleepers, hair dryers and irons and ironing boards. Get more value at our Quality Hotel View. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Good Morning+ Malmö
description: This hotel is situated 3 km from Malmö Exhibition & Conference Center. Rooms are modern with hardwood floors, flat-screen TVs and free WiFi access. Swedbank Stadium is 600 metres away. A work desk is featured in all the brightly decorated rooms at Good Morning+ Malmö. Each room has a fully-tiled bathroom with shower. Some rooms have tea/coffee facilities, bathrobes and slippers. A continental buffet breakfast with local specialities is available each morning. In the evening, the restaurant offers a range of dishes on an a la carte. Meals and drinks can be enjoyed in the garden during summer. Guests enjoy free access to the gym, sauna and relaxation area. Private parking is possible in the garage or on the outdoor deck. A bus stop is found 250 metres from Good Morning+ Malmö. Central Malmö is a 10-minute bus ride away. Copenhagen Kastrup Airport is 23 km away, while Malmö-Sturup Airport is 24 km from the hotel.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Malmo
description: Situated under a 10-minute walk from Malmo Central Station, Radisson Blu Hotel Malmö offers guests a convenient base while visiting Malmo. It is conveniently positioned for guests wanting to visit local attractions. This modern hotel features a number of amenities, such as a 24-hour reception, a concierge and a currency exchange. It is dog-friendly and has disabled parking for those travelling with a car. Just minutes from nearby clubs and bars, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover the local nightlife. Rooms at Radisson Blu Hotel Malmo provide a stylish space to unwind, complete with a mini bar. Hot drinks can be brewed with the complimentary tea and coffee supplies, and savoured in the comfort of the room's sitting area. Radisson Blu Hotel Malmo's in-house restaurant, Thott´s, is a popular place to have a meal. A choice of cafés and restaurants can also be found in the area. Radisson Blu Hotel Malmö is an ideal base to explore nearby Malmo Arena and Frihamnen. Guests are also able to visit Malmo University and Malmo Concert Hall.Revato

name: Scandic Triangeln
description: Located in Malmo, Scandic Triangeln is an easy drive from Malmo Arena and provides public parking on site. It has a spa and wellness centre, as well as free Wi-Fi, free bicycle rental and a sauna. After a day of exploring the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They provide a flat-screen TV, a desk and a private bathroom. In-house dining options include Lean Grill & Bar, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and cafés in the area. Scandic Triangeln is close to Triangeln Railway Station, making it easy for guests to explore Malmo and its surrounding areas. The local neighbourhood is also famous for its shops and boutiques.Revato

name: Elite Hotel Savoy
description: This hotel is set in a historic building, directly opposite Malmö Central Station and the airport bus stop. It offers free WiFi, sauna access and a popular breakfast buffet. Elite Hotel Savoy’s rooms feature cable TV, tea/coffee facilities and luxury toiletries. Some rooms include street or courtyard views. The on-site Bishop’s Arms pub stocks whiskies and beers from around the world. The Södergatan shopping street is just a few minutes' walk from Elite Savoy. Staff will gladly offer tips on local restaurants and attractions.

name: Elite Plaza Hotel Malmö
address: Gustav Adolfs Torg 49, 201 80 Malmö, Skane Lan
description: Set in an elegant 19th-century building, this hotel is next to Gustav Adolf Square and 700 metres from Malmö Central Station. WiFi, gym and sauna access are free. Tea/coffee facilities, cable TV and air conditioning are standard at Elite Plaza Hotel Malmö. All rooms feature modern decor, furniture and bathrooms. The Bishop’s Arms Pub serves traditional pub dishes. In addition, guests can choose from a variety of selected beers and whiskies. Elite Plaza Hotel's central location provides easy access to culture, shopping and entertainment. Malmö Castle and its beautiful gardens are only 500 metres away.

name: First Hotel Jörgen Kock
description: This hotel is about 5 minutes' walk from Malmö Central Station. It is also less than 10 minutes’ walk from Malmö’s main square and shopping area. It offers free Wi-Fi. First Hotel Jörgen Kock’s guest rooms all feature modern furnishings and cable TV. A seating area and work desk are also offered. The bistro-style restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and light evening meals. Jörgen Kock’s cosy bar has an open fireplace for added comfort. Hotel staff can recommend restaurants and stores nearby. Västra Hamnen harbour and Dockan are about 700 metres from the hotel. Guests can enjoy a round of golf at Malmö Golf Club, 5 km away.

name: The More Hotel Mazetti
description: This eco-friendly hotel is within 5 minutes’ walk of Triangeln Station and the vibrant Möllevången district. It offers modern, stylish apartments with free internet, gym and sauna access. The More Hotel is located in an old chocolate factory dating back to the late 1800s. Each apartment includes a kitchen, seating area, tiled bathroom and cable TV. Guests can utilise hotel services such as laundry and dry cleaning. Regional buses depart from Bergsgatan, right next to The More Hotel. Malmö Central Station is about 20 minutes’ walk away.

name: MJ's
description: MJ's is located only 50 metres from Lilla Torg Square in central Malmö. This hotel offers free WiFi and rooms with a seating area and flat-screen TV. All rooms at MJ's feature a work desk and beds from Grange, as well as wall-to-wall carpeting. Breakfast is served in MJ’s fresh breakfast garden. Guests are also welcome to enjoy a drink in the bar. Several restaurants are available in the immediate area. The King’s Park with the Malmöhus Castle is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Malmö Central Station is 300 metres away.

name: Havshotellet
description: Located in Malmö just 50 metres from the sea side, this marine themed hotel offers guest rooms with décor inspired by historic and contemporary ships and boats. Limhamn marina is right in front of Havshotellet, and from some rooms you can also see the Öresund bridge. Central Malmö is 15 minute's drive away. Every room is equipped with YouBeds which firmness can be easily adjusted according to guests’ own preference via a remote control. Room facilities include a refrigerator, coffee/tea facilities and complimentary chocolate. The bathrooms have comfortable underfloor heating, a shower and free toiletries. A breakfast buffet is served daily in Havshotellet's cosy dining room, which features photos of Limhamn's history. Free parking and WiFi are available for guests. Staff can gladly provide tips about the surroundings and restaurant recommendations. Strandparken is located across the street from this hotel and offers walking trails for leisure. Sibbarp beach is just 900 metres away. Emporia Shopping Centre is 5 km away, while Copenhagen Airport is 28 km away.

name: Ohboy Hotell
description: Ohboy Hotell is located in Malmö and offers stylish apartments with a kitchen and free WiFi. Triangeln Shopping Centre is 2.3 km from the property. The kitchen includes a dishwasher, kitchenware and microwave. The private bathroom comes with a shower. Towels and bed linen are included. Ohboy Hotell offers guests free use of 1 bicycle per room, when booked in advance. Malmo Arena is 6 km from Ohboy Hotell. The nearest airport is Malmö Airport, 26 km from the property.

name: Camp Ripan
description: Surrounded by mountain nature, the family-owned Camp Ripan.is a 10-minute car ride from Kiruna city centre. It offers free WiFi, in-room flat-screen TVs and traditional, seasonal Swedish and Sami food. Parking is free on site. Spread across 3 buildings, Ripan’s cosy, chalet-style rooms have private entrances and bathrooms with showers. Many offer kitchenettes and convenient private ski storage. Restaurant Ripan features local Nordic ingredients including reindeer and fish. The Aurora Spa can be accessed for a surcharge. Ski tracks and hiking trails are right next door. Snowmobiling, ice fishing and dog sledding are popular in winter. Summer leisure options include horse riding, guided city tours and hiking. Camp Ripan is certified as an environmentally friendly hotel.

name: Best Western Hotel Arctic Eden
description: The Best Western Hotel Arctic Eden is a Sami inspired family-owned hotel with a big heart and focus on the guest. The building was from the beginning a school but has been converted into a modern hotel of high class where style and design have been tastefully combined with today´s demands for comfort and service. The inspiration for the hotel genuine interior comes from the Sami culture and the Sapmi Region. The ownerd bought in 2006 the old school Norrmalmskolan and renovated it to the hotel that we proudly can offer our guests today. The hotel is centrally located within walking distance to the train, bus stations and city center. We offer our guests comfortable and bright airy rooms that are well suited for vacation as well as for work. All rooms are tastefully decorated with Sami inspired art. The hotel has two restaurants on site, PUB eden and Arctic Thai & Grill. As a guest at the Best Western Hotel Arctic Eden, you also have access to the hotel´s relaxation area with sauna and swimming pool. Wireless Internet is available in the entire hotel and is free of charge.bestwestern.com

name: Spis Hotel & Hostel
description: SPiS Hotel & Hostel is just 150 metres from Kiruna’s main street, Föreningsgatan. It provides free WiFi and a free sauna and relaxation area. All hotel rooms have a flat-screen TV, a fully-equipped shared kitchen and shared bathroom facilities located on each floor. Guests have free access to shared laundry facilities. The lobby offers a gift shop and a selection of books and magazines. Kiruna Bus Station is about 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Kiruna Airport is 6.5 km away. On-site parking is free.

name: Camp Alta Kiruna
description: Set in Kiruna in the Norrbotten region and Kiruna Bus Station reachable within 15 km, Camp Alta Kiruna offers accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, a private beach area and free private parking. Certain units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, washing machine and a kettle, completed with a kitchen. The camping offers a terrace. During the winter season, the property arranges snow mobile- and Aurora tours, as well as dog sledding. There is a garden with a barbecue at this property and guests can go hiking and skiing nearby. LKAB Visitor Centre is 19 km from Camp Alta Kiruna, while Kiruna Folkets Hus is 15 km from the property. The nearest airport is Kiruna, 12 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Abisko Turiststation Stf
description: No description found

name: Piilijärvi Camping
description: Set in Gällivare in the Norrbotten region, Piilijärvi Camping offers accommodation with free private parking and a garden. A patio with lake views is offered in all units. Guests at the camping can enjoy hiking and skiing nearby. Snowmobile and dog sled tours are offered on site at an extra cost. Guests can also use the on-site barbecue facilities. The nearest airport is Kiruna Airport, 60 km from Piilijärvi Camping. The property is 45 min from Gällivare and 45 min from Kiruna with car.

name: Kuttainen Lodge
description: Kuttainen Lodge is located in Karesuando. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hostel provides river views and a children's playground. Guest rooms in the hostel are equipped with a coffee machine. All rooms include bed linen. A continental breakfast is available daily at Kuttainen Lodge. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Karesuando, like fishing. The nearest airport is Kittilä Airport, 141 km from Kuttainen Lodge.

name: Donners Hotell
description: No description found

name: Börsen Apartment Suites
description: With a stay at Börsen Apartment Suites in Visby (Innerstaden), you'll be steps from Gotlands Art Museum and Almedalen. Featured amenities include a business center, express check-out, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Visby? This hotel has facilities measuring 2691 square feet (250 square meters), including a meeting room.Hotels.com

name: Hotell St Clemens
description: This charming, eco-friendly hotel is just inside Visby’s medieval city walls, 350 metres from Stora Torget square. It offers 2 furnished courtyards, free Wi-Fi and cosy, individually designed rooms. Classic décor, wooden floors and fridges are standard at Hotell St Clemens. Each room has a seating area and cable TV. The Botanical Gardens and Visby Cathedral are within 2 minutes' walk. St Clemens’s central location provides easy access to shopping, cafés and bars. Staff are happy to recommend or book local restaurants.

name: Hotell Villa Borgen
description: Set in Visby’s UNESCO-listed medieval town centre, this hotel offers free WiFi and an inner courtyard. Free tea, coffee, cookies and fruit are offered in the lobby. Minibars and TVs are standard room features at Hotell Villa Borgen. Umbrellas are included in each room as well. Staff will gladly recommend local restaurants and bars. Situated on the street Adelsgatan, Villa Borgen provides easy access to arts and crafts shops and cute cafés. Visby Marina is 500 metres away.

name: Hotell Strandporten
description: Kalk Hotel is boutique hotel located on Strandgatan, in a beautiful building from the 17th century, carefully renovated with a stylish interior and Gotland details. There are 21 rooms, all of which offer lovely light, comfortable beds from Jensen and luxurious bathrooms with limestone details from Gotland. Some rooms have a balcony with a view of the city, the sea and the beautiful park Almedalen -Perfect for enjoying the first cup of coffee in the morning, a siesta after a lovely day in Visby or why not a glass of sparkling wine before dinner at one of the town's fantastic restaurants. Breakfast buffet: We want to give you the best possible start to the day which is why we spend some special love on our breakfast buffet. For us, sustainability is important and that there is something for everyone, even if you have an allergy or have a special diet. It does not prevent us from serving you a delicious breakfast with a healthy twist. Among the freshly baked breads you will find our homemade müsli and granola, energy shots and much more. The breakfast buffet is served weekdays 07:00 - 10:00 and holidays 08:00 - 11:00. During the summer always till 11:00. The entire hotel is non-smoking. The hotel does not accept cash payment. We are looking forward at having you as our guest. Warm welcome!

name: Ljungs Fem Rum
description: On the popular island destination of Gotland and just 1.5 km from Visby golf club, Ljungs Fem Rum offers modern rooms with free WiFi. Guests can enjoy a large garden with BBQ facilities. Ljungs Fem Rum consists of accommodation with private bathrooms and a private entrance, each with its own patio or balcony. Each room comes with a kitchenette, a TV, and a sofa-bed in the living/dining area. There is a communal breakfast room at the property, with homemade bread baked daily. The shared living area has sofas and a TV as well as a fireplace. Located in Västergarn, there is a swimming beach within 10 minutes’ walk of the property. Visby town is 23 km to the north, with buses running regularly to a bus stop just 50 metres from Ljungs Fem Rum.

name: Scandic Visby
description: This harbour side hotel is just across the street from Gotland’s ferry terminal and 10 minutes’ walk from Visby’s medieval city centre, itself a UNESCO World Heritage Site. WiFi internet access is free in all rooms. Guests enjoy free gym, pool and sauna access. Bookable spa treatments are available for a fee. Each guest room at Scandic Visby offers a TV and private bathroom. Many of the ground-floor rooms have private furnished patios. Guests can book boat tickets and rent bicycles at Visby Scandic’s reception. Young children will appreciate the on-site playground. The lobby bar serves snacks and drinks. Guests can enjoy the poolside Restaurant Koggen year-round. Private parking spaces are found on-site. additional cost will apply. Within a 5-minute drive are attractions such as Visby Museum and the 12th-century cathedral.

name: Snäck Annex
description: This budget hotel is 850 metres from Gotland’s popular Snäckviken Beach and only a 7-minute drive from Visby. It offers free private parking, two tennis courts and outdoor pools. Dating back to the 1950s, the simple rooms at Snäck Annex have a small bathroom with a shower. All rooms include a refrigerator and free bed linen and towels, and many offer sea views. Snäck Annex’s common room has a kitchenette, and guests can also relax on the surrounding lawn. Other facilities include a tennis court, an outdoor pool and a kiddie pool. Buses to Visby city centre depart from nearby, while Visby Airport is only a 3-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Visby Gustavsvik
description: This holiday village lies by the beach, 3 km north of the medieval town of Visby. It offers parking, a beach sauna and a communal laundry room. Guests can choose between self-catering apartments or guest rooms. The apartments at Visby Gustavsvik have a kitchen and a private patio. Guests rooms include a patio, TV and a private bathroom with shower. During summer, guests can enjoy dinners at the on-site restaurant Viken. Gustavsvik’s facilities include bicycle rental and a barbeque area. The surrounding area offers hiking trails and jogging tracks as well as activities such as football and volleyball. Guests can borrow sports equipment at the reception.

name: Värdshuset Lindgården
description: This hotel is located within the medieval city walls of Visby and offers free WiFi access and an on-site restaurant. Almedalen Park is 150 metres away. Guest rooms at Värdshuset Lindgården have a private entrance and views of the town or garden. Each room includes a flat-screen TV, desk and a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The restaurant serves traditional Swedish dishes and has a large selection of wines. Outdoor serving in the garden is possible in nice weather. During summer, live music events are arranged. Lindgården is located on Strandgatan Street, which offers several cafés, bars and restaurants. Kallbadhuset Beach is a 2-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Helgeand Wisby
description: This hotel is housed in a medieval, 13th-century building, only 100 metres from Visby Cathedral. Free WiFi is offered. Each room at Hotel Helgeand Wisby is individually decorated with designer furniture in solid wood and medieval-themed interior. All have a work desk and satellite TV. Some also feature a luxurious in-room bathtub. Shared facilities at Helgeand Wisby include an inviting lounge bar with an open fireplace and comfortable armchairs. In summer, guests can relax in the garden. The hotel is centrally located in the inner city of Visby with walking distance of 2-10 minutes to all the restaurants, parks and to the seafront.

name: Magnolia House Sollentuna
description: Located 10 km from Friends Arena, Magnolia House Sollentuna provides accommodation with a garden, a terrace and a lift for your convenience. Complimentary WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Each unit features a patio, a kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area and a flat-screen TV, while the private bathroom includes a shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and fridge are also available, as well as a kettle. The aparthotel offers a picnic area. There is a shared lounge at this property and guests can go hiking nearby. Sergels Torg Square is 15 km from Magnolia House Sollentuna, while Stockholm Central Station is 15 km away. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Stockholm Ulriksdal
description: Explore the fascinating city of Stockholm from modern AC by Marriott Stockholm Ulriksdal. Our 4 star hotel is located in Solna, 10 minutes from Stockholm city center, and perfect for business meetings and events. It is strategically located near public transport and walking distance to Friends Arena, Arenastaden och Mall of Scandinavia. Our pet friendly hotel offers an urban, modern, high-style design for a feeling of harmony and creativity. Featuring 223 hotel rooms and suites, AC by Marriott Stockholm Ulriksdal also offers meeting rooms, a bar and restaurant PicPoc by Pontus Frithiof, and Viitalize Gym and Wellness. The conference center includes 3 multi-functional meeting rooms with the capacity to host 110 guests in the largest meeting room. The meeting rooms are all equipped with the latest technology, necessary equipment as well as hi-speed WiFi for a successful business event. Relax in our Nordic hotel spa and fitness center with saunas, pools, and treatments.Marriott

name: Grand Hotell Hörnan
description: Grand Hotell Hörnan is set in an early 20th-century building, 400 metres from Uppsala Central Station. All rooms include a flat-screen TV, a seating area and free WiFi access. The comfortably designed rooms at Hotell Hörnan offer old-world charm and a work desk. Some include a private balcony with city views. All bathrooms are equipped with a shower and hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s stylish dining room. Drinks and light meals are available in the cosy Lobby Bar. The hotel is situated 50 metres from Kungsängsgatan, Uppsala’s main pedestrian street. Uppsala Cathedral is located 500 metres from the hotel.

name: Best Western Hotel Baltic
description: The Best Western® Hotel Baltic is situated in a beautiful central location in Sundsvall, - close to the harbor, central station (600 meters), shopping, restaurants and the casino. Over the last few years the hotel has undergone careful renovation in keeping with its superb standards and comfort, and appeals to both business travelers and people on the lookout for somewhere special to stay when on holiday. The hotel has a total of 94 hotel rooms and four apartments, a restaurant and a modern hotel gym with a sauna/relax area. The conference facilities date back to the late 19th century. This beautiful room is 250 square meters in area, renovated in 2013 and enjoys views over the harbor. Now its primary function is as a source of inspiration at meetings, conferences, training courses and other get togethers. Welcome to the Best Western Hotel Baltic in Sundsvall.bestwestern.com

name: Clarion Hotel Gillet
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Gillet in Uppsala, SE near Uppsala University, Fyris River, Uppsala Botanical Garden, Uppsala Cathedral and Old Uppsala. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast, two restaurants, an exercise room and sauna, copy services, conference facilities and an indoor heated pool. All guest rooms have TVs, coffee makers, desks and hair dryers. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Uppsala hotels like our Clarion Hotel Gillet. Pet charge, 250 kr per stay. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Polhem Bed & Breakfast
description: Situated in Falun in the Dalarna region and Falun Mine reachable within 200 metres, Polhem Bed & Breakfast features accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, ski-to-door access and free private parking. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. At Polhem Bed & Breakfast you will find a restaurant serving local cuisine. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. If you would like to discover the area, skiing, cycling and hiking are possible in the surroundings and Polhem Bed & Breakfast can arrange a bicycle rental service. Lugnet Sports Centre is 4.4 km from the bed and breakfast, while Carl Larsson House is 15 km from the property. The nearest airport is Borlange Airport, 26 km from Polhem Bed & Breakfast.

name: Clarion Hotel Sense
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Sense in Lulea, SE near the COOP Arena, Kulturens Hus, World UNESCO Heritage Gammelstad and the Lulea Tekniska Universitetet. Amenities at our hotel include free breakfast, high-speed Internet and meeting space. All guest rooms have flat-screen TVs, desks, mini bars, pillow-top mattresses, hair dryers and irons and ironing boards. Some rooms feature robes. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues.Choice Hotels

name: Hoom Park & Hotel
description: Just 5 minutes’ walk from Ulriksdal Station, this modern hotel is 10 minutes’ train ride from Stockholm Central Station. It offers free WiFi access and guest rooms with flat-screen cable TVs. Friends Arena is 3 km away, while Kista Convention Center is 5 km from the property. The air-conditioned guest rooms at HOOM Park & Hotel feature wooden floors. Many include a seating area. The in-house à la carte restaurant serves Scandinavian cuisine with an international twist. The hotel bar is a nice place for an after-dinner drink. The E4 Highway is just 100 metres from the hotel. Arlanda Airport is a 25-minute drive away.

name: Clarion Hotel Winn
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Winn in Gavle, SE near the University College of Gavle, Baltic Sea, Swedish Railway Museum, Mackmyra Whisky distillery and the Valbo Shopping Centre. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include free breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant, free weekday newspapers, an indoor heated pool, meeting space and a business center with copy, print and fax services. All guest rooms have standard room amenities. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no extra bedding is required. Please note that all Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are non-smoking properties. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Stora Hotellet, BW Premier Collection
description: Umea has a long history as a seafaring town. During the 1800s ship building and sea travel were big business and the seaman’s mission constructed an impressive building down by the river, a combination of mission house and hotel. When the Stora Hotellet opened in 1895 it was a place where those two worlds met. This was Umea’s major hotel for over a century and extensive refurbishment was carried out prior to the reopening to mark Umea being name European Capital of Culture 2014. The hotel stands once again in its seafaring finery, ready to welcome guests for another 100 years. The Stora Hotellet, BW Premier Collection has 82 unique rooms that run from spacious suites to compact cabins. There is also a restaurant, bar, library and conference rooms.bestwestern.com

name: Clarion Hotel Sundsvall
description: A top hotel in Sundsvall in a new part of the city, which is still very centrally located and also very close to the Selangers river. We are inspired by the Sundsvall stone town, and by the Medelpad landscape stone, the Alnoit and also by the contrast between the light and dark seasons. The hotel provides 270 rooms, restaurants, bars, rooftop terrace, spa and a large conference area.Choice Hotels

name: Hotel Mölndals Bro
description: Located 200 meters from Mölndals Station, Hotel Mölndals Bro offers free Wi-Fi and rooms with cable TV. Amusement Park Liseberg and the Swedish Fair are a 5-minute tram ride away. A buffet breakfast is served daily and is served in the hotel's restaurant ROY, in the building next door. ROY is open 24 hours a day and also offers entertainment. As a hotel guest, you always have free entrance and a discount on live music events. Contact the hotel for room reservations and information about our gigs. The rooms at Mölndals Bro Hotel have a seating area, a minibar and a private bathroom with a shower or bathtub. The hotel also offers its guests free "Swedish fika". Mölndal's museum is 1 km away and Mölndal Galleria with around 70 shops is 200 meters from the property. Landvetter Airport is 18 minutes' drive from the hotel.

name: Hotell Zäta Longstay
description: This city centre hotel is within 10 minutes’ walk of Östersund Central Station and the Storsjön lake. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi internet access. Hotell Zäta Longstay’s guest rooms have a TV and a bathroom with a shower. All rooms include a seating area. All rooms are equipped with a fridge and a microwave. A self service kitchen can be used free of charge. Guests arriving by car in winter months might appreciate Zäta’s heated garage. Fees apply, and a reservation is required. Hotell Zäta Longstay is located close to shopping, bars and restaurants. The cultural history museum, Jamtli, is 1.5 kilometres from the hotel.

name: Park Hotel Linköpings Fawlty Towers
description: Set in a charming 1880s building, this hotel is directly opposite Linköping Central Station. Guests can enjoy free WiFi as well as free 24-hour, self-service tea/coffee in the lobby. Private parking is available at an extra cost. The individually decorated guest rooms at Park Hotel Linköping Fawlty Towers have triple-glazed windows and a flat-screen TV. All include a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast with a extensive selection of teas is served each morning. Guests can also enjoy free access to First Class Gym, directly across the street. SAAB Arena is a 5-minute walk from the hotel, while the city square is about a 7-minute walk away. Staff will gladly recommend restaurants, stores and attractions, many just 7 minutes’ walk away.

name: Elite Hotel Knaust
description: Elite Hotel Knaust is located in a historic 19th century building in central Sundsvall, just 100 metres from Sundsvall Museum. It offers charming rooms with free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All the rooms at the elegant Hotel Knaust have a safety deposit box, work desk and minibar. Many rooms include a seating area and high ceilings with stucco works. Breakfast and lunch can be enjoyed in the stylish Spegelsalen Hall, which also serves as a venue for various events. The Bishops Arms Pub serves light meals and a wide selection of beer and whisky. The small relaxation area offers a selection of training equipment and a sauna free for guests’ use. The hotel is an attraction in itself, featuring a stylish marble staircase from 1890. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 11:00. Stora Torget Square is situated 200 metres from the hotel. Centralen night club is a 3-minute walk away.

name: Clarion Hotel Grand Ostersund
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Grand Ostersund in Ostersund, SE near Mid Sweden University, Storsjon Lake, the Jamtli museum, Froso Zoo and Froso Kyrka. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast buffet, wireless Internet access, a restaurant, an indoor heated pool and meeting and convention facilities. All guest rooms have trouser presses, hair dryers, irons and ironing boards and desks. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Ostersund hotels like our Clarion Hotel Grand Ostersund. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet charge: 200 kr per stay.Choice Hotels

name: Livin Station Hotel
description: Livin Station Hotel is situated right by Örebro Central Station. Örebro University Hospital is 800 metres from the property. Each room has a flat-screen TV. Certain units include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. You will find a kettle in the room. The rooms come with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. You will find a gift shop at the property. Conventum.is 1.4 km from Livin Station Hotel, while Örebro Castle is 750 metres away.

name: City Central Hotel Örebro
description: City Central Hotel Örebro is 5 minutes' walk from Örebro Central Station, 500 metres from Örebro Castle and 2 minutes' walk from Universitetssjukhuset. The hotel offers modern rooms with private facilities. Guests enjoy free in-room WiFi. All rooms feature a TV. Stortorget Main Square is a 10-minute walk away. Svampen Water Tower, with views of Örebro, is 1.5 km away from City Central Hotel Örebro.

name: Bauergården
description: Located next to Bunn Lake in Gränna, 10 km from Grenna Museum, Bauergården features a common terrace where you can enjoy views of the garden. A communal sauna offers relaxation. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Some room have outdoor seating. The restaurant menu offers Nordic-style dishes. A range of activities is offered in the area, such as fishing and canoeing, or you can simply find a spot on the lake beach. The nearest airport is Linköping City Airport, 86 km from the property.

name: Piteå Stadshotell
description: This historic hotel is located in central Piteå, only 5 minutes’ walk from the bus station. It offers a restaurant and on-site gym. WiFi is free in all rooms. Piteå Stadshotell was built in 1906. The individually decorated guest rooms have modern tiled bathrooms and flat-screen TVs. Some rooms have a bath. Restaurant Fiore serves Italian cuisine in a light and airy venue. Free tea, coffee and cakes are available at all times in the lobby. From Monday to Friday, a lunch offer with prices starting from SEK 115 is available. The hotel bar regularly hosts music and entertainment. Hotel guests mostly enjoy free entry. Activities such as wine or chocolate tasting can also be arranged. Within easy walking distance of Piteå Stadshotell are attractions such as the Rådhustorget square, Piteå Museum and 2 shopping centres. The hotel offers private parking at en extra surcharge including access to power outlets. Piteå Golf Club is 3 km away.

name: Profilhotels President
description: ProfilHotels President is 300 metres from Norrköping Central Station. It offers a sauna and free Wi-Fi. The Cactus Park is 200 metres away. All rooms at President Hotel include a work desk, tea/coffee facilities and comfortable Carpe Diem beds. President's lobby bar is a pleasant setting for a relaxing drink. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Relaxation options include a sauna. Drottninggatan shopping street is 5 minutes’ walk away. The Museum of Work is an 8-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hotel Gio, BW Signature Collection
description: Welcome to the home of Gio! April 1st 2020, Hotel Gio, BW Signature Collection opens the doors to a meeting place for the ones who wants to live, eat, socialize and work in a warm and undemanding environment. At Gios, you can stay for a short while, or for a longer visit, eat relly good food at Mama Gios, have a drink at the terrace or work in the living room. At Gios you will come home to a grand family. In the large living room there are possibilities to work or socialize with friends. That is why we call Gio "the social hub hotel". Here you will also find Mama Gio, a restaurant that focuses on straight forward hospitailty and simple, well cooked food that tastes really, really good. Gios rooms has an ambience of Italy in the 50's, both the standard double rooms and the slightly larger longstay rooms for those who wants to stay a little longer, or comes back time and again. There are also family rooms that comfortably houses the whole family when needed. Hotel Gio, BW Signature Collection is located right next to the park of Haga, where parts of the royal family resides, and within walking distance you will fiend Friends arena, Mall of Scandinavia and the Karolinska hospital. Right outside the hotel, the buses to Stockholm centre and Arlanda airport has a stop. The center of Stockholm is reached within 12 minutes, and Arlanda airport within 40 minutes. In the living room there is room to work or just to relax, or why not mingle with your colleagues? We can arrange mingle or events for up to 150 people, but we also have meeting rooms if you need a smaller space. After 60 years of office workers walking the stairs, through the doors and looking at the artwork, we now open the doors for the guests of Hotel Gio, BW Signature Collection.bestwestern.com

name: Furunäset Hotell och Konferens
description: Located in a 19th-century building in Piteå, Furunäset Hotell & Konferens offers free WiFi. The building is designed by the famous Swedish architect Axel Kumlien, who also designed the Grand Hotel in Stockholm. Many of the spacious guest rooms face the courtyard, and some offer views of the beautiful park opposite the hotel. Each room has a seating area and work desk. Storforsen, one of Europe's largest free-flowing waterfall, is 80 minutes' drive away. Furunäset Marina is located only 100 metres from the hotel. Central Piteå is less than 3 km away. The hotel has free parking.

name: Best Western Hedasen
description: Welcome to the friendly Best Western Hedasen, located by the Sandviken Golf Course, 300 meters from Lake Storsjon and three kilometers from central Sandviken. All rooms have a work desk, an electric kettle and a television with DVD player. DVD films can be borrowed for free at the front desk. The hotel offers and indoor pool, sauna, free parking and free Wi-Fi. Central Sandviken is only 3 kilometers from the hotel.bestwestern.com

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Bolinder Munktell
description: The Clarion Collection Htl Bolinder Munktell is ideally located on Lake Malaren, within walking distance of the Munktells Museum. We are also minutes from Malardalen University, Tingsgarden Glasbruk garden, Eskilstuna Art Museum and the Parken Zoo. Enjoy hotel amenities like free organic breakfast, a light evening buffet, free wireless Internet, a sauna, afternoon tea, meeting space, guest laundry facilities and coffee, tea and fruit 24 hours a day, to name a few. Guest rooms have cable TVs. Irons and ironing boards are available upon request. Book a room with us today.Choice Hotels

name: Quality Hotel The Box
description: Get more for your hard-earned money at our hotel in Linkoping, SE. You will love our convenient location, friendly service and more. Amenities include free WiFi, free hot breakfast, meeting space, a fitness center and a restaurant and bar. Guest rooms feature refrigerators and microwaves, premium bedding, work desks, flat-screen TVs and coffee makers. Our hotel in Linkoping is near the Linkoping Arena, Saab Arena, Max Burgers, Rico Restaurant and BK Living Room Restaurant. At our pet-friendly Quality Hotel, our affordable rates and central location lets you focus on making your trip a memorable one. Plus, you can earn rewards, including free nights and gift cards, with Our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Björkbackens Karaktärshotell
description: Just 3 km from Astrid Lindgren World Theme Park, Björkbackens Karaktärshotell offers free parking and rooms with free wired internet. Vimmerby Station is 1.5 km away. A summer water park is also found on site that guests can enjoy for an additional fee. All rooms have a TV, heated bathroom floors and soft, Swedish-made beds. Some rooms are named after historical characters from around Vimmerby. A sauna can be found on site. Children will enjoy the 12-hole minigolf course and playground. BBQ facilities are available in the garden. The large restaurant at Björkbackens serves lunch and is decorated in a charming, typically Smålandian style. Evening meals can be enjoyed in the lobby restaurant.

name: Comfort Hotel Arlanda Airport Terminal
description: A new hotel opened Feb 2020 with 503 rooms, a large lobby with working stations, 24/7 bar/reception with lunch and dinner service, a modern gym, laundromat and 4 meeting rooms up to 24 persons. The top floor bar, Anorak has great views over the airport. The hotel is located next to SkyCity and 5 minute walking distance from terminal 4, 5 and the Arlanda Express train station. Indoor parking is available on site.Choice Hotels

name: Elite Stadshotellet Eskilstuna
description: This riverside hotel is 500 metres from Eskilstuna Central Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, gym and sauna access. All rooms feature flat-screen TVs and minibars. Work desks and wardrobes are standard at Elite Stadshotellet Eskilstuna. Each room has bright, modern décor. Some include a sofa while some have wooden floors. The British-style Bishop’s Arms bar offers numerous whiskies and craft beers, plus classic pub dishes. The hotel restaurant offers an international à la carte menu. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 11:00. Elite Eskilstuna is 3 minutes’ walk from shopping, cafés and a cinema. Eskilstuna Art Museum is 1 km away.

name: Leopold Boutique Hotel
description: Set in Östersund, Jämtland region, Leopold Boutique Hotel is situated 9.3 km from Östersund-Frösö GK. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 800 metres from Mid Sweden University. All units at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. At Leopold Boutique Hotel every room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near Leopold Boutique Hotel include Östersund Bus Station, Östersund Train Station and Jamtli. The nearest airport is Åre Östersund Airport, 8 km from the hotel.

name: Hotell Arkad
description: This eco-friendly hotel is a few minutes’ walk from Västerås’s main streets, Vasagatan and Stora Gatan. It offers free Wi-Fi, a free relaxation area with sauna and individually decorated guest rooms. Wooden floors, a TV and a desk are standard room features at Hotell Arkad. Some rooms also include a seating area. Guests can relax with a game of dart or billiards. Other facilities include a common room with TV and a small library. The hotel serves a daily breakfast buffet. In the evenings, guests can order wine, beer and light dishes at reception. Västerås Central Station and Aros Congress Center are within 5 minutes’ walk of Arkad Hotell.

name: Quality Hotel Park Södertälje City
address: Saltsjotorget PO Box 130, Södertälje, Stockholms Lan
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our pet-friendly Quality Hotel Park Sodertalje City in Sodertalje, SE near Lake Malaren, Torekallbergets Museum, Open Air Museum and the Tom Tits Experiment. Our smoke-free hotel caters to your needs with amenities like breakfast, wireless Internet access, meeting space, a restaurant and an exercise room. Guest rooms come with refrigerators and coffee makers. Get more value at our Quality Hotel Park Sodertalje City. Book now. Pet accommodations and breakfast are both available for a small fee, please contact the hotel for more information. Please note that all Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are non-smoking properties. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Orsa Järnvägshotell
description: Orsa Järnvägshotell in the centre of Orsa provides accommodation with a luxurious touch for both leisure and business travellers. Built in 1894, the 19th century atmosphere is preserved in the interior design with all modern necessities added. All rooms feature an espresso machine, flatscreen-TV and free WiFi. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk and/or seating area, private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast, weekend brunch and a meal at the on-site restaurant. The accommodation also features a bar and a terrace where guests can relax with a drink. Skiing and fishing are among the activities that guests can enjoy near Orsa Järnvägshotell. Bicycling is also popular in the area, and the property provides both ski and bicycle storage. Grönklitt Ski Centre is 16 km from the property. The bus stop for the ski centre is just across the street from the hotel.

name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Vilsta Sporthotell
description: A popular and value living hotel, the Sure Hotel by Best Western Vilsta Sporthotell is located just outside of Eskilstuna Centrum with the Vilsta Nature Reserve just around the corner. The environment is friendly for children and families. The hotel has free parking and a charging station for electric vehicles. Free Wi-Fi and breakfast is served every day from 6:30 a.m. In the Nature Reserve is Eskilstuna’s biggest area for motion and recreation with trails for jogging and cycling. Sormlandsleden nature area includes bath areas, ski trails, ski slope, football area and much more. You can rent bikes, skis and canoes. The hotel has a relaxing area with a sauna and spa pool, a sport hall with a gym. The Conference Center is available for up to 150 persons. The Congress seating in the Sport Hall is available for up to 800 persons. The Restaurant and Sport pub serves food and drinks. Our hotel is a good place for events, kick-offs, training camps, shows and much more.bestwestern.com

name: Radisson Blu Airport Terminal Hotel Stockholm
address: Between Terminal 4 And 5, Box 82, 190 45 Arlanda, Stockholms Lan
description: Conveniently located with direct access to Stockholm-Arlanda Airport, Radisson Blu Airport Terminal Hotel offers modern 4-star accommodation complete with free Wi-Fi. It is surrounded by a range of popular eateries and is within a five-minute walk of Arlanda North Station. This stylish hotel offers meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and an express check-in and check-out feature. Airport transfers, a dry cleaning service, a laundry service and a wake-up service are available on enquiry. Radisson Blu Airport Terminal Hotel offers 260 air conditioned rooms filled with all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. Hot drinks can be made with the available tea and coffee supplies, and savoured in the comfort of the room's seating area. Guests of Radisson Blu Airport Terminal Hotel can relax at the on-site bar, suitably based for socialising in the evening. Lunch and dinner are served daily at Horizon. The hotel is well-connected to the rest of the area, with Arlanda Central Station within a minute's walk. Solna and Marsta are also a short car ride away.Revato

name: Comfort Hotel Jazz
description: The Comfort Hotel Jazz is located in Boras, known as the city of tradesmen. The hotel is located near the Big Square, the shopping district of the city. Other points of interest near this hotel include the University College of Boras, Boras Zoo, Stadsparksbadet, Boras Golfklubb and the Boras Art Museum. Enjoy hotel amenities like free full breakfast, wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant with a bar, a sauna, parking, to name a few. Guest rooms come with cable TVs, hair dryers, desks. Be sure to make the Comfort Hotel Jazz your home base when visiting this exciting city. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Scandic Strömmen
description: This hotel is just around the corner from Norrköping Central Station and 10 minutes’ drive from Norrköping Airport. It offers a rooftop hot tub, free guest bicycles and free WiFi internet. Scandic Strömmen’s rooms feature colourful, modern décor and wooden floors. Each has a flat-screen TV. The on-site restaurant serves wholesome Swedish cuisine, and a children’s menu is offered. The hotel also cooperates with the neighbouring Renströmmen Conference Centre. Leisure options include a sauna and a hot tub that offers city views. More active guests can use the hotel gym. The lobby features a communal table, perfect for working guests. The small on-site shop sells snacks, drinks and toiletries.

name: Hotell Nova
description: Set in Karlstad, 3.1 km from Karlstad Central Station, Hotell Nova offers accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a bar. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The property is allergy-free and is located 6.1 km from Löfbergs Lila Arena. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units feature a wardrobe. Hotell Nova offers a halal or gluten-free breakfast. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Karlstad, like skiing. Karlstad Golf Course is 12 km from Hotell Nova, while University in Karlstad is 8.8 km away. The nearest airport is Karlstad Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Åtellet Hotell
description: The Åtellet Hotell re-opened in April 2009. It is located at the mouth of the Norrtälje River, with the archipelago and sea at walking distance. Stockholm city centre is at a convenient distance by bus. The hotel is built in 19th century style, with top modern facilities. The idea was to recreate the character of Norrtälje and the atmosphere of that time. Åtellet offers restaurant, café and bar services, a sauna, lounges and conference facilities. The guest rooms have an atmosphere inspired by the archipelago. Most rooms have balconies or French balconies and offer wonderful views of the Norrtälje Bay. The interiors are inspired by timeless Nordic style with emphasis on comfort and convenience. The furniture has been custom made for Åtellet by a small carpentry in Småland.

name: Värdshuset Glada Hudik
description: This family-owned hotel is located just off the E4 Motorway, 2 km from Hudiksvall town centre. It provides free WiFi and an in-house restaurant with a bar. A petrol station with a store is also on site. Modern furnishings, a flat-screen TV and desk are offered in each room at Värdshuset Glada Hudik, as well as a private bathroom with a shower. A daily breakfast buffet is offered. Free private parking is possible on site. Cross-country ski tracks are within 300 metres of Värdshuset Glada Hudik. Other area activities include sledging and alpine skiing at Hedebacken, 500 metres away. The large, indoor playground Buspalatset is a 5-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Place Lund
description: Situated in Lund, 1.4 km from University of Lund, Place Lund features accommodation with free bikes, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel offers some units with city views, and the rooms are fitted with a private bathroom. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Place Lund offers a children's playground. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lund, like cycling. Triangeln Shopping Centre is 23 km from Place Lund, while Malmo Arena is 30 km from the property. The nearest airport is Malmo Airport, 32 km from the hotel.

name: La Hotel
description: Located on the island of Lidingö, this property is a 20 minutes' ride with public transportation from central Stockholm. Free WiFi is provided. Street parking is free and garage parking is provided for a fee. Millesgården Art Museum is a 10 minutes' walk from the hotel. Shared facilities at LA Hotel include a washing machine, iron equipment and a communal kitchen. Some rooms have a private kitchenette. All rooms have private bathrooms (some next to the room) and a TV. Guests also have access to a gym in the same building. Guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet that is served daily in the breakfast room. Free coffee, tea and hot chocolate are available for guests at all times. Bicycles are available for rent 100 metres away, while car rental is 50 metres from the property. Värtahamnen and Frihamnen harbours are both about 3 km from the hotel. Arlanda Airport is 34 km away. The area of the property provides a ski lift, golf courses and beaches.

name: Comfort Hotel Eskilstuna
description: The Comfort Hotel Eskilstuna is conveniently located near many popular attractions and local points of interest, including the Faktori Museum, Malardalen University and the Parken Zoo, one of the most popular zoos and amusement parks in Sweden. The third-largest lake in Sweden, Lake Malaren, is located just minutes from this hotel. Enjoy hotel amenities like free full breakfast, an exercise room and copy, print and fax machines, to name a few. All tastefully-decorated guest rooms come with TVs and hair dryers. We look forward to having you as our guest. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Forenom Aparthotel Stockholm Flemingsberg
description: No description found

name: Best Western Hotel City Gavle
description: The Best Western Hotel City Gavle is a charming and newly renovated hotel in the best downtown location. The hotel is located next to the shopping mall Galleria Nian and the main square and has 92 clean rooms that are pet and smoke free. All rooms have cable television, Internet access, shower and toilet. Directly connected to the hotel you can find the shopping streets Drottninggatan, Nygatan and the main square, with dozens of restaurants, bars and cinemas. Nearby are also the Gavle Concert Hall, Adventure Bath, Gavle Museum, city library, Prison Museum, County Hospital, Gavle High School and the famous city park Bolougnerskogen. There are 700 parking spaces in the house next door, Galleria Nian and the railway station is located about 800 meters, and approximately nine minutes walk from the hotel. In the area around Gavle you can find the animal and amusement park called Furuviksparken, the Mackmyra Whisky Distillery, the Swedish Railway Museum, Kungsberget downhill skiing, four golf courses, Dalalven salmon fishing, and a lovely coastline at the Baltic Sea. Our nearest international airport is Arlanda which is the largest airport in Sweden, and from Arlanda to Gavle it takes around 60 minutes by train.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Entré Norr
description: Offering a barbecue and views of the garden, Hotell Entré Norr is set in Umeå, 5 km from Umeå universitet. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free parking is available. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Certain units have a seating area for your convenience. You will find a kettle in the room. For your comfort, you will find slippers and a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy an evening buffet, for an additional cost which is served Monday until Sunday. The dinner must be booked in advance via the hotel. Free use of bicycles is available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Aula Nordica is 6 km from Hotell Entré Norr, while Norrlands Opera House is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Umea Airport, 9 km from Hotell Entré Norr.

name: ArenaHotellet i Uppsala
description: Located 1.4 km from Gränbystaden shopping centre, ArenaHotellet i Uppsala features a restaurant, bar and views of the city. Free private parking is available on site subject to availability. The city centre is 4 km away. All rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain units have a seating area where you can relax. You will find a 24-hour front desk and children's playground at the hotel. Children can also enjoy the Playstation and Xbox consoles in the game room. Linneaus museum and garden are 4.5 km from ArenaHotellet i Uppsala, while Uppsala Konsert & Kongress is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Arlanda Airport, 40 km from the property.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Fregatten
description: The Clarion Collection Hotel Fregatten is ideally located within walking distance of the Varbergs Fortress historic site, Lansmuseet Varberg museum, Fun City theme park and the Getterons Naturcentrum, offering a wildlife exhibition and a number of services. Enjoy hotel amenities like a restaurant, a hotel lounge, free organic breakfast, a light evening buffet, an exercise room, a hot tub, a sauna, massage therapist and coffee, tea and fruit available 24 hours a day, to name a few. Guest rooms have cable TVs. We are the perfect hotel for business and leisure travelers.Choice Hotels

name: Hotel Aveny Bed & Breakfast
description: Free WiFi and parking are offered at Hotel Aveny Bed & Breakfast, which is located on Gävle's main street, Kungsgatan. Gävle Central Station is 10 minutes’ walk away. Cable TV with movie channels, private bathrooms and wooden floors are standard in all rooms. A continental breakfast is served each day. Right next door is Mezopotamya & Arena Restaurant. It offers grilled meat dishes and live sports on flat-screen TVs. Hotel Aveny Bed & Breakfast is within 15 minutes’ walk of Gävle Concert Hall and the Swedish Railway Museum.

name: Teleborgs Slott
description: No description found

name: Story Hotel Signalfabriken
description: This industrial-chic hotel is located in the Signalfabriken building, only a 10-minute walk to Solna Business Park. It is located next to Sundbyberg Station, which offers connections to Arlanda Airport and central Stockholm via buses, metro and trains. Story Hotel offers rooms with a 49-inch LED TV, free WiFi and private bathroom with rain shower and high quality toiletries. Additional amenities include laptop comfort pads and complimentary mineral water. Each room also features organic cotton linen. Grab a tasty burger at the in-house restaurant Phil's Burger or enjoy a drink at the bar. Additional restaurants, cafe and shopping are within walking distance. The Mall of Scandinavia and Friends Arena are just 10-minutes away by tram. Arlanda Airport is about 45-minutes away via the airport shuttle bus, while Stockholm Bromma Airport is just 2 km away from Story Hotel Signalfabriken.

name: Scandic Mölndal
description: Situated less than 5 minutes’ walk from Mölndal Centrum Tram Stop, guests can reach Gothenburg’s city centre in 15 minutes by car or tram. This hotel offers free WiFi. Classic Scandinavian design with wooden floors and floor-to-ceiling windows are featured in each Scandic Mölndal guest room. Each bright room also has a TV, arm chair and work desk. The glass atrium provides a light and spacious lobby and dining area. Seasonal Swedish cuisine is served in Mölndal Scandic’s contemporary restaurant. Guests can enjoy a stylish bar indoors and an attractive terrace outdoors. Leisure facilities include free access to a gym and relaxation area with a sauna and hot tub. An indoor playroom has toys and games for children. Hotel staff will gladly recommend area activities and attractions, such as Gothenburg’s beautiful archipelago.

name: Scandic Luleå
description: Just 1 km from Coop Arena and 10 minutes’ drive from Luleå Airport, this eco-friendly hotel offers free sauna, pool and gym access. Luleå Central Station and the city centre are 3 km away. All rooms at Scandic Luleå have a TV, desk and private bathroom with shower. Some rooms include tea/coffee facilities, bathrobes and movie channels. The in-house Norrport restaurant serves a daily breakfast buffet, weekday lunches and dinner from Monday to Saturday. Bicycle rentals can be arranged, and a body massage chair is also available. Måttsundsbacken Winter Sports Centre is 20 minutes’ drive from Scandic Luleå.

name: Hotell Hehrne
address: Dr Hehrnes Väg 1, 462 23 Vänersborg, Västra Götaland
description: With picturesque views of the River Göta, a wood-fired hot tub and a variety of leisure facilities, this Vänersborg hotel is found close to Lake Vänern. The hotel offers free WiFi and all rooms include a bathroom with a shower, cable TV and a writing desk. Spend a pleasant evening in Hotel Hehrne´s restaurant with panorama windows offering views of Göta River. The terrace features 2 hot tubs wich could be booked at the reception. Hehrne Hotel has peaceful gardens and is 15 minutes’ drive from Hunneberg Nature Reserve. Fishing licenses for the Göta River can also be arranged. Football, frisbee golf and basketball can be enjoyed on site. An outdoor gym is available and free access to a nearby gym is offered.

name: Scandic Karlskrona
description: This hotel is located by the water on Karlskrona’s largest island, Trossö. It offers free WiFi internet and free gym access. All rooms have wooden floors and a flat-screen TV. Scandic Karlskrona’s rooms come with cable TV channels, a private bathroom and complimentary toiletries. Facilities include a terrace and a restaurant that offers pleasant sea views. Bikes can be borrowed from reception. Scandic Karlskrona is 1 km from Karlskrona Central Station and 2 km from the Maritime Museum.

name: Hotell Drottninggatan 11
description: No description found

name: Best Western Hotel Botnia
description: The Best Western Hotel Botnia, offers 65 well-appointed rooms. All rooms include cable television with free movie channels, Internet access and non-smoking rooms. Complimentary evening food is available Sunday through Thursday. Pets are accepted for the extra fee of 250 SEK. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Nya Pallas Hotel
description: With a peaceful, yet central location in the coastal town of Falkenberg, Nya Pallas Hotel offers a lush garden. The rooms feature a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. All rooms at Hotel Nya Pallas include a writing desk and a seating area. Garden views, old-style furniture and beautiful paintings create a charming atmosphere in each room. Breakfast and light dishes are served in the elegant dining room. For relaxation, guests can book the sauna or visit the relaxation area. In addition, the on-site Västkusthälsan Spa offers a variety of face and body treatments.

name: Scandic Elmia
description: This hotel is found next to Elmia Exhibition Centre and Rosenlundsbadet Water Park, 10 minutes’ walk from the shores of Lake Vättern. Sauna, gym and guest bicycles are free. The bright rooms at Scandic Elmia feature wooden floors, modern décor and cable TV and free WiFi is offered throughout the building. The hotel restaurant serves a hearty breakfast buffet. Guests can enjoy an apéritif or after-dinner coffee in the bar. Neighboring area contains multi-sporting arenas such as tennis, bowling, paddle, curling, swimming, football, and ice hockey. Scandic Elmia offers free private parking on site, you need to register your car at check in. 10 minutes’ drive from Jönköping Central Station.

name: Best Western Motala Stadshotell
description: The Best Western® Motala Stadshotell is a classic hotel situated in the heart of Motala, close to Lake Vattern, Gota Kanal and to Europe’s largest lake beach, Varamon. We are within walking distance from shopping, waterfront and guest harbor. Close by are also the golf courses of Motala and Vadstena. All rooms are non-smoking, and many of them have a fantastic view of the lake. We do not accept pets. Our multilingual and service minded staff will give you personalized service. On the ground floor you find our restaurant, the gastro pub Berggrens Öltapp & Mat. They also serve our large breakfast buffet, which is something we are especially proud of. The conference and gala floor previously housed Moala’s town hall. In the magnificent Anglasalen (Angel's Hall) everything from conferences, exhibitions and balls, to banquets and local reviews can be arranged, underneath the cut glass chandeliers. Come experience the charm of the Best Western® Motala Stadshotell!bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Nivå
description: Hotell Nivå is right across the street from Boden Central Station. Guests enjoy free WiFi and parking. Nivå Hotell offers functional guest rooms, all of which are equipped with a TV and private bathroom. General facilities at Hotell Nivå include a sauna. The surrounding mountains and rivers offers activities such as hiking and fishing, and the Björknäs recreational area is only a few minutes’ drive away.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Norre Park
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Collection Hotel Norre Park in Halmstad, SE near the University of Halmstad, Orjans Vall football stadium, the Halmstad Museum and Halmstad Castle. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free organic breakfast, wireless Internet access, a restaurant, a fitness center and more. All guest rooms have hair dryers, desks, TVs, irons and ironing boards. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Halmstad hotels like our Clarion Collection Hotel Norre Park. Pet charge: 200 kr per stay. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Horrmundsgården i Sälen
description: Located 18 km north of Sälen, this property is 3 km from fishing opportunities in the Västerdal River. It offers free Wi-Fi, a guest kitchen and a furnished garden with BBQ facilities. Rustic, wooden furnishings are provided in the guest rooms at Horrmundsgården i Sälen, as well as views of the surrounding forest. Bathroom facilities are shared. An open fireplace is available in the shared dining room. Guests can also enjoy a bookable sauna, outdoor wooden hot tub and board games in the communal TV lounge. Horrmundsgården i Sälen staff arranges canoe rentals and guided fishing tours. Cross-country ski and snow scooter trails can be found just outside of the hostel. Hiking is another common area activity. Lake Horrmundet is a 5-minute walk away, while the closest beach is 2 km away.

name: Good Morning+ Halmstad
description: Good Morning+ Halmstad is located 4 km from Halmstad Central Station and the Nissan River. It offers free WiFi and parking. All rooms have a satellite TV. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast in the morning and meals at the in-house restaurant. Other facilities include a relaxation area with a sauna and a gym. Located just off the road E6, this hotel is directly connected to Hallarna, Halmstad’s biggest shopping centre. Many golf clubs are located in the area, and Halmstad's long sandy beaches are just a short drive away. There are good local bus connections to the city centre and Tylösand beach, 14 km from the property.

name: Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel, Stockholm-Arlanda
address: Kabinvaegen 3, P O Box 103, 190 60 Arlanda, Stockholms Lan
description: Set in Arlanda, this modern hotel features valet parking, a 24-hour reception and an express check-in and check-out feature. Just moments from Stockholm-Arlanda Airport, it offers a stylish stay in a convenient location. Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel provides rooms equipped with converters/voltage adaptors, tea and coffee making facilities and a mini bar. They provide an in-room safe, a laptop safe and a private bathroom. Those staying at Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel can sample international dishes at the in-house restaurant, suitably situated for those who want to stay nearby for a meal. There are a variety of restaurants and cafés near Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel, and Rosersberg is an easy car ride away.Revato

name: Hotell Rättvik
description: Situated in Rättvik, within 300 metres of Siljansbadet Beach and 9.2 km of Dalhalla Amphitheatre, Hotell Rättvik features accommodation with a bar and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Built in 1948, this 3-star hotel is within 48 km of Falun Mine and 29 km of Dala Horse Museum. The property is non-smoking and is located 37 km from Vasaloppet Museum. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Hotell Rättvik provides some rooms with city views, and the rooms have a kettle. The rooms have a wardrobe. The accommodation offers a continental or American breakfast. At Hotell Rättvik you will find a restaurant serving American cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Zorn Museum is 38 km from the hotel, while Lugnet Sports Centre is 48 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mora Airport, 47 km from Hotell Rättvik.

name: Good Morning Arlanda
description: Situated 1.5 km from Stockholm Arlanda Airport, this hotel offers breakfast for an additional cost from 04:00, free Wifi and a 24-hour free airport shuttle service in connection with arrival and departure. All the modern rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All the brightly decorated guest rooms at Good Morning Arlanda have wooden floors and a private bathroom with shower. Each room is equipped with a work desk. Nordic dishes are served at the on-site restaurant & bar. A snack menu is available at all times. Guests can enjoy drinks while watching sports events on the TV in the bar. Free WiFi is available throughout Good Morning Arlanda. Long term parking is possible on site. Arlandastad Golf Course is an 8-minute drive away. Stockholm city centre is a 30-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Almnäs Park Hotel
