description: Almnäs Park Hotel offers bright rooms decorated in natural colours and free WiFi. Central Södertälje and Södertälje Railway Station are 10 minutes' drive away. Free parking is available. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV, desk and private bathroom with a shower. Almnäs Park's café and bar serve sandwiches, hot snacks and a variety of drinks. Guests can enjoy free coffee and tea throughout the day. There is also a 24-hour front desk at the property. Bromma Airport is 47 km away, while Arlanda Airport is 83 km away from Almnäs Park Hotel.

name: Best Western Malmia Hotel
description: The Best Western Malmia Hotel is situated in the heart of the town of Skelleftea, right next to shopping, restaurants and other diversions all lying within easy walking distance. Our property offers a nice relaxation area with sauna and enjoy the evening sun on the balcony! We feature a complimentary full breakfast, restaurant, bar/lounge and our guest rooms offer cable television, dataports and hair dryer. Some rooms with balcony. Children under 12 may stay in parent's room at no extra charge. Dogs and small pets are welcome to stay. Parking available on request. We are able to help you obtain tickets to various venues, such as theatre, a football match or book a game of golf. Welcome to the Best Western Malmia Hotel where our personal service will ensure an enjoyable stay with us. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Best Western Princess Hotel
description: The Best Western Princess Hotel is located in the very city center of Norrkoping, near the shopping galleries, movie theatre, and many restaurants and pubs. The famous Concert and Congress Hall Louis de Geer is also nearby. The hotel has a very pleasant lobby and bar where lighter food dishes and all kinds of drinks are served. All guests are offered free coffee and biscuits in the lobby. One floor down from the lobby you find the cozy tapas restaurant La Uva. This is a perfect place to have a good meal or a drink in the evening. You also find a new fitness center and sauna in the hotel, free of charge for all hotel guests.bestwestern.com

name: Stiftsgården i Rättvik
description: Peacefully located by Lake Siljan, this Rättvik property features a private beach and waterfront terrace with panoramic lake views in a non alcoholic environment. It offers a daily breakfast buffet, along with free sauna and gym access. The bright guest rooms at Stiftsgården i Rättvik are decorated with light wooden furnishings. Each includes a flat-screen TV, work desk and garden views. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas of the property. Stiftsgården’s restaurant serves buffets made with Swedish specialities and locally produced ingredients. Lake views can be enjoyed while dining. In summer, the large garden is an ideal location to relax and enjoy a cup of coffee. Leisure options at Stiftsgården i Rättvik include giant chess and table tennis. Guests wishing to explore the surroundings can rent a bicycle on site and visit the 15th-century Rättvik Church, just 150 metres away.

name: Scandic Gävle Väst
description: Set next to the river Gavleån and Motorway E4, this hotel provides free Wi-Fi and free access to gym, sauna and indoor pool. Central Gävle is 5 minutes’ drive away. The rooms at Scandic Gävle Väst feature bright, Scandinavian décor. All include a work desk and many also have a seating area. The in-house restaurant serves a varied seasonal à la carte menu as well as daily specials. Scandic Gävle Väst’s bar has a wide-screen TV and offers a selection of light dishes. Next to the restaurant is a playroom with toys, films and computer games. In addition, the hotel has a playground. Bicycles can be borrowed for free on site, and drinks, snacks and other amenities are available in Scandic’s lobby shop. Next to the hotel are free public parking spaces. Local buses stop nearby, and the ride to Central Station takes less than 15 minutes. Scandic Gävle Väst is certified as an environmentally friendly hotel.

name: Best Western Valhall Park Hotell
description: The Best Western Valhall Park Hotell is a family friendly hotel with a relaxing atmosphere surrounded by fruit trees, Copper Beech trees and historic sites from the bronze age, located in a beautiful and serene Angelholm. The hotel has 70 rooms, restaurant, bar, conference facilities and from June 2021 relax and spa and hotel gym. Our guests praise us for our high quality, locally sourced made from scratch food, where we focus on seasonal ingredients to enhance your culinary experience. The Bjare Peninsula and the countryside of Kulla offers a rich and accessible nature with its beaches, parks, hiking and biking trails, vineyards, local stores and farmers market, shopping, churches, and historical sites, some dated back to the bronze age. Valhall Park offers a peaceful environment where you can collect your thoughts, with its own walking and running paths, paddle lanes, as well as a gym and group exercise activities at Friskis & Svettis. The hotel is located close to the north Atlantic Ocean (1.5 kilometers), with long stretches of white sandy beaches by Skalderviken. The Kattegatt Trail offers excellent biking, walking, and running paths. The hotel has a unique location being close to the Angelholm-Helsinborg Airport, the E6 Interstate, and the train station Barkakra, connected to Halmstad and Helsingborg.bestwestern.com

name: Holiday Club Åre
address: Are Strand Box 68, 830 13 Åre, Jamtlands Lan
description: Location This family-friendly Are hotel is located near the airport, within 1 mi (2 km) of Are Beach and Are Ski Resort. Are Cable Car and Are Old Church are also within 10 minutes. Åre Station is only a 4-minute walk. Room All rooms offer free WiFi and free wired Internet, plus room service and flat-screen TVs. Hair dryers, safes, and showers are among the other amenities that guests will find. Amenities Along with 2 restaurants, this smoke-free hotel has an indoor pool and an outdoor pool. Free buffet breakfast and free WiFi in public areas are also provided. Additionally, a health club, a bar/lounge, and a coffee shop/café are onsite.WebBeds

name: Mountain Lodge
description: Located in Stöten, 35 km from Experium, Mountain Lodge provides accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. 35 km from Snötorget, the property offers a ski pass sales point, as well as ski-to-door access. The accommodation features room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The area is popular for skiing, and ski equipment hire is available at the hotel. The nearest airport is Scandinavian Mountains Airport, 18 km from Mountain Lodge.

name: Scandic Uplandia
description: Located less than a 10-minute stroll from Uppsala Central Station, Scandic Hotel Uplandia provides guests with an ideal base while in Uppsala. It is situated a brief walk from the Gustavianum, the Linnaean Garden and Uppsala Cathedral. This 3-star hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a coffee bar and a sauna. Reception operates 24/7 and the friendly staff can suggest sights to visit and provide other tourist information. After a day of exploring the nearby region, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. There are also a number of rooms available for families. Scandic Uplandia houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to unwind of an evening. For those preferring to dine out, the local neighbourhood features a number of bars and restaurants serving a choice of varied cuisines. Scandic Uplandia Hotel Uppsala is also located near the area's popular restaurants and bars, plus Newman Institute for Catholic Studies is within walking distance. Guests can also visit Uppsala Castle and the Carolina Rediviva.Revato

name: First Hotel Örebro
description: First Hotel Örebro is housed in an Art Nouveau building, 500 metres from Örebro Central Station and 5 minutes’ walk from Örebro Castle. Free WiFi is avaialble. All guest rooms at Örebro First Hotel have an armchair, a work desk and cable TV. All room offer a flat-screen TV and a seating area. The Svartån River is only a few minutes’ walk away, and a rich variety of shops and restaurants are found just around the corner.

name: Knistad Herrgård
description: This hotel is set in the tranquil Skövde countryside, on the premises of Knistad Golf & Country Club. It offers free WiFi, a sauna and restaurant with bar. Skövde city centre is a 10-minute drive away. A TV and tea/coffee facilities are provided in each guest room, as well as views of the golf course. The bathroom includes a shower and hairdryer. Guests can enjoy free use of bicycles at Knistad Hotell. Other on-site activities include golf, team building and wine tasting in the wine cellar. Lake Vättern is 30 minutes' drive away, while Skara Sommarland Amusement Park is 30 km away.

name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Focus
description: Centrally located in Örnsköldsvik, this comfortable hotel offers a sauna with relax area. The city’s main shopping area and restaurants are right around the corner. Fjällräven Event Centre is 900 metres away. Free parking is available. Rooms at Sure Hotel by Best Western Focus have an electric kettle and a 40-inch flat-screen TV. The private bathroom has a shower. Free WiFi is available. Additional services on site include a free fitness centre and a communal terrace. Paradiset Spa and Adventure Bath is 200 metres from Sure Hotel. Car owners can borrow engine heaters from the hotel.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Gabelshus
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Collection Hotel Gabelshus in Oslo, NO near the National Gallery. Our pet-friendly hotel is also near the Royal Palace, National Gallery and Frogner Park. Enjoy hotel amenities like free breakfast, wireless Internet access, an exercise room and a restaurant, light evening buffet, to name a few. All guest rooms have refrigerators, hair dryers, irons, ironing boards and TVs. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues. Please note that all Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are non-smoking properties. Children under the age of 9 stay free of charge in the existing bedding of a room shared with a paying adult. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Saga Hotel Oslo, BW Premier Collection
description: Within a family orientated setting of design-hotels, Saga Hotels comprises of four contrasting concepts dotted throughout Oslo City Centre. Four underlying characteristics of Saga Hotels can be defined by its promise of high standards, trendy interior, exceptional service and relaxing atmosphere. 'Making home feel closer'. The journey of Saga Hotels first began in Frogner, where Saga Hotel Oslo, BW Premier Collection was established. This beautiful setting, rich in heritage, and surrounded by the quaint architecture of Majorstuen was a prosperous beginning to what would eventually expand the family into three new concepts throughout Oslo. Each individual concept focuses on attracting various types of travelers whilst catering to their everyday needs and desires. Our reception area will be renovated from October 16th until March 1st, 2024. This may result in slightly more noise than usual.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Christiania Teater
description: This boutique hotel is 100 metres from Oslo’s main street, Karl Johans Gate, and 5 minutes’ walk from the Gardermoen Airport Express Train departure point. Located in a historic old theatre from 1918, Hotel Christiania Teater offers free WiFi access. Each room at Hotel Christiania Teater includes a minibar and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. All rooms have rain showers, large windows, and are decorated in unique wallpapers. The breakfast buffet includes hot and cold dishes as well as eggs cooked to order. Nationaltheatret Station's metro and commuter train connections are 300 metres away. Hotel Christiania Teater is within 2 minutes’ walk of bus and tram stops. Both the National Gallery and the National Theater is across the street. Garage parking is available at a location nearby.

name: Lysebu Hotel
description: Lysebu Hotel is located at Tryvannshøyden Hill above Oslo, 750 metres from the Voksenkollen metro station. It offers excellent dining, free WiFi and free private parking. All rooms at Hotel Lysebu have a work desk, and a private bathroom with shower. Some rooms feature a flat-screen TV and views of Sørkedalen Valley and Norefjell Mountain. The in-house restaurant serves Norwegian cuisine and features large panoramic windows and Nordic art on the walls. The restaurant offers a new 5-course menu every week, based upon seasonal ingredients and accompanied with selected wines. During summer, guests can dine out on the terrace. The hotel has a wine cellar and can arrange wine-tasting sessions. Art exhibitions and live music events are sometimes hosted by the hotel. Other facilities include a large garden, an indoor swimming pool and a lounge with fireplace. Popular activities among guests include skiing, hiking and cycling. Oslo city centre is a 40-minute metro ride away.

name: The Thief
description: Featuring rooms with a in-built sound system and private balcony, The Thief is a design boutique hotel on Tjuvholmen in Oslo. The promenade of Aker Brygge is within 5 minutes’ walk. The hotel offers in-room spa treatments, a spa centre and free around-the-clock gym access. Rooms at this stylish hotel feature a Nespresso machine, a mini-bar and a rainforest shower in the private bathroom. The Thief has 24-hour room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The Thief Spa includes a Turkish hamam bath, sauna and swimming pool. Guests can also relax on the chic rooftop terrace and enjoy contemporary Norwegian cuisine at the Thief Food Bar. All guests receive free entry to the Astrup Fearnley Museum of Modern Art, while the hotel is only a 15-minute walk from the centre of Oslo and the National Gallery. The nearest bus stop is at Vika Atrium 400 metres away, and the National Theatre train station 1.5 km away provides links to Oslo Gardermoen Airport.

name: Bob W Sentralen
description: My City Home Hotel and Apartments is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Oslo. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, fax machine, facilities for disabled guests, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, heating. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort makes My City Home Hotel and Apartments the perfect choice for your stay in Oslo.Agoda

name: Thon Hotel Storo
description: Opened in September 2018, this hotel is situated next to the Storo Storcenter shopping centre, between the Storo and Nydalen neighborhoods of Oslo, about 5 km from the city centre. It offers an on-site restaurant, bar and fitness centre. Free WiFi is available. The modern rooms at Thon Hotel Storo feature a smart TV, Bose stereo system and quality Jensen beds. A minibar, safe and desk are also standard in all rooms. Some feature a balcony, seating area and coffee machine. The restaurant offers seasonal produce, based on local and organic ingredients. During nice weather, guests can enjoy meals and drinks outdoors. Thon Hotel Storo serves a buffet breakfast daily. Nydalen Metro Stop is 500 metres away, as well as tram and airport express coach stops. An IMAX cinema complex is next to the hotel, along with a variety of shops, restaurants and bars. The Akerselva River is a 5-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Oslo Airport, 47 km from the hotel.

name: Karl Johan Hotel
description: Karl Johan Hotel is housed in a 19th-century building on Oslo’s main street, Karl Johans Gate, less than 700 metres from the Royal Palace. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi. All guest rooms at Karl Johan have a work desk and flat-screen TV. Some guest rooms also offer views of the neighbouring Parliament building. The Stortinget Metro Station is just around the corner from Karl Johan Hotel, and the Central Station is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Comfort Hotel Grand Central
description: Get rested and ready for anything at the Comfort Hotel Grand Central in Oslo, Norway. Located near several transportation terminals, we offer easy access to attractions like The Royal Castle, National Opera House, Karl Johans Gate, Oslo Spectrum and Oslo City Shopping. Enjoy our delicious Italian restaurant, as well as amenities like free breakfast, free WiFi, a free daily newspaper and state-of-the-art exercise room. All rooms include down pillows, pillow-top mattresses and a flat-screen television with Ipod jack. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Radisson Blu Hotel Nydalen, Oslo
description: Situated just a short walk from Nydalen Metro Station, Radisson Blu Hotel Nydalen Oslo offers guests a convenient base when in Oslo. It also provides a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and luggage storage. Guests staying at Radisson Blu Hotel Nydalen can enjoy the stylish rooms that offer a private bathroom, a mini bar and tea and coffee making facilities. They all include an in-room safe, ironing facilities and a seating area. In-house dining options include N33, which provides an ideal spot to enjoy a meal. A continental and a buffet breakfast is served every morning. Radisson Blu Nydalen Oslo is close to Nydalen Railway Station, making it easy for guests to explore Oslo and its surrounding areas. The local area is also well known for its shopping.Revato

name: Thon Hotel Vika Atrium
description: Located in Oslo, Thon Hotel Vika Atrium offers stylish, 3-star accommodation close to DNB ASA. It has a fitness centre, as well as a sauna, meeting rooms and free Wi-Fi. The rooms at Hotel Vika Atrium have a flat-screen TV, a mini bar and a telephone. They have an en suite bathroom with a hair dryer. Thon Hotel Vika Atrium Oslo's in-house restaurant, Vika, is a popular place to have a meal. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and restaurants in the area. Thon Hotel Vika Atrium is conveniently situated for sightseeing in Oslo, with Aker Brygge just moments away on foot. Yara International ASA and Nationaltheatret Tram Station can easily be reached on foot.Revato

name: Comfort Hotel Xpress Youngstorget
description: The Comfort Hotel Xpress Youngstorget welcomes you to a different kind of hotel experience, a hotel put together by music, concrete, technology, social media, people and graffiti. Located within the concert district of Oslo, this hotel is a hub for mobile travelers seeking urban, efficient and affordable accommodations. This hotel offers 180 compact rooms with hip and urban design and innovative solutions. With the integrated connectivity panel on every TV, you can listen to your favorite music as loud as you want or watch your own movies in high definition. Book a guest room with us today.Choice Hotels

name: Comfort Hotel Boersparken
description: Located in the heart of the capital, Comfort Hotel Boersparken is surrounded by beautiful neo rennaissance and art noiveau architecture. Only two blocks from the popular shopping street Karl Johan and within walking distance from the central train station and airport shuttle. Our professional staff thrives on taking personal service to the next level, ensuring that all our guests needs are met during the stay. We offer coffee and waffles in the afternoon and in the evening a buffet for the guests. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents room with no extra bedding. Pet charge: 200 kr per stay. Please note that all Choice hotels in Scandinavia are 100% non-smoking properties.Choice Hotels

name: Park Inn Oslo
description: Strategically located in the middle of the city, this 3-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Oslo. It is close to Karl Johans gate, eateries and shops. This modern hotel provides meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and a coffee bar. Guests can also enjoy disabled parking. There are 118 rooms at Park Inn by Radisson Oslo, each offering all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. Those staying at Lopesan Costa can indulge in a beverage at RBG Lobby Bar, after sampling a meal at RBG Restaurant. Lopesan Costa Meloneras Corallium Spa and Casino is ideally located for discovering Oslo with Oslo City Hall and the Nationaltheateret within walking distance. The Oslo Opera House, plus Nationaltheatret Tram Station, are just minutes away on foot.Revato

name: Scandic Byporten
description: A 10-minute walk from Bussterminalen Oslo, Scandic Byporten has an accessible setting, making it an ideal base while in Oslo. This modern hotel is set in the heart of the city. This cosy hotel provides free bicycle rental, free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. There is public parking nearby for those with a car. Just moments from nearby clubs and bars, this 3-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover the best of the local nightlife. Rooms at Scandic Byporten are bright and offer blackout curtains and a flat-screen TV. They all have a private bathroom, an in-room safe and a desk. Those staying at Scandic Byporten can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, ideally located for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. Each evening, guests can relax in the cosy lounge bar. The hotel also offers a daily breakfast that can be enjoyed in the dining room, or there is a selection of well-known eateries in the area to discover. Scandic Byporten is conveniently situated for sightseeing in Oslo, with Oslo Spektrum only moments away on foot. Karl Johans gate, Stortinget and the Oslo Opera House are also within a 10-minute walk.Revato

name: Quality Hotel Entry
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our smoke-free Quality Hotel Entry in Trollaasen, NO near the Tusenfryd Amusement Park, Edvard Munch museum, Vigeland Sculpture Park and the Roald Amundsens home. Our pet-friendly hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free breakfast, wireless high-speed Internet, meeting space and copy, print and fax services, to name a few. Guest rooms come with refrigerators, TVs, mini bars and more. Get more value at our Quality Hotel Mastemyr. Book now. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet accommodations are available, contact the hotel for more details. Please note that all Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are non-smoking properties.Choice Hotels

name: First Hotel Millennium
description: Located just 10-minutes from Oslo Opera House, First Hotel Millennium is 200 m from the main shopping street, Steen & Strøm Department Store, Karl Johans gate and 700 m from Oslo Central Station. Many restaurants, cafes and luxury shopping stores are right around the corner. All the modern and inviting guest rooms have flat-screen TVs and private bathrooms with a bathtub. The top-floor rooms have a large private terrace. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. The hotel offers free WiFi access in all areas. Aker Brygge, National Theatre and Royal Palace are within a 10-minute walk from the hotel. This eco-friendly hotel has several public transportation options within walking distance.

name: Clarion Hotel The Hub
description: Clarion Hotel The Hub is situated in Oslo and is within a 10-minute walk of Bussterminalen Oslo. This modern hotel is set in the heart of the city. This elegant Oslo hotel boasts an indoor pool and free Wi-Fi. Romance seekers will delight in the hotel's features like a sauna and honeymoon suites. The rooms at Clarion Hotel The Hub are air-conditioned and include a private balcony, a coffee maker and a mini bar. They feature a sofa bed, a seating area and an in-room safe. During their stay at Clarion Hotel The Hub, guests can dine at Norda and relax with a drink at Hub Bar. Breakfast is available each morning and can be enjoyed in the comfort of the rooms. Guests are also able to try one of the many bars and restaurants nearby. Clarion Hotel The Hub is conveniently located for sightseeing in Oslo, with Oslo Spektrum only moments away on foot. Oslo City Hall and Nationaltheatret Tram Station are within walking distance.Revato

name: Quality Hotel Hasle Linie
description: Quality Hotel Hasle Linie is located in the center of Oslo. Between Carl Berner, Loren, Sinsen and Toyen you are close to almost everything. The hotel has 250 rooms on 6 floors, bar with outdoor seating, restaurant Brasserie X and a gym that is 1000 m2 big. The hotel also have a capacity of 700 conference guests. The biggest venue is 380 m2 big and can hold over 400 persons.Choice Hotels

name: Citybox Oslo
description: Conveniently located in the heart of the city, this 3-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Oslo. It is ideally positioned for guests wishing to visit local attractions. There are a variety of amenities available to guests of Citybox Oslo, including free Wi-Fi, an express check-in and check-out feature and meeting facilities. For those travelling with children Citybox Oslo offers a games room. All the rooms at Citybox Oslo include a private bathroom, plus all the necessities for a comfortable stay. After settling in to their room, guests can discover the area with use of Oslo Central Station, which is within a five-minute walk of the hotel. Breakfast, lunch, afternoon tea and dinner are prepared every day at Spor Av Nord, as are European, local and vegetarian specialties. Rent Mel Bakery & Pizzeria offers regional, Italian and local dishes and is open for lunch and dinner. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and cafés in the vicinity. Oslo's attractions, such as the Christiania Theatre, are easily accessible on foot from Citybox Oslo. Please note that self check-in machines are available as the hotel does not have a reception.Revato

name: Thon Hotel Linne
description: Located in north-east Oslo, forming an excellent base for travellers with business in Økern, Helsfyr and Groruddalen, is the modern Thon Hotel Linne. Oslo city centre is 12 minutes away by metro. Thon Hotel Linne offers easy access to the centre of Oslo with its shops and attractions like the Opera, the Royal Palace, Aker Brygge and the Akershus Fortress. The in-house restaurant at Thon Hotel Linne serves breakfast, lunch, dinner and an à la carte menu. The menu and lunch buffet varies according to the seasons and the food is inspired by both international and regional cuisine. Only the highest quality seasonal ingredients are used, making the Statsraaden Restaurant a popular choice for business lunches and dinners. Thon Hotel Linne is certified as an Eco-Lighthouse, working for sustainable development.

name: Scandic Karl Johan
description: Set in the city centre, this boutique hotel is under a five-minute walk to Karl Johans gate. It is situated in Oslo, set amongst a range of well-known shops and is within a 10-minute walk of Oslo Central Station. Scandic Karl Johan features a 24-hour reception, plus an express check-in and check-out feature and free Wi-Fi. For added convenience, it offers a safe, highchairs and luggage storage. Just a stone's throw from nearby clubs and bars, this 3-star hotel also allows guests to easily explore what the local nightlife has to offer. Scandic Karl Johan provides 108 rooms, each fitted with a flat-screen TV, a laptop safe and a private bathroom. Blackout curtains and heating are also included. This Oslo City Centre hotel is located in an area popular with tourists and is about a 10-minute walk from Oslo City Hall and the Nationaltheateret. Guests can also visit Aker Brygge, the Oslo Opera House and Royal Palace.Revato

name: Scandic Olympiatoppen Sportshotel
description: Situated only a short walk from Sognsvann Train Station, Olympiatoppen Sportshotel - Scandic Partner provides guests with an ideal base while visiting Oslo. Guests also have access to complimentary Wi-Fi and on-site parking. There are a variety of amenities at the hotel on offer to guests, such as meeting rooms, a sauna and a fitness centre. Staff are available 24/7 and can help with booking tours and tickets. The rooms at Olympiatoppen Sportshotel - Scandic Partner feature a desk, a seating area and a private bathroom. They provide a radio, heating and a telephone. Those staying at Olympiatoppen Sportshotel - Scandic Partner can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. The hotel is close to Kringsja Metro Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Oslo and its surrounding areas. It is also a brief car trip from Telenor Arena, Holmenkollen Ski Jump and Majorstuen.Revato

name: Scandic Holmenkollen Park
description: Scandic Holmenkollen Park has opened its doors again, after extensive renovation and remodeling. The distinctive history and architecture have been meticulously preserved and complemented with modern design and solutions. The Hotel's capacity is a total of 376 guest rooms, including 27 exclusive rooms and suites in the historic Dragon Building. The Hotel also has a new and delicious spa with a pool and a large gym of 1,100 m2. Entrance to Artesia SPA should be booked well in advance of your stay due to limited capacity. Age limit 16 years. Entrance from NOK 195 for staying guests, per visit to the SPA facilities. In our restaurant Holmenkollen BISTRO you can enjoy our unique waffle concept during the day. Waffle fajitas with cheddar and salsa, Club waffle with chicken, or perhaps a waffle with cured ham, sour cream and salad? There are many flavor combinations, and here you can experience the waffle in a way you have never done before. For dinner you can choose from a tasty à la carte menu, where the dishes are based on short-traveled Norwegian and Nordic ingredients. Scandic Holmenkollen Park is a destination in itself, a full 350 meters above sea level, with fantastic views over Oslo and the Nordmarka right outside the hotel door. With immediate proximity to the Holmenkollen Skiarena National Complex, the Ski Museum and nature, you will find exciting outdoor activities for everyone. Here you have miles of hiking trails to choose from, and in winter you can go straight out on the WC trails that stretch into Nordmarka. Only minutes away from the hotel is Oslo Winter Park and in the summer you can challenge your fear of heights in one of the Nordic countries' largest climbing parks. The Hotel is only a subway ride away from the center of Oslo, it takes 30 minutes by subway from Oslo Central station to Holmenkollen station.

name: Scandic St Olavs Plass
description: Conveniently situated, Scandic St Olavs Plass offers easy access to Oslo's popular hot spots. Those staying at the property can also take advantage of complimentary wireless internet during their stay. This themed hotel provides a number of amenities, such as a 24-hour reception, a playground and meeting rooms. Fitness facilities are provided, and guests can make use of the bicycle rental service. Just minutes from nearby clubs and bars, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover the best of the local nightlife. Scandic St Olavs Plass has 241 well-appointed rooms that are accompanied by a variety of essential facilities to ensure guests have an enjoyable stay. They are also fitted with a shower, blackout curtains and a hair dryer. The area surrounding Scandic St Olavs Plass is well-known for its shopping and eateries. The staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Oslo.Revato

name: Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel, Oslo
description: Centrally located, Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel Oslo allows for easy access to Oslo's popular sightseeing areas. It also offers free Wi-Fi and a fitness centre. This 4-star hotel provides a hair salon, a coffee bar and supervised child care/activities. Welcoming and professional staff are available 24 hours a day. Those staying at Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel can enjoy the luxurious rooms that feature a mini bar, converters/voltage adaptors and a private bathroom. They all offer tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room safe and a laptop safe. Radisson Sas Scandinavia Hotel Oslo's restaurants, Brasserie and 26 North Restaurant & Social Club, serve guests dinner every evening. Guests can also try one of the many bars and cafés in the vicinity. Oslo's attractions, such as the Nationaltheateret and the Christiania Theatre, are easily accessible on foot from Radisson Scandinavia Hotel Oslo. Guests can also visit Oslo City Hall, Bislett Stadion and Karl Johans gate.Revato

name: Scandic Helsfyr
description: Scandic Helsfyr provides 4-star accommodation in Oslo. It also offers free Wi-Fi, a sauna and an express check-in and check-out feature. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. Facilities include an around the clock reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. It also has a gym with a sauna. For the convenience of those staying at the hotel, rooms provide all the essentials, including an in-room closet, a flat-screen TV and a desk. They all offer a telephone and a radio. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. Scandic Helsfyr has private parking on site and is within easy driving distance of Ullevaal Stadion and Oslo City Hall. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Helsfyr Metro Station, which allows convenient access in and around Oslo.Revato

name: Radisson Blu Hotel and Conference Cente, Oslo Alna
description: This cosy Oslo hotel is situated within a 10-minute walk of Trosterud Metro Station. It also offers luggage storage, an express check-in and check-out feature and a 24-hour reception. Radisson Blu Hotel Alna-Oslo provides 142 rooms, all of which are equipped with a laptop safe, a hair dryer and tea and coffee making facilities. Guests can relax in the homely sitting area. Radisson Blu Hotel Alna-Oslo offers a variety of dining options, including Restaurant Betula and Birk Lobby Bar. Guests can wake up to a delicious buffet or continental breakfast every day. Radisson Blu Hotel Alna-Oslo provides private parking on site and is a short car ride from Ullevaal Stadion, Aker Brygge and Oslo City Hall. Majorstuen is only an easy drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Scandic Solli
description: Scandic Solli is situated in Oslo and offers complimentary wireless internet. It is conveniently located for those wishing to visit local attractions. This traditional hotel offers a gym, free bicycle rental and a playground. Corporate facilities include meeting rooms and a business centre. Just minutes from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to explore the best of the local nightlife. Rooms at Scandic Solli are well-equipped and feature a flat-screen TV. They offer a telephone and a desk. A satisfying breakfast is available each morning, and there are also numerous restaurants and eateries close by. The area surrounding Scandic Solli is well-known for its shopping. It is within walking distance of Nationaltheatret Tram Station and Elisenberg Light Rail Station, which allows convenient access in and around Oslo.Revato

name: Thon Hotel Cecil
description: Strategically located in the middle of the city, this 3-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Oslo. It is close to the Christiania Theatre, eateries and shops. Located under a five-minute stroll from Nationaltheatret Tram Station, Thon Hotel Cecil offers free Wi-Fi. Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms at Thon Cecil have a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a mini bar. All offer heating, a desk and an alarm clock. Those looking to sit down to a meal and wanting to stay close by needn't look any further than Thon Hotel Cecil Oslo's in-house restaurant, which is available every day for breakfast. Thon Hotel Cecil is ideally situated for sightseeing in Oslo, with the Nationaltheateret, Karl Johans gate and Oslo City Hall just a short walk away. Guests can also visit Aker Brygge and Oslo Spektrum.Revato

name: Hotel Verdandi Oslo
description: Set in central Oslo, this hotel is within 700 metres of Aker Brygge, Akershus Fortress and the Royal Palace Park. The Verdandi Hotel offers free WiFi. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is featured in each room, as well as a private bathroom with shower. Some also have a seating area and desk. The daily breakfast buffet is served at a restaurant. The reception will provide recommendations to help guests to get around the area. With a 4-minute walk, guests can reach the National Theatre and the Karl Johans gate shopping street, while the Royal Palace is an 8-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Oslo Airport, 52 km from the hotel.

name: Authentic & Stylish Apartment with Spectacular Views Towards the Munch Museum
description: Situated in Oslo centre, less than 1 km from Oslo Central Station and 1.8 km from Akershus Fortress, Authentic & Stylish Apartment with Spectacular Views Towards the Munch Museum features accommodation with free WiFi and a balcony. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, sea views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with shower and bathrobes. A fridge, a stovetop and minibar are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Popular points of interest near Authentic & Stylish Apartment with Spectacular Views Towards the Munch Museum include Oslo Spektrum Music Arena, Oslo Bus Terminal and Rockefeller Music Hall. The nearest airport is Oslo, 49 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Clarion Hotel Bergen Airport Terminal
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Bergen Airport Terminal in Bergen, NO. Our pet-friendly hotel is also near the Hordamuseet folk museum, University of Bergen, Bergen Museum, Bergen Aquarium and the Hanseatic Museum. Enjoy hotel amenities like free breakfast, free high-speed Internet, a restaurant and a business center with copy, print and fax services. All guest rooms have TVs, hair dryers and desks. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues. Please note that all Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are non-smoking properties. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more details. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no extra bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Magic Hotel Xhibition
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Magic Hotel Xhibition is situated in Bergen, 1 km from Rosenkrantz Tower and 1.1 km from Haakon's Hall. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The property is 1.6 km from Møhlenpris Badeplass Beach, and within 100 metres of the city centre. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Some rooms have a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. Guests at Magic Hotel Xhibition will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bergen, like hiking. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Bergen University, University Museum of Bergen and Hanseatic Museum. The nearest airport is Bergen, Flesland Airport, 17 km from Magic Hotel Xhibition.

name: Quality Hotel Edvard Grieg
description: As soon as you land at the nearby Bergen Airport, drop your bags off at our smoke-free Quality Inn Edvard Grieg hotel in Bergen to start your Norwegian adventure. Our pet-friendly hotel is located near popular attractions like the Troldhaugen, Leos Playland, Vannkanten, Fana Golf and the Lagunen Shopping Center. Enjoy hotel amenities such as a business center, copy and fax machines, a restaurant and bar, free breakfast, a computer with Internet, free WiFi, an exercise room, a newsstand, a sunday brunch and valet dry cleaning. Guest rooms come with flat-screen TVs, hair dryers, desks, irons and ironing boards. Some rooms feature coffee makers.Choice Hotels

name: Hotel Norge by Scandic
address: Nedre Ole Bulls Plass 4, 5807 Bergen, Hordaland
description: Strategically located in the middle of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Bergen. There is also a fitness centre with a swimming pool and a sauna. There are a range of facilities on offer to those staying at Hotel Norge by Scandic, including an express check-in and check-out feature, free Wi-Fi and a swimming pool. Couples will enjoy the hotel's features like vip rooms and honeymoon suites. After a day of exploring the nearby area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. All offer an en suite bathroom where a hair dryer can be found. Those staying at Hotel Norge by Scandic can enjoy a drink at Babel, after savouring a meal at Ole Bull. Guests can also try one of the many bars and restaurants in the local area. Bergen's attractions, such as University of Bergen, Bryggen and Grieg Hall, are within easy walking distance of Hotel Norge by Scandic. The surrounding area is also well known for its shops and boutiques.Revato

name: Comfort Hotel Bergen
description: This pet-friendly Comfort Hotel Bergen is near attractions like the Bergen Aquarium, the Torget i Bergen fish market, the Bergen Art Museum, the Norges Fiskerimuseum fishing history museum and the Hanseatic Wharf. Enjoy our famous Scandinavian buffet breakfast, which is included in most room rates. Other amenities include free breakfast and free WiFi. Business guests can appreciate our lobby computers, meeting rooms and fax and copy machine access. Guest rooms include hair dryers and TVs. Guest laundry facilities, a currency exchange, car rental service and a newsstand are all on hand as well.Choice Hotels

name: Magic Hotel & Apartments Kløverhuset
description: Located on top of Kløverhuset, Magic Hotel Kløverhuset offers modern accommodation in central Bergen. The UNESCO-listed Bryggen Wharf is 400 metres from the property. Guests can enjoy views of Bergen city centre while dining at the on-site restaurant. Magic Hotel Kløverhuset’s modern designer rooms include a flat-screen TV with cable channels. All rooms have a private bathroom equipped with a shower. Some rooms offer sea views. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Guests can relax and enjoy drinks at Magic Hotel Kløverhuset’s bar. There is also a luggage storage space at the property. Hurtigruten Terminal Bergen is 700 metres from Magic Hotel Kløverhuset, while Bergen University is 900 metres from the property. Bergen, Flesland Airport is 17 km away.

name: Scandic Ørnen
description: Strategically located in the centre of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Bergen. It also offers free Wi-Fi, a rooftop terrace and a coffee bar. This modern hotel provides luggage storage, a 24-hour reception and conference rooms. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to offer assistance. All the rooms at Scandic Ornen feature a refrigerator, a flat-screen TV and an alarm clock. All provide heating, a telephone and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Each morning, guests can wake up to breakfast at Aquila Restaurant or Roast Restaurant and Bar. In the evening, guests are invited to enjoy a drink in the comfortable lounge bar. Guests can also try one of the many bars and restaurants in the vicinity. Scandic Ornen is conveniently located for sightseeing in Bergen with Grieg Hall and Bergen Cathedral within a 10-minute walk. The hotel also provides parking for guests.Revato

Those staying at the hotel can enjoy a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, conveniently located for those who want to stay close by when looking to sit down to a meal. Breakfast is available on request.Revato

description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Collection Hotel Havnekontoret in Bergen, NO near the Rosenkrantz Tower. There are a range of amenities available to guests of Scandic Neptun, including meeting rooms, free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. Corporate facilities include a business centre. Scandic Neptun has 270 rooms that are filled with everything required for a comfortable stay. Each have a living area and a variety of entertainment options, including a flat-screen TV. Guests of Scandic Neptun can relax at the in-house bar, conveniently situated for socialising in the evening. The hotel is ideally located for exploring Bergen with Bergenhus Fortress within walking distance. The Hakonshallen, University of Bergen and Bryggen are also found within 20 minutes' walk.Revato

name: Scandic Bergen City
description: Centrally located, Scandic Bergen City offers easy access to Bergen's main sightseeing and retail areas. It also provides free Wi-Fi, luggage storage and meeting rooms. Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms offer a flat-screen TV, a desk and a seating area. They all come with a private bathroom that has a hair dryer. During their stay at Scandic Bergen City, guests can enjoy a meal at Amalie, which serves local and international dishes. Guests can also try one of the many bars and restaurants in the area. Bergen's attractions, such as University of Bergen and Grieg Hall, are within easy walking distance of the hotel. Guests can also easily visit Bryggen and Bergenhus Fortress.Revato

name: Sure Hotel Studio by Best Western, Ole Bull
description: Welcome to Sure Hotel Studio by Best Western, Ole Bull! Our Ole Bull hotel and apartments is the perfect option if you want freedom, regardless of whether you are travelling for work or leisure. We offer our guests lovely, fully-equipped hotel apartments in the heart of Bergen’s beautiful city center – ideal if you want a safe and comfortable stay close to all services! Breakfast is not included, but you can prepare food in all the hotel apartments. Every one of our hotel apartments are fully equipped kitchens with a coffee maker, kettle, oven or hob, dishwasher, and refrigerator, or in some cases a refrigerator/freezer. They all have a sofa and chair set. The biggest rooms and apartments have their own dining table. All rooms have free Wi-Fi and brand-new television with casting. You will find towels and bed linen in the apartment when you arrive, as well as soap and shampoo. Your apartment will include a hair dryer, iron and ironing board. In addition, you can use the washing machine and tumble dryer in the laundry room on the second floor. None of the apartments have a telephone. Ole Bull Scene, one of Norway's best venues for shows, is right next door to the hotel. As well as enjoying the most exciting shows, it offers wonderful culinary experiences in Storm Brasserie and the chance to unwind in Storm Bar, which has its own terrace. In the autumn of 2021, we will start offering special accommodation packages that include shows! All our hotel apartments will be named after famous performers and shows at Ole Bull Scene, or other cultural activities in Bergen, and they will be decorated accordingly. We want our guests to feel that they are in the heart of the vibrant cultural scene that surrounds our hotel!bestwestern.com

name: Bergen Camping Park
description: Situated 13 km from Haakon's Hall, Bergen Camping Park features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Some accommodation includes a terrace and a cable flat-screen TV, as well as seating area. A outdoor play equipment is also available for guests at the campground. Rosenkrantz Tower is 13 km from Bergen Camping Park, while Bergen University is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bergen, Flesland Airport, 28 km from the accommodation.

name: Det Hanseatiske Hotel
description: Located in a 16th century building the heart of Bergen, next door to the Hanseatic Museum, is Det Hanseatiske Hotel. It offers unique rustic-style rooms decorated in dark, velvety colours and patterns. The quaint Hanseatiske Hotel feature rooms with centuries-old timber walls, wooden furniture and leather sofas. Most rooms have bathtubs and separate showers. Free Internet access is available. Finnegårdsstuene Restaurant offers fine dining in an intimate and stylish 17th century atmosphere. Casa Del Toro offers Mexican dishes. The hotel is part the UNESCO World Heritage Bryggen district. Fløibanen Funicular is a 2-minute walk away.

name: Scandic Torget Bergen
description: Providing an ideal base for those wishing to discover Bergen's nightlife, the hotel features a 24-hour reception and views of Bergen Fish Market and Floyen. It is ideally situated in the city centre. There are a variety of facilities available to those staying at Scandic Torget Bergen, including laundry facilities, free Wi-Fi and luggage storage. It also offers a dry cleaning service, a wake-up service and a shop where necessities can be purchased. Each comfortable room at Scandic Torget Bergen features an alarm clock, a flat-screen TV and a refrigerator, as well as all the essentials required for an enjoyable stay. They all offer a telephone, heating and a desk. Those staying at the hotel can enjoy a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, suitably based for those who want to stay nearby for a meal. A buffet breakfast is served each morning. A selection of eating options are also available in close proximity to the property. Scandic Torget Bergen is ideally located for exploring Bergen with the Den Nationale Scene and Bryggen within a 10-minute walk. The hotel is positioned within a short walk of Bergen Railway Station.Revato

name: Bergen Hostel Montana
description: HI Bergen Hostel Montana is situated up the hillside of Mount Ulriken, about 3.6 km from Bergen City Centre and easily accessed by public transportation. A grocery store and different hiking trails are located next to the hostel. Free parking is available for our guests. This Quality and Sustainability certified property welcomes backpackers, groups and families to the international community of travelers all year round. It offers guests a wide range of accommodation in the modern and recently renovated rooms. From private single, double, triple and quadruple rooms to shared dorms. A complete all-you-can-eat breakfast buffet is included. Bed linen and towels can be rented for a fee. Alternatively, you can bring your own linen for free. Wi-Fi, laundry room and a well equipped guest kitchen will ensure a comfortable stay at HI Bergen Hostel Montana. Guests can relax in the TV lounge, or play football in the common room. International volunteers organize free activities for guests such as hikes, games, BBQ’s, sightseeing, music and a daily free Coffee and Cookies activity. Guests can also use the spacious outdoor areas with BBQ facilities and a view.

name: Radisson Blu Royal Hotel, Bergen
description: Within a two minute walk of Bryggen, Radisson Blu Royal Hotel Bergen is set in the heart of Bergen. It is close to the Hanseatic Museum and Schotstuene, shops and nightlife options. Radisson Blu Royal has a fitness centre with a sauna and a steam room. For a fast and effortless check-in and departure experience, guests can take advantage of the express check-in/check-out facility. After a day of exploring the local area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all include a mini bar, a private bathroom and converters/voltage adaptors. Guests of Radisson Blu Royal Hotel can enjoy breakfast at Madam Felle, plus dinner at 26 North Restaurant & Social Club after a day of sightseeing. A wide variety of eating options are also available in the area. Bergen's attractions, such as the Hakonshallen and Floibanen, are easily accessible on foot from Radisson Blu Royal Hotel, Bergen. The hotel also offers parking for those travelling by car.Revato

name: Scandic Kokstad
description: Situated in Bergen, Scandic Kokstad offers contemporary 4-star accommodation, as well as a sauna. It also provides meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and free bicycle rental. Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms at Scandic Kokstad offer a desk, heating and a flat-screen TV. They all feature ironing facilities and a telephone. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to have a meal. In the evening, guests are invited to relax in the lounge bar.Revato

name: Thon Hotel Bergen Airport
description: Thon Hotel Bergen Airport is 2.5 km from Bergen Flesland Airport and a 15-minute drive from central Bergen. It offers rooms with free WiFi and a breakfast buffet. The rooms include a writing desk, cable TV and a minibar. Tea and coffee-making facilities are provided in each room. Restaurant offers a French-inspired menu as well as classic Norwegian dishes. A light menu and evening cocktails are served in the hotel’s sleek bar. Thon Hotel Bergen Airport also has a fitness centre and squash courts. Thon Hotel Bergen Airport is an environmentally friendly hotel and is registered with the Eco-Lighthouse programme.

name: Floating House Bergen
description: Close to snorkeling, fishing, and more, this smoke-free houseboat brings it all within reach. With convenient uncovered onsite parking, you'll be ready to make the 21-minute drive to Hurtigruten Terminal or the 22-minute drive to Torgalmenningen Square. Relax in the garden (enjoy the children's pool!) or sip a drink on the balcony or patio of this houseboat. For a change of scenery, come inside and enjoy the free WiFi and TV. A living room, a dining area, premium bedding, and air conditioning are featured at this 1-bedroom rental. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, towels, and shampoo. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, a stovetop, and a refrigerator, as well as a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave. And you can even pack a bit lighter because there's a washer and dryer.Expedia

name: Moxy Bergen
description: Overlooking the sea, Moxy Bergen offers a sustainable hotel with an impeccable view in the Gateway to the Fjords of Norway. Moxy Hotels welcomes you to Bergen, a World Heritage City with unspoiled nature and picturesque outdoor life. Travel to Bergen in style with Moxy Hotels and enjoy a waterfront location in the business communities of Solheimsviken and Marineholmen. Enter your room keylessly, revel in abundant USB plugins, free WiFi, a 55 inch TV with Chromecast, gym access and designer bath amenities. Moxy is an energetic alternative to the typical hotel experience in Bergen, proving that choosing affordability does not mean sacrificing style and comfort. The Moxy Crew is ready to mix the drinks that you love, point you in the direction of places to visit in Bergen and give you insider advice on what you must see and do in Norways second largest city. What is more Moxy is your sustainable hotel choice in Bergen with leading sustainability certificates a perfect match for your eco travel goals.Marriott

name: Bratland Camping

The nearest airport is Bergen, Flesland Airport, 19 km from the accommodation.

Bergen Aquarium is a 10-minute walk away. The rooms feature a flat-screen TV with streaming services via Cromecast. All rooms have a private bathroom with bath or shower and a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy a home-made breakfast every morning in the dining room. Relaxation options include a garden. The staff can help arrange sightseeing and guided city walks. Byparken Park is a 10-minute walk away. Fløibanen Funicular and the UNESCO-listed Bryggen Wharf are both 2 km away from Hotel Klosterhagen.

Tromsø Lufthavn Airport is less than 10 minutes’ drive from the hotel, while the Hurtigruten Ferry Terminal is only 400 metres away.

name: Kræmarvika Lodge

This chalet provides air-conditioned accommodation with a patio. The chalet with a terrace and sea views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a hot tub. Towels and bed linen are offered in the chalet. The chalet offers a picnic area. Skiing is possible within the area and Kræmarvika Lodge offers ski storage space. Tromsø City Hall is 19 km from the accommodation, while The Polar Museum is 19 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tromsø, Langnes Airport, 15 km from Kræmarvika Lodge.
