Oslo city centre is a 20-minute train ride away. All rooms at Radisson Hotel & Conference Centre Oslo Airport feature modern Scandinavian interior design. Each room includes a work desk and a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Gamo Bar & Grill offers gourmet burgers and other grilled dishes. The on-site bar is a relaxing environment for a fancy cocktail, fine wine or afternoon coffee. The breakfast buffet is available from 05:00.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden
description: Get together at the pet-friendly Clarion Collection Hotel Tollboden in Drammen, Norway near the Port of Drammen, a freshwater port located at the northern end of the Drammen Fjordand east of the Drammen River. Nearby attractions include Drammens Museum, the Spiralen Open-Air Museum and Buskerud University College. Amenities include free organic breakfast, light evening buffet, free coffee, 24-hour tea and fruit, sauna, fitness center and meeting room. All rooms have cable television. Hair dryers, irons and ironing boards are available for guest use. Handicap accessible rooms are available. Book now. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Please note that all Choice hotels in Scandinavia are 100% non-smoking properties. Pet charge: 200 kr per stay.Choice Hotels

name: Quality Hotel Grand Larvik
description: Come and experience the luxury that abounds at the pet-friendly Quality Hotel Grand Larvik. Centrally located within walking distance to the Larvik Town Square, where visitors can meet, shop and eat. The Herregarden is a museum that is open daily and is also within walking distance. Enjoy hotel amenities like copy and fax machines, a dinner and dancing establishment, free full breakfast, a restaurant and bar, afternoon tea, guest laundry facilities, a convention center, room service, meeting space and more. Stay with us at the Quality Hotel Grand Larvik, where our beautifully decorated rooms will wrap you in luxury for your stay in Larvik.Choice Hotels

name: Radisson Blu Mountain Resort, Beitostolen
description: Radisson Blu Resort Beitostølen is located 900 metres above sea level and offers panoramic views of the surrounding mountains and valleys. This hotel is centrally situated in Beitostølen ski resort, 20 km from Jotunheimen National Park. Cross-country and downhill ski trails are only 100 metres from the hotel. All the hotel rooms at Radisson Blu Resort Beitostølen feature satellite TV and a free WiFi. Some rooms offer tea and coffee making facilities. Guests are welcome to use Blu Resort Beitostølen’s fitness centre, which includes a 25-metre pool and sauna. The apartments at Radisson Blu Resort Beitostølen are located 200 metres from the main hotel building. These are self-contained with a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom with a sauna. Guests staying at the apartments have access to the main hotel's fitness and spa centre, but for an extra fee.

name: Gausta View
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a refrigerator and free WiFi, as well as a TV and streaming services. Other amenities include laundry facilities, an electric kettle, a wardrobe or closet, and a dining table.Expedia

name: Quality Hotel Strand Gjovik
description: No description found

name: Highland Lodge
description: This hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Geilo Train Station. It offers a gym, sauna and pool. Original Edvard Munch prints and Hardanger Mountain views are featured in the restaurant or café. Free WiFi and private bathrooms are standard in Highland Lodge’s individually decorated rooms. Snow-kiting and dog sleighing, plus cross-country or downhill skiing are popular area activities. A bakery, bar and restaurant are found in the same building. Nearby is the picturesque Hardanger Plateau, a 3,400 km² national park with many rivers, lakes and waterfalls.

name: Best Western Plus Oslo Airport
description: Best Western Plus Oslo Airport is located only three kilometers from the airport terminal at Oslo Gardermoen Airport and amongst other things we have a top modern conference department with up-to-date meeting rooms, a really pleasant lounge which is always open for all our guests and a brand new restaurant with bar. We are proud to call our outdoor seating the nicest one at Gardermoen and it is open for both breakfast, dinner and drinks the entire summer. We also have our own gym at the hotel, which is very spacious, filled with modern equipment and has a nice view of the forest right outside the hotel. If you wish to have an outdoor workout you will find a wonderful trail along the best conserved ravine-landscapes only 10 minutes from our hotel. We take pride in the personal service we offer for all our guests and are of course always available for you at our front desk which is manned 24 hours every day. In our restaurant you will find that both preparation, presentation and composition of our food is the key for preparing the perfect meal for every single visitor. There is a shuttle bus leaving from the hotel every twentieth minute and the trip only takes six minutes. If you arrive by car we offer short and long term parking in our garage. Please contact us directly for availability and rates. We are looking forward to welcoming you here at the Best Western Plus Oslo Airport. We clean stay over rooms every 3 days during summer.bestwestern.com

name: Hotell Refsnes Gods - by Classic Norway Hotels
description: Housed in a 18th-century mansion on Jeløy island, Hotel Refsnes Gods features a large collection of Scandinavian art. Each room has a private bathroom and cable TV. WiFi and parking are free. All rooms at the historic Refsnes Gods feature a minibar, tea/coffee facilities and work desk. Some rooms include a seating area, while others have a private, furnished balcony overlooking the Oslofjord. Restaurant Munch has a well-stocked wine cellar and offers a wide variety of dishes including sea food. Breakfast is served daily. Guests enjoy access to a sauna and the hotel's beach. Other facilities include a large surrounding garden. Nearby activities include golf, fishing and diving. Moss city centre is situated 3 km from the hotel. Søndre Jeløya Nature Reserve is within 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

name: Scandic Oslo Airport
description: Scandic Oslo Airport is located in Gardermoen and features free Wi-Fi. It offers 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. This modern hotel provides meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and an express check-in and check-out feature. For families Scandic Oslo Airport offers a children's play area and a games room. The stylish rooms at Scandic Oslo Airport offer a flat-screen TV, an in-room safe and a private bathroom. They all have a desk, an in-room closet and ironing facilities. The hotel's restaurant is open for lunch, providing guests with an easy dining experience near their room. In the evening, guests are able to relax in the comfortable lounge bar. Located just a 10-minute walk from Scandic Oslo Airport is the Norwegian Armed Forces Aircraft Collection. The hotel also provides parking.Revato

name: Scandic Asker
description: This comfortable hotel in Asker offers free wireless internet, as well as meeting rooms and free bicycle rental. It provides 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. Scandic Asker Hotel provides 167 rooms, each with a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a refrigerator. There are also several rooms available for families. Scandic Asker houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to relax at the end of the day. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. A wide selection of eating options are also found in the surrounding area. The area surrounding Scandic Asker Hotel is popular for its shopping. It is also a short car ride from Oslo and Baerum.Revato

name: Trudvang Gjestegaard
description: No description found

name: Mølla Hotel
description: * Newly renovated Aksjemøllen by Classic Norway, has a unique atmosphere and charm. * Full refurbishment autumn 2021, this boutique hotel offers quality, personal service and stunning details that will amaze you. * All guest rooms are equipped with luxury Wonderland beds, high quality toiletries from Molton Brown, Nespresso coffee machines and tea products from Newby. * The hotel emphasizes the buildings unique history, and colors, moods and uniforms reflect the period of the early 20th century, when the mill activity in Lillehammer was high and essential in the growth of Lillehammer town. * In the cosy and stylish lobby, you can enjoy a local art gallery, while having refreshments from the lobby bar. You can also by local art and local glass products, if you are in a shopping mood. * In the neighborhood you will find real good restaurants, and the hotel has an own entrance to Egon restaurant, situated in the old grinding house. * The top floor Toppen Sky bar offers high quality cocktails and signature drinks, while enjoying the spectacular panorama view of Lillehammer Town with its ski jump towers on one side, Mesna river and lake Mjøsa on the other side. Experience Aksjemøllen by Classic Norway!

name: Origo Leilighetshotell
description: Origo Leilighetshotell features accommodation situated in Drammen, 44 km from Oslo Central Station and 44 km from Akershus Fortress. Complimentary WiFi is availablethroughout the property. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and a fridge, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. Sognsvann Lake is 47 km from the aparthotel, while Telenor Arena is 36 km from the property.

name: Scandic Fornebu
description: Located a short stroll from Aker Brygge Tramway Station, Scandic Fornebu offers guests an ideal base while visiting Baerum. The various facilities this modern hotel has to offer include a playground, free Wi-Fi and free bicycle rental. Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms at Scandic Fornebu Hotel have a desk, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. All offer ironing facilities, heating and a telephone. For guests who enjoy exploring local eateries, there is a great selection within walking distance. Ullevaal Stadion, Oslo City Hall and Holmenkollen Ski Jump are within a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Highland Lodge Fjellandsby
description: No description found

name: Vestlia Resort
description: Found next to Hardangervidda mountain plateau and only 2 km from Geilo Train Station, this ski-in ski-out hotel offers lodge-style guest rooms, free Wi-Fi and comprehensive spa and fitness facilities. Hotel Vestlia Resort was designed by renowned Norwegian architect Helene Hennie. The charming guest rooms have comfortable, stylish décor and furnishings. Vestlia Resort’s in-house restaurant serves seasonal Norwegian, Italian and French cuisine. Lighter dishes are offered in the cosy café-bar. After-ski drinks can be enjoyed by the open fire at Hunter’s Bar. Vestlia Resort’s spa provides luxury treatments and relaxation facilities. Guests can stay in shape by visiting the fully equipped fitness centre. The family-friendly Geilolia Ski Resort provides a large number of high-quality slopes and cross-country tracks for all skill levels. In the summer, guests can play a round of golf on Vestlia Resort’s 9-hole course, which is found next to the hotel.

name: Comfort Hotel Union Brygge - Drammen
description: Get rested and ready for anything at the Comfort Hotel Union Brygge - Drammen. Nestled along the banks of the Drammenselva River, we are near attractions like the Drammens Theater, Ypsilopn Thai Spa and shopping at the Magasiner and Gulskogen shopping malls. Amenities include free full breakfast, free WiFi, free coffee, an exercise room, restaurant and coffee lounge and three spacious banquet and meeting rooms. All of our guest rooms are air conditioned and are furnished with flat-screen TVs, desks and hair dryers. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Geilo Hotel
description: Situated in central Geilo, this hotel is just 150 metres from Geilo Alpine Centre. Free services include Wi-Fi, private parking and a ski shuttle service. All the brightly decorated rooms at Geilo Hotel have a TV and private bathroom with a shower. Some also feature a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Traditional Norwegian dishes are served as a buffet at the in-house restaurant with panoramic views of the Ustedalsfjord. Refreshing drinks can be enjoyed in the bar. Free Wi-Fi is available in guest lounges and meeting rooms. Relaxation options include free use of the sauna and steam bath. Guests can also make use of the hotel's ski storage room. Geilo Train and Bus Station is 1 km from the hotel. Rallarvegen, popular for cycling, is a 25-minute drive away.

name: Scandic Park Sandefjord
description: Scandic Park Sandefjord is situated in Sandefjord and is close to the area's popular attractions. It offers complimentary Wi-Fi, an indoor pool and a sauna. The hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. Corporate amenities include meeting rooms. Rooms at Scandic Park Sandefjord are well-appointed and offer a private bathroom, a telephone and a refrigerator. There are also a number of rooms geared towards families. Guests staying at Scandic Park Sandefjord can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently situated for those who want to stay close when looking for a bite to eat. In the evening, guests can relax in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide selection of dining options are also found in close proximity to the property. Scandic Park Sandefjord is within a short walk of the Sandefjord Museum. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Sandefjord Railway Station, which allows convenient access in and around Sandefjord.Revato

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Grand, Gjovik
description: Get together at the pet-friendly Clarion Collection Hotel Grand, Gjovik. Nearby attractions include Gjovik Glassverks, Gjovik University College. Gjovk borders Lake Mjosa with the towns of Hamar and Lillehammer. Our restaurant, Egon, serves lunch and dinner. Enjoy amenities like free full breakfast, banquet and meeting rooms and access to copy and fax services. Book now. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Please note that all Choice hotels in Scandinavia are 100% non-smoking properties. Pet charge: 200 kr per stay.Choice Hotels

name: Bardøla Fjelltun
description: Located at the popular Geilo Ski Resort, this hotel offers traditional Norwegian food and wine tasting in the cellar. Leisure options include an indoor pool and large indoor playground. Free Wi-Fi is available in all rooms at Bardøla Høyfjellshotell. Each room has satellite TV, while some also include a balcony. Staff can help arrange ski passes to the Slaatta Ski Centre, which is 900 metres away. After a day in the slopes, guests can enjoy a game of billiards in Bardøla’s bar. A 30-minute drive away is the Hardangervidda National Park, which offers plenty of hiking trails. On-site parking is free for guests.

name: Klara
description: Located just 31 km from Oseberg Kulturhus, Klara offers accommodation in Sandefjord with access to a garden, a shared lounge, as well as a shared kitchen. This bed and breakfast provides free private parking, free shuttle service and free WiFi. Towels and bed linen are provided in the bed and breakfast. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy hiking nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Preus Museum is 46 km from Klara, while Telemark Kanal is 47 km away. The nearest airport is Sandefjord, Torp Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Gamlebyen Hotell - Fredrikstad
description: Set in central Fredrikstad in the Old Town, surrounded by shops, museums and markets, this hotel is 150 metres from the Old Town Ferry Terminal. Guests can enjoy free WiFi and free bike rental. Gamlebyen Hotell - Fredrikstad's rooms are individually decorated in a classic style. All feature antique furniture, and some guest rooms offer views of the Old Town. Facilities include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Guests can relax in the garden with a drink from the bar. A continental breakfast is served at the neighbouring restaurant, Gamlebyen Gjestgiveri, where Gamlebyen Hotell - Fredrikstad's guests are offered discounts on some lunch and dinner dishes. Fredrikstad's main street, Nygaardsgata, is just a 10-minute walk and free ferry ride away. Fredrikstad Museum is 250 metres from the property.

name: Quality Hotel Alesund
address: Sorenskriver Bulls Gate 7, Ålesund, Møre og Romsdal
description: Enjoy a variety of amenities and friendly service when you stay at our pet-friendly Quality Hotel in Alesund, NO. Amenities include free WiFi, free full breakfast, meeting space, a fitness center and a restaurant and lounge. Guest rooms feature flat-screen TVs, coffee makers, hair dryers and irons and ironing boards. Our property is located close to the Atlantic Sea-Park and other popular attractions, including Fjellstua, Sandvika Storsenter, Kremmergaarden, AMFI Moa Shopping Mall and Devoldfabrikken. Make the most of your time when you book a room at our affordable hotel in Alesund, NO. There is also the chance to earn points with our Choice Privileges Rewards program, which can be redeemed for rewards like free nights, gift cards and more.Choice Hotels

name: Scandic Parken
description: Located in Alesund, Scandic Parken is an easy drive from Alesund Aquarium and Sukkertoppen. It provides free Wi-Fi, a sauna and meeting rooms. The rooms at Scandic Parken have a private bathroom, a mini bar and a flat-screen TV. They all offer a seating area, an in-room closet and a desk. Scandic Parken provides a range of dining options, including Brasserie Normandie and Lobby Bar. Places to dine at the hotel include Galleri Flora and Polarbjørn. Guests are also able to try one of the many bars and restaurants in the area. Scandic Parken is close to Alesund's famous attractions, with the Jugendstilsenteret and Alesund Harbour just a 10-minute stroll away. For guests travelling by car, parking is available on site and Skodje is a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Scandic Lillestrøm
description: Situated only a five-minute stroll from Lillestrom Railway Station, the hotel offers guests a convenient base when visiting Lillestrom. It provides 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. There are a variety of amenities at Scandic Lillestrom that guests can enjoy, including free Wi-Fi, meeting rooms and a fitness centre. The front desk operates around the clock and the friendly staff can recommend places to visit and provide other tourist information. Rooms at Scandic Lillestrom are comfortable and feature an in-room closet, a refrigerator and a flat-screen TV. Each have an in-room safe, a desk and a private bathroom with a shower. During their stay at Scandic Lillestrom, guests can dine at Bruket Restaurant and relax with a drink at Bruket Bar. The hotel has easy access to Lillestrom Stadion. For guests with a car, there is public parking nearby.Revato

name: Storebaug Hotell & Kro
description: Storebaug Hotell & Kro offers a 24 hour reception, free parking on site and rooms with free WiFi access. Rooms at Storebaug Hotell & Kro are located on opposite sides of the E6 motorway. All guest rooms include heated floors, and some have seating areas. Storebaug Hotell & Kro in-house restaurant serves a variety of dishes based on local seasonal ingredients. A buffet breakfast is served every day. Drinks and snacks can be enjoyed in the bar. The hotel is located just 5 km from the coastal town of Moss, with its shops and restaurants. Moss & Rygge Golf Club is a 17-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Radisson Red Hotel, Oslo Airport
address: Henrik Ibsens veg (Building A), Gardermoen, Akershus
description: Radisson RED, Oslo Airport has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Gardermoen. The property is around 49 km from Oslo Central Station, 50 km from Akershus Fortress and 47 km from Munch Museum. The accommodation offers room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Botanical Garden is 47 km from the hotel, while Oslo Bus Terminal is 48 km from the property. The nearest airport is Oslo Airport, a few steps from Radisson RED, Oslo Airport.

name: Trolltun Hotel & Hytter
description: This hotel lies in the village of Dombås and overlooks the Dovrefjell Mountains. It offers free Wi-Fi, free private parking as well as cross-country skiing tracks and mountain hiking trails. All guest rooms at Trolltun Gjestegård have satellite TV and a work desk. Many guest rooms also have a seating area and views of the surrounding mountains and valleys. Trolltun’s in-house restaurant serves à la carte dishes. A bar and a terrace are also found on site. General facilities at Trolltun Gjestegård include a sauna, ski rental and a ski waxing room.

name: Gardermoen Hotel Bed & Breakfast
description: Gardermoen Hotel Bed & Breakfast is situated a 7-minute drive from Oslo Airport, Gardermoen. It offers free short-term parking during the stay, free WiFi and guest rooms with a flat-screen TV. Guests can enjoy an early buffet breakfast each morning. Dinner and light dishes are served at all times. Meals can be enjoyed in the bright conservatory. Gardermoen Business Park is 8.3 km away from the property. Jessheim town centre is 13 km away. Airport shuttle service can be arranged by Gardermoen Hotel Bed & Breakfast for a fee.

name: Quality Hotel Sogndal
description: The pet-friendly Quality Hotel Sogndal is a modern hotel situated in the center of Sogndal on the Sognefjord. The Jostedalsbreen glacier, Flam Railway and the Naeofjord are nearby. Enjoy hotel amenities like free continental breakfast, restaurants, a bar, a conference center, guest laundry facilities, copy and fax machines, a newsstand, free parking, a currency exchange, a billiard room and plenty more. All guest rooms have TVs. In addition, irons and ironing boards are available at the front desk. Make the Quality Hotel Sogndal your home away from home. We have everything you need to make your stay in the Sogndal an enjoyable one.Choice Hotels

name: Thon Partner Elgstua
description: Located just a 10 minutes' drive from the Norwegian Forestry Museum and the ruins of Christiansfjell Fortress, Thon Partner Elgstua offers accomodation in Elverum. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Elverum Station. WiFi and parking are free. Flat-screen TVs and private bathrooms with showers are standard at Elgstua. The modern décor is influenced by Norwegian nature. Fresh, seasonal produce is used in the Elgstua Restaurant’s hearty home-cooked dishes. Guests can enjoy the open fireplace during winter or have a cold drink on the terrace during summer. Wine, cognac and whiskey tasting can be arranged in the lobby bar. Apline and cross-country skiing, swimming, fishing and golf are also popular area activities. Hamar city centre is 30 km away. Oslo Airport Gardermoen is a 1.5 hour drive from the eco-friendly Thon Partner Elgstua.

name: Lillehammer Turistsenter Camping
description: No description found

name: Dr. Holms Hotel
description: Centrally located in the ski resort of Geilo, Dr. Holms hotel offers free WiFi, free parking and a range of spa facilities. Geilo Train Station is 300 metres away. All guest rooms at Hotel Dr. Holms include cable TV and a private bathroom with shower. Most guest rooms offer mountain or forest views. The Dr. Holms Spa includes swimming pools, hot tubs and saunas. Guests can also stay active in the fitness room. The hotel library is the perfect atmosphere to unwind in, featuring an open fireplace. Classical Norwegian dishes are served at Brasserie Restaurant. Fast food can be enjoyed with a game of bowling in the 1950s-inspired Bowl & Dine. Guests can also relax with a newspaper and a cup of coffee at Café Lobby. The surrounding area is excellent for skiing and hiking. Slaatta Ski Centre is less than 200 metres away.

name: Strand Fjordhotel
description: Situated in Ulvik, this hotel has a spacious, waterfront terrace with vast views of the Hardangerfjord. Guests enjoy free WiFi access. Meals and drinks can be enjoyed in the on-site restaurant and bar. Strand Fjordhotel’s classically decorated rooms, all with fjord views, feature a work desk and bathroom. A common TV lounge is found on site. Strand Fjordhotel’s staff can help guests book sightseeing tours. Other area activities, such as hiking, fishing and cycling can also be arranged. Voss is 45 km away.

name: Finnøy Bryggehotell - by Classic Norway Hotels
description: Overlooking the Norwegian Sea, this property is at the northern tip of Finnøy Island. It offers a fish restaurant, free Wi-Fi and a gym, sauna and indoor pool. Housed in traditional buildings, Finnøy Bryggehotell's modern guest rooms feature a TV and a seating area. All offer panoramic sea views. Some rooms include a kitchenette. The in-house restaurant is decorated in a maritime style. The bar section is a nice place for an after-dinner drink. Ferries for Fjørtoft and Dryna depart from the Myklebust Ferry Terminal, about 10 km from Finnøy Bryggehotell.

name: Sola Strand Hotel
description: Located a 15-minute drive from Stavanger, this hotel offers direct access to the 2.5 km long Solastranden Beach. It features a popular beach bar, large sun terraces and a modern spa. The bright and airy rooms of Sola Strand Hotel feature modern décor, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Free tea and coffee-making facilities are provided in each room. Large lunch buffets are served at the Montroyal Restaurant, which is set in a refurbished cigar room from an early 1900s cruise ship. Sola Strand’s à la carte restaurant offers seasonal specialities. For relaxation, the Nordsjøbadet Spa offers saunas, a cold water plunge pool and an indoor swimming pool. Treatments include soothing facials and algae body wraps. Guests can try windsurfing or borrow a bicycle on site during summer.

name: Comfort Hotel Kristiansand
description: This pet-friendly Comfort Hotel Kristiansand is conveniently located within walking distance of Kristiansand Domkirke cathedral. This Kristiansand, Norway hotel is minutes from the Kristiansand Zoo and Amusement Park, the Sorlandets Kunstmuseum contemporary art museum and the Vest-Agder Fylkesmuseum. Enjoy amenities like free breakfast. Corporate travelers will appreciate access to copy and fax services and our meeting room, which accommodates up to 20 people. A currency exchange and a newsstand are located on the property as well. Guest rooms come with TVs and some include trouser pressers.Choice Hotels

name: Thon Hotel Otta
description: Situated in the town of Otta in the Gudbrandsdal Valley, Thon PartnerHotel Otta offers free Wi-Fi, free parking and rooms with a TV. Otta Train Station is 200 metres away. All guest rooms at Thon PartnerHotel Otta feature a private bathroom with shower. Most rooms include a work desk while some have a sofa. Norwegian and international dishes based on seasonal produce are served in the relaxing atmosphere of the in-house restaurant. Drinks can be enjoyed in the bar, which features an open fireplace. Leisure facilities include a pool table and a gym. The staff can help arrange activities like hiking, fishing and rafting at River Sjoa. Jørundgård Medieval Centre is 10 km away. Rondane National Park is a 25-minute drive away.

name: Thon Partner Hotel Sandnes
description: Thon Hotel Sandnes is located by Gands Fjord in Sandnes, 12 minutes’ drive from central Stavanger. It offers free Wi-Fi and parking as well as free sauna and gym access. All guest rooms at Thon Sandnes are equipped with a private bathroom, a TV and a tea/coffee maker. Most guest rooms offer fjord views, and some also have a work desk and a seating area. Forus Business Park and Kvadrat shopping centre are both only a 5-minute drive from Thon Hotel Sandnes, and the Kongeparken leisure park is just 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Quality Hotel Grand, Kongsberg
description: The pet-friendly Quality Hotel Grand, Kongsberg is ideally located within walking distance of the Norwegian Mining Museum. This hotel is also minutes from the Kongsberg Ski Museum, Royal Norwegian Mint Museum, Kongsberg Industry Museum and the famous silver mines. Enjoy hotel amenities like a cafe, free full breakfast, a restaurant, free weekday newspapers, an indoor pool, meeting space, a hot tub, copy and fax machines, a sauna, a massage therapist, guest laundry facilities, a currency exchange and more. Guest rooms have hair dryers, robes and desks. In addition, some rooms have computer hook-ups.Choice Hotels

name: Sæteråsen Hytter & Camping Trysil
description: Peacefully located in the forest in the Hedmark Region, this property is 8 km from ski slopes in Trysil and can be easily accessed from the road between Oslo and Trysil. It offers free WiFi and cottages with a kitchenette. A stovetop, fridge and electric kettle are featured in all accommodation options at Sæteråsen Hytter & Camping Trysil. Each has a seating area, while some also have a dining area and terrace. Bathroom facilities are shared. Guests can rent a barbecue and relax on the shared terrace. During winter season, guests can enjoy the fireplace in Sæteråsen Hytter & Camping Trysil's common room. Popular area activities hiking, cycling, fishing, along with moose safaris. There are also cross country ski trails that go directly to Trysil from the property. Free private parking is possible onsite. Lillehammer is 145 km from Sæteråsen Hytter & Camping Trysil.

name: Scandic Stavanger Airport
description: Scandic Stavanger Airport provides 4-star accommodation in Sola, just moments from Stavanger Airport Sola. It has a day spa, as well as a sauna, meeting rooms and a 24-hour reception. Each modern room at Scandic Stavanger Airport comes with a refrigerator and tea and coffee making facilities, and the bathrooms feature hair dryers and showers. They provide a flat-screen TV, an in-room safe and an in-room closet. Scandic Stavanger Airport's restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner and is a convenient place for those who want to stay close to everything the property has on offer. Each evening, guests are able to enjoy a drink in the comfortable lounge bar. The hotel is an ideal base to explore Gamle Stavanger, Statoil and University of Stavanger, as well as everything the local area has to offer. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Sola.Revato

name: Lindstrøm Hotel
description: Lindstrøm Hotel is located in the village of Lærdalsøyri on the picturesque Sognefjord. Guests can enjoy free Wi-Fi, an on-site souvenir shop and a hotel restaurant. All bedrooms at Lindstrøm feature a private tiled bathroom and cable TV. Rooms are either located in Swiss style period annexe or in the modern main building, with lawned gardens surrounding them. The hotel has a bar and a restaurant open daily and meals vary between buffet style and set menus. The village also has a selection of restaurants and shops. Flåm and its famous railway journey through the rugged mountains lies only 40 km from Lindstrøm. Staff can help organise fjord cruises and there are many hiking opportunities in the area surrounding the hotel. Bergen is a 3-hour drive away and Sogndal Airport is 1 hour’s drive away.

name: Quality Airport Hotel Stavanger
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our Quality Hotel Stavanger Airport in Sola, NO near the Sola Golf Club, Sola Beach, Stavanger Storsenter shopping mall and the Forus Naeringspark industrial center. Our pet-friendly hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free breakfast, WiFi, a health club and meeting space, to name a few. Guest rooms come with refrigerators and hair dryers. Get more value at our Quality Hotel Stavanger Airport. Book now. Please note that all Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are non-smoking properties. Pet accommodations are available for a small fee, contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Grand Hotel - by Classic Norway Hotels
description: Situated on a hill in central Åndalsnes, Grand Hotel Bellevue offers panoramic views over the Romsdalsfjord. It has a restaurant and bar. Wi-Fi and on-site parking are free. All guest rooms include a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with shower. The in-house restaurant serves traditional Norwegian dishes based on fresh, locally sourced ingredients. During summer, guests can enjoy their meals on the terrace. Grand Hotel Bellevue is about 55 km from Molde. Staff can help arrange fishing, hiking, boat trips and other recreation.

name: Scandic Kristiansand Bystranda
description: Current in its design, Scandic Kristiansand Bystranda is situated in a popular area of Kristiansand. It also offers meeting rooms, a playground and free Wi-Fi. Guests can make the most of the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the bar. Welcoming and helpful team members are available 24 hours a day. The hotel also has its very own gym, Swimming Pool. The stylish rooms at Scandic Kristiansand Bystranda offer heating, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. They all have a telephone, a radio and ironing facilities. The hotel's relaxed restaurant provides guests with a convenient place to dine before heading out to sample the nearby bars. Scandic Kristiansand Bystranda is conveniently situated for exploring Kristiansand with Otterdalsparken within a 10-minute walk. Guests are able to discover the district with the hotel's hire bicycles.Revato

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Park
description: Enjoy spacious guest rooms, a central location and friendly service at our Clarion Collection Hotel in Halden, NO. Amenities include free WiFi, free full breakfast, a lounge bar, a fitness center, afternoon tea and bottled waters. Guest rooms include microwaves and refrigerators, sofa beds in select rooms, premium bedding, flat-screen TVs and coffee makers. As a hotel in Halden, NO with meeting space, we offer accommodations that are great for group travel, whether you are visiting the city for business or vacation. Our convenient location is near Fredriksten Festning, Tista Senter Shopping Mall, Remmen Kunnskapspark University, Remmen Svommehall and the Nordby Shoppingcenter. Get together with friends, family or colleagues at our hotel in Halden, NO. You can also earn extras, such as free nights and gift cards, with our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Scandic Kristiansund
description: Scandic Kristiansund provides comfortable 4-star accommodation in Kristiansund. It also features free Wi-Fi, a sauna and bicycle rental. The rooms at Scandic Kristiansund have a mini bar and all the essentials for an enjoyable stay. They all offer a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a desk. The hotel provides a varied dining experience, which include an elegant restaurant and a bar. A selection of dining options can also be found in close proximity to the property. The hotel is conveniently located for sightseeing in Kristiansund, with Tourist Information Office for Kristiansund and Nordmore just a short stroll away. Under a 15-minute drive away, Kristiansund Airport Kvernberget is within easy reach.Revato

name: Aktivitetsbyen Gamle Fredrikstad
description: No description found

name: Radisson Blu Caledonien Hotel, Kristiansand
description: Featuring views of the city, Radisson Blu Caledonien Hotel Kristiansand provides 4-star accommodation in Kristiansand. It is set in the area's popular nightlife district, about a five-minute walk from Otterdalsparken. There are a variety of amenities at Caledonien Hotel that guests can enjoy, including an express check-in and check-out feature, free Wi-Fi and a fitness centre. Corporate facilities include a business centre and meeting rooms. The rooms at Radisson Blu Caledonien Hotel feature a telephone and an in-room safe. En suites include either a bath or a shower. Radisson Blu Caledonien Hotel Kristiansand has its very own pub where patrons can socialise while enjoying a casual meal and a beverage. Eateries at the hotel include Telford and Brasserie C. Caledonien Hotel is ideally situated for sightseeing in Kristiansand with the Sorlandet Art Museum, the Kilden Performing Arts Centre and Kristiansand Cathedral within a 10-minute walk. Kristiansand Zoo and Amusement Park is only an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Scandic Haugesund
description: Contemporary in its design, Scandic Haugesund is situated in a popular area of Haugesund. Guests can also enjoy complimentary internet throughout the property. This modern hotel features a range of amenities, such as luggage storage, a 24-hour reception and bicycle rental. There are a variety of adventurous activities, including hiking, meaning all family members will have an enjoyable stay. Just minutes from nearby clubs and bars, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover what the local nightlife has to offer. The rooms at Scandic Haugesund feature an in-room safe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. They provide ironing facilities, a desk and heating. Scandic Haugesund features a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to unwind at the end of the day. Every morning a buffet breakfast is prepared in the breakfast room. A wide selection of dining options are also found close by. Haugesund's well-known attractions and landmarks are within close proximity to the hotel, with Haugesund Town Hall just a 10-minute walk away. It also provides a convenient location to discover nearby Kopervik and Akrehamn.Revato

name: Frichs Ekspress Hotel
address: Øran Øst, 6300 Åndalsnes, Møre og Romsdal
description: Situated in Åndalsnes, 31 km from The Romsdalsfjord, Frichs Ekspress Åndalsnes features accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a terrace. The property is non-smoking and is located 37 km from Kylling Bridge and Vermafossen waterfall. At the hotel, the rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms have a safety deposit box. Guests at Frichs Ekspress Åndalsnes will be able to enjoy activities in and around Åndalsnes, like hiking, skiing and cycling. The nearest airport is Molde, Årø Airport, 56 km from the accommodation.

name: Quality Hotel Maritim
description: Quality Hotel Maritim provides comfortable 4-star accommodation in Haugesund. It has a fitness centre, as well as a sauna, an express check-in and check-out feature and free Wi-Fi. Quality Hotel Maritim features 311 rooms that are filled with everything necessary for an enjoyable stay. Guests of Quality Hotel Maritim can sit down to breakfast each morning at SØNDAGSBUFFET, as well as dinner at Naustet Restaurant after a day of sightseeing. Eateries at the hotel include Café Rene and Restaurant Gallionen. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and restaurants in the local area. Haugesund's well-known attractions and landmarks are within close proximity to Quality Hotel Maritim, with Haugesund Town Hall just a 10-minute stroll away. For guests with a car, parking is available on site and Karmoy is within easy driving distance of the hotel.Revato

name: Scandic Seilet
description: Boasting a sauna, Scandic Seilet is situated in Molde and offers comfortable accommodation. It provides complimentary Wi-Fi, meeting rooms and a playground. The luxurious feel of each room at Scandic Seilet is complemented by facilities like mini bars. All offer a telephone, a radio and a private bathroom. Those staying at the hotel can indulge in a beverage at Masta Skybar, after enjoying a meal at Restaurant Seilet. A generous buffet breakfast is on offer each morning. Scandic Seilet is conveniently situated for exploring Molde with Aker Stadion within a 10-minute walk. The hotel also provides parking for guests with a car.Revato

name: Scandic Sørlandet
description: Scandic Sorlandet provides 4-star accommodation in Kristiansand. Offering complimentary wireless internet, a restaurant and a swimming pool, the hotel is within a 10-minute walk of Kristiansand Zoo and Amusement Park. Scandic Sorlandet provides a garden to relax in, as well as free public parking on site. In fine weather, an outdoor terrace offers a nice place to relax. Guests also have the option of relaxing in the sauna. All the rooms at the hotel provide a mini bar, plus all the essentials for an enjoyable stay. They all offer a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. Guests can start the day with a buffet breakfast served every morning at Scandic Sorlandet. Scandic Sorlandet has disabled parking and is an easy drive from Sor Arena, the Agder Natural History Museum and Botanical Garden and Kristiansand Cathedral. Under a 15-minute car ride away, Kristiansand Airport Kjevik is easily accessible.Revato

name: Lysko Gjestegaard
description: Situated by the Larvik Fjord in central Larvik, this property offers free parking and rustic-style rooms with antique furnishings, free WiFi access and a flat-screen TV. Larvik Train Station is a 5-minute walk away. All the individually decorated rooms at Lysko Gjestegård feature wooden interiors. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. BBQ facilities and a children’s playground are found in the garden at Gjestegård Lysko. Fishing is possible in the Larvik Fjord, just 2 minutes’ walk away. Bølgen Culture House is 1 km away. Bøkeskogen Forest is a 13-minute walk away. Lysko Gjestegård offers free, secure parking for both bikes and motorcycles. A beach is found within 2 minutes' walk of the B&B.

name: Scandic Lillehammer Hotel
description: Scandic Lillehammer Hotel is set in Lillehammer and is within a short walk of nearby attractions, such as the Maihaugen. In addition to free public parking on site, the hotel offers comfortable 4-star rooms and a bar. Guests can enjoy Scandic Lillehammer Hotel's relaxation amenities, such as a swimming pool and a sauna, and keep fit at Gym. Complimentary Wi-Fi is provided for those who wish to stay online while travelling. The hotel also has its very own gym, Swimming Pool. The rooms have a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. There are also several rooms designed for families. Those staying at Scandic Lillehammer Hotel can enjoy a satisfying breakfast each morning at Salt & Pepper, plus dinner at Tre Diktere in the evening. Local attractions near Scandic Lillehammer Hotel include the Norwegian Post Museum, the Norwegian Olympic Museum and Lillehammer Olympiapark. It is within a 20-minute walk of Lillehammer Railway Station, which allows convenient access in and around Lillehammer.Revato

name: Hotel Klubben
description: Hotel Klubben provides modern 4-star accommodation in Tonsberg. It is set in the area's vibrant nightlife district, about a five-minute walk from Tonsberg Tourist Centre. There are a variety of facilities on offer to those staying at the hotel, including a 24-hour reception, a currency exchange and meeting facilities. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to offer local information. After a day of discovering the local area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They feature a mini bar, a flat-screen TV and a desk. Those staying at Hotel Klubben can enjoy a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, suitably situated for those who want to stay close by when looking to sit down to a meal. Each evening, guests are invited to enjoy a drink in the lounge bar. Hotel Klubben is close to Tonsberg Railway Station, making it easy for guests to discover Tonsberg and its surrounding areas. Horten Railway Station is within an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Scandic Sunnfjord Hotel & Spa
description: This full-service hotel is centrally located in Førde, in an area with stunning countryside, rich fishing waters, exciting glaciers and abundant cultural possibilities. Scandic Sunnfjord Hotel & Spa's inviting and well-equipped en suite guest rooms have TVs, phones, minibars and ironing facilities. There are both disabled and non-smoking rooms available. The renowned buffet at Restaurant Laxen is very popular with both guests and locals. On weekends guests can venture to the Barthold Bar for live music and the lobby bar Bartine is a nice place to meet up for a few drinks in good company. The Scandic Sunnfjord Hotel & Spa is one of Western Norway's leading conference hotels, with excellent facilities for meetings and events.

name: Trysil Hyttegrend
description: No description found

name: Motell Svinesundparken
description: Rooms Stay in one of 6 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Amenities Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. Additional features at this motel include concierge services, gift shops/newsstands, and a television in a common area. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location Located in Halden, Motell Svinesundparken is a 1-minute drive from Svinesund Infosenter and 6 minutes from Rød Herregård. This motel is 4.9 mi (7.9 km) from The Busterud Park and 5.1 mi (8.1 km) from Immanuels Church. Dining Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the motel's coffee shop/cafe. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Optional Charges Pet fee: NOK 200 per accommodation, per stay Early check-in is available for a fee (subject to availability) Late check-in fee: NOK 300 for check-in between 8:00 PM and 2:00 AM Late check-out fee: NOK 400 (subject to availability) Crib (infant bed) fee: NOK 300.0 per day Rollaway bed fee: NOK 600.0 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. name: Hordatun Hotel
description: Situated 4 km from Røldal Village, overlooking Lake Røldalsvatnet, Hordatun Hotel offers international cuisine and an on-site bar. Accommodation options include a balcony or terrace, and Wi-Fi and parking are free. Hotel Hordatun’s rooms feature tea and coffee making facilities, cable TV access and a seating area with sofa. Restaurant guests can enjoy their meals on the lake-view terrace. The ground-floor bar offers after ski and is an ideal place for drinks and mingling. Live music events are arranged every weekend from December until April. Hordatun is just 5 minutes’ drive from Røldal Ski Centre, and guests can buy ski passes and order ski lessons at reception. In addition, fishing gear and licenses as well as hiking trips can be arranged on site.

name: Førde Pensjonat
description: No description found

name: Radisson Blu Park Hotel, Oslo
description: Boasting free Wi-Fi and a private beach, Radisson Blu Park Hotel Oslo is located in Baerum and provides comfortable accommodation. It offers 4-star accommodation and views of the park. Guests travelling on business can benefit from a variety of facilities on offer at the hotel, such as a photocopier and business services. There is also a BBQ area on-site for guests to enjoy. Radisson Blu Park Hotel features 251 air conditioned rooms. Each comes with free tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom. Radisson Blu Park Hotel, Oslo's in-house restaurant provides local-inspired dishes, which can be served on the al fresco terrace. The pub serves European meals and a range of beverages. Radisson Park Hotel Oslo is within walking distance of Telenor Arena and Aker Solutions. The hotel also provides parking for guests with a vehicle.Revato

name: Notodden Hotel
description: Situated next to Torvet Main Square in central Notodden, this hotel is only 500 metres from Notodden Train Station. It offers free WiFi in public areas, as well as convenient access to outdoor recreation. All guest rooms at Notodden Hotel have classic décor. Each also has a work desk, cable TV and private bathroom with shower. Seasonal à la carte dishes can be enjoyed at the in-house restaurant. It also has a children’s playroom. The scenic Telemark region offers great opportunities for activities such as cross-country skiing, hiking and canoeing. Only 6 km from Notodden Hotel is Norway’s largest stave church, the 13th-century Heddal.

name: Birkebeineren Hotel & Apartments
description: Situated in Lillehammer, this property provides both guest room and apartment accommodation. It offers free WiFi and free sauna access. Hunderfossen Family Park and Hafjell are 20 minutes’ drive away. All accommodation options at Birkebeineren Hotel & Apartment include a TV and a private bathroom. The spacious apartments feature modern kitchens, a large living room and a balcony. They also have 2 bathrooms with showers. Shared facilities at Birkebeineren include a TV lounge with a fireplace. Ski storage is also on site. Guests can enjoy free private parking. Popular area activities include skiing and hiking. Guests can also enjoy the nearby museums. Lillehammer Train Station and Lillehammer’s city centre are a 15-minute walk away.

name: Ona Havstuer - By Classic Norway Hotels
address: Fv212 Ona, 6483 Ålesund, Møre og Romsdal
description: This property is on Ona Island, 100 metres from the Ferry Terminal. It offers five apartments with one or two bedrooms. It also offers four hotel rooms built in 2022. Our restaurant is open on a daily basis through the summer months. We offer free wifi throughout the premises. Ona Havsstuer’s apartments feature a spacious combined living room and kitchen. All offer panoramic views of the Norwegian Sea. Guests can visit the island’s pottery, just a few minutes’ walk away. Ferries to Finnøy, Småge and Sandøy depart regularly from the nearby terminal.

name: Stryn House - Hotel & Apartments
description: Stryn House - Hotel & Apartments offers a restaurant, a terrace and air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. Fitted with a balcony, the units feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower. A children's playground is available on site and hiking can be enjoyed within close proximity of the aparthotel. The nearest airport is Sandane, Anda Airport, 49 km from Stryn House - Hotel & Apartments.

name: Thon Hotel Arena
description: This hotel is beside the Norges Varemesse Trade Fair in Lillestrøm, 12 minutes’ train ride from Oslo Airport Gardermoen. It offers free gym access and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. Rooms of Thon Hotel Arena feature a work desk, a minibar and a large selection of TV channels. Some rooms also have a tea/coffee maker and views of the Nitelva River. Norwegian cuisine and international dishes are served at Brasserie Lillestrøm, Arena Hotel’s à la carte restaurant. A wide range of cocktails and drinks can be enjoyed in the Barena Bar. Thon Arena’s relaxation area features an indoor swimming pool, a hot tub and sauna. Lillestrøm Train Station is only 450 metres from Thon Hotel Arena. Central Oslo is a 10-minute train ride away.

name: Eidfjord Gjestgiveri
description: Overlooking the lake of Eidfjordvatnet, this traditional timber-clad property is just 12 km from the spectacular Vøringsfossen waterfall. Guests can enjoy speciality pancakes on the terrace with mountain views all around. Eidfjord Gjestgiveri offers rooms with free Wi-Fi. Breakfasts are served each morning in Eidfjord Gjestgiveri’s restaurant, and evening meals are also possible. The Hardangervidda Nature Centre is just 500 metres away, and hiking, canoeing and fishing are popular area activities. The famous Nærøyfjord is a 2-hour drive from the property, and Bergen is 150 km away. The village of Voss is 55 km from Eidfjord.

name: Thon Partner Hotel Victoria Hamar
description: Set in central Hamar, this hotel offers free WiFi and cable TV. Views over Lake Mjøsa are possible from this hotel as well. Hamar Central Station is150 metres away. Renovated in 2012, Thon PartnerHotel Victoria Hamar's well-presented rooms have comfortable beds and a private bathroom with shower. A buffet breakfast is served at the hotel every day. This hotel features a Japanese restaurant, Nagomi, and an O'Learys sports bar. Torggata pedestrian street is a 2-minute walk from Thon PartnerHotel Victoria Hamar. The open-air museum and the medieval cathedral ruins at Domkirkeodden are 2 km away.

name: Bergo Rom
description: Situated in Beitostøl and within 24 km of Høre Stave Church, Bergo Rom has a restaurant, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi. At the guest house, rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The nearest airport is Fagernes, Leirin Airport, 38 km from Bergo Rom.

name: Vollsnes Feriehus
description: No description found

name: Hotell Utsikten Geiranger - by Classic Norway Hotels
description: Located in Møre og Romsdal County, this hotel offers Norwegian cuisine and views of the Geiranger Fjord. Guests can enjoy free WiFi access and free private parking. All rooms have a private bathroom and garden or fjord views. The in-house restaurant serves an a la carte menu based on local ingredients. During summer, guests can sit out on the terrace. A fully licensed bar is also found on site. The hotel is situated by the National Tourist Route, only 100 metres from the Flydalsjuvet Cliff. The Seven Sisters Waterfall is also nearby. Staff at Utsikten is happy to recommend nearby sights and provide other tourist information. Fishing, hiking, diving and other activities can be arranged.

name: Knuts Hyttegrend
description: The family-run Knuts Hyttegrend is just 650 metres from the slopes of Beitostølen Ski Resort and 40 minutes' drive from Fagernes. It offers modern, spacious apartments and cottages, and free Wi-Fi in public areas. All accommodation options at Knuts Hyttegrend feature private bathrooms and living rooms with a TV. Kitchen facilities include a tea and coffee maker and refrigerator. Relaxation options include terraces, while the large grounds offer plenty of space for kids to run around in. In summer, fishing and hiking are popular activities in the area. Downhill and cross-country skiing can be enjoyed during winter months. A supermarket is 200 metres away.

name: Kongsberg Hostel-Vandrerhjem
description: Located in central Kongsberg, this hostel offers free parking and rooms with free Wi-Fi access and private bathrooms with shower. Kongsberg Train Station is 2 km away. A flat-screen TV and a work desk with a leather chair are featured in all rooms at Kongsberg Vandrerhjem. Bed linen and towels are included. All rooms have access to a communal kitchen and a laundry room. The hostel has a large outdoor area with a garden. Breakfast is served each morning and packed lunches are also available. A grocery store is found 500 metres away. Kongsberg Ski Centre is a 5-minute drive from Kongsberg Hostel-Vandrerhjem. The Kongsberg Silver Mines are 10 km away.

name: Radisson Blu Resort, Trysil
description: Location Located in the heart of the ski resort area, the hotel offers its guests premier access to 65 ski slopes and 32 lifts, as well as the quaint shops and restaurants of the town centre in Trysil. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 220 accommodation units. The upper floors are easily accessible using the lift. Services such as a cloakroom and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room, a café and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. Children can have fun playing in the garden. Additional features of the establishment include a newspaper stand and a playroom. Guests arriving by car can park their vehicles in the garage or car park. Additional services include room service and a laundry. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. A balcony completes the range of amenities available in most rooms. Each accommodation unit features a double bed, a queen-size bed, a king-size bed or a sofa-bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. The accommodation units offer a range of amenities, including tea and coffee making equipment. Convenient features include internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio and wireless internet access. Wheelchair-accessible rooms are also bookable. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers various options for cooling off on hot days, including a children's pool and an indoor pool. Various refreshing drinks are available from the poolside bar. Leisure options available for a fee at the establishment include golf, horse riding, canoeing and bowling. The area around the establishment offers good cross-country skiing opportunities, making it the perfect choice for fans of winter sports. A disco and a kids' club complete the range of options available. Meals Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, lunch, dinner, B & B and half board. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA, Diners Club, JCB and MasterCard.WebBeds

name: Trolltunga Camping
description: No description found

name: Quality Hotel Leangkollen
description: The Quality Hotel Leangkollen is conveniently located just minutes from downtown Oslo, Holmenkollen ski jump arena, Vigeland Sculpture Park, University of Oslo, National Gallery art museum and the Aker Brygge district, offering shopping and entertainment. Enjoy hotel amenities like a restaurant, a cocktail lounge, an indoor pool, outdoor tennis courts, free wireless Internet, banquet and meeting rooms and more. The Quality Hotel Leangkollen is the perfect hotel for business and leisure travelers. We provide the best in accommodations at affordable rates to everyone visiting the Asker area.Choice Hotels

name: Thon Hotel Kristiansand
description: Situated next to Kristiansand Cathedral, Thon PartnerHotel Kristiansand offers free WiFi and rooms with a satellite TV. Kristiansand Train Station is 300 metres away. All rooms at Thon PartnerHotel Kristiansand have a work desk and a private bathroom with shower. Some rooms include a balcony. Thon PartnerHotel Kristiansand has a cooperation with a gym, located next door. The Egon Restaurant serves traditional Norwegian cuisine as well as international dishes like pizza. Drinks are available in the bar. Markens Gate pedestrian street is right outside the door. Sørlandet Art Museum is 230 metres away.

name: Hardanger Basecamp
description: No description found

name: Fleischer's Hotel
description: Housed in a 19th-century building, this hotel lies by Lake Vangsvatnet, next to the Voss Train Station. It offers free Wi-fi, free private parking and a pool area. Each guest room at Fleischers Hotel offer a combination of old-world charm and modern conveniences. Most guest rooms have crystal chandeliers and rich fabrics. Some also have a balcony. Hotel Fleischers’ in-house restaurant serves traditional dishes based on local recipes. The fully licensed bar offers a variety of drinks. Guests can enjoy meals or drinks on the large terrace during nice weather. The wellness area at Fleischers includes a children’s pool, a hot tub and a sauna. A tennis court is also available on site. The surrounding region offers activities such as hiking, fishing, canoeing and skiing.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Hammer
description: Clarion Collection Hotels is tailor made for frequent travelers. Cozy, unique and intimate hotels with their own individual style and story to tell. We offer breakfast buffet and a complimentary light evening buffet. Coffee, tea, and fruits are available 24/7 for all our guests. Situated in the famous Storgata at Lillehammer. Pedestrian area with several shops, restaurants, and bars nearby. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Complimentary evening buffet: 7 days/week 6pm-9pm. Please note that all Choice hotels in Scandinavia are 100% non-smoking properties. Pet charge: 200 kr per stay.Choice Hotels
